column3: 자. 방금 네가 모아 온 기록물들을 빌헬미나에게 전해 주겠어?{nl}우리가 가고일을 뚫고 들어갈 수 있도록 도와준댔으니까, 올 땐 잊지 말고 뭐라도 꼭 받아와.
column4: Nah. Maukah kamu memberikan benda-benda catatan yang kamu kumpulkan tadi kepada Wilhelmina?{nl}Kami akan membantu agar dapat masuk menembus para Gargoyle, ketika datang janganlah lupa, datanglah membawa apapun itu.

column2: So these are the samples. Now, the conditions for the deal have been fulfilled.{nl}Okay. I will make you stronger.
column3: 이게 그 샘플들이군. 이걸로 거래 조건은 충족됐어.{nl}좋아. 내가 책임지고 널 더 강하게 만들어 주지.
column4: Ini adalah sample itu rupanya. Dengan ini syarat transaksi telah tercukupi.{nl}Bagus. Aku akan bertanggung jawab dan membuatmu lebih kuat lagi.

column2: There is a problem at 36_1 of the valley area.{nl}Just put the Namott of Purification which I gave to you on the place where demonic energy is strongest.
column3: 문제가 되고 있는 곳은 협곡지대 36_1입니다.{nl}제가 드린 정화의 나모트를 마기가 강한 곳에 세우면 됩니다.
column4: Tempat yang menjadi masalah adalah Canyon Area 36_1.{nl} Kau cukup memasang Purification Namote yang kuberikan di tempat yang memiliki Demon Energy Kuat.

column2: Mardas
column3: 마르다스
column4: Mardas

column2: I... didn't expect to see someone here..{nl}
column3: 아.. 이런 곳에 사람이라니..{nl}
column4: Ah.. Di tempat seperti ini ada orang..{nl}

column2: You better run away.{nl}Lots of demons are here.{nl}
column3: 당신도 어서 도망치는 게 좋을 거예요.{nl}여긴 마족이 한가득이라고요.{nl}
column4: Sebaiknya kamu juga melarikan diri.{nl}Disini dipenuhi oleh Demon loh.{nl}

column2: A little while ago, a demon appeared at the place where there is the owl sculputre and controlling the monsters.
column3: 조금 전에도 저 위에 부엉이 조각상 있는 곳에 마족이 나타나서 몬스터를 부리고 있었다니까요?
column4: Sebelumnya di atas sana tempat Owl Statue berada muncul Demon dan mengontrol para monster loh katanya?

column2: Why there? Are you insane?{nl}They are demons.{nl}
column3: 거긴 왜요? 제정신이에요?{nl}무려 마족이라고요.{nl}
column4: Kenapa disana? Sadarkah anda?{nl} Seluruhnya adalah Demon loh.{nl}

column2: I don't know how strong you are, but...{nl}I am going to stay here. If you are gonna go, go alone.{nl}
column3: 얼마나 강하길래 그렇게 위험한 짓을 하려는지 모르겠지만..{nl}난 여기있을래요. 가려거든 혼자 가세요.{nl}
column4: Entah seberapa kuatnya dia, sampai berani melakukan tindakan berbahaya seperti itu..{nl}Aku akan berada disini. Jika ingin pergi, maka pergilah sendiri.{nl}

column2: I was being chased by the demons and ran upto here.{nl}I don't want to see any more troubles.
column3: 난 마족에게 쫓겨 캐슬부터 여기까지 도망쳤다고요.{nl}더 이상 험한 꼴은 이젠 싫어요.
column4: Aku dikejar oleh Demon, sehingga melarikan diri dari Castile hingga kesini.{nl} Sekarang aku sungguh benci situasi sulit.

column2: There were no demons and only other monsters?{nl}Oh, I'm glad...{nl}
column3: 마족은 없고 다른 몬스터만 있었다고요?{nl}그나마 다행이군요.{nl}
column4: Tidak ada demon, hanya ada monster saja katamua?{nl} Walau begitu sungguh untung ya.{nl}

column2: Even so, you don't look like you are hurt... it seems that you are stronger than I expected.{nl}I see you differently now.
column3: 그렇다고 해도 다친 곳도 없어보이고.. 보기보다 강한 모양이네요.{nl}다시 봤어요.
column4: Walaupun begitu, tidak terlihat terluka ya.. Dibandingkan penampilanmu kamu termasuk kuat rupanya.

column2: Please come back to me when you fix the detector.{nl}I have something to tell you.
column3: 계시자님께서 석화 탐지기를 고치시고 나면, 제게 꼭 다시 들러 주세요.{nl}꼭 드리고 싶은 이야기가 있거든요.
column4: Jika kamu telah memperbaiki Petrification Frost Detector, tolong kembalilah lagi padaku.{nl} Ada cerita yang ingin aku sampaikan.

column2: I've already gave up on one salvation and I couldn't do anything on Medzio Diena.{nl}However, even so, I can't give up everything.{nl}
column3: 이미 한 번 구원을 포기했고, 신수의 날엔 아무것도 할 수 없었어요.{nl}하지만 그렇다고 해서 전부 포기할 순 없어요.{nl}
column4: Telah menyerah pada keselamatan satu kali, pada kejadian Medzio Diena tidak dapat{nl} melakukan apapun. Tetapi walaupun begitu, tidak dapat menyerahkan segalanya.{nl}

column2: I am going to guide each and every one of you with sincerity.{nl}I hope the road ahead of you is full of blessings.
column3: 정성을 다해 한 분씩 전부 인도할 겁니다.{nl}계시자님의 앞길에 여신의 은총이 가득하길.
column4: Aku akan mengarahkan satu persatu dengan mengerjakannya dengan sepenuh hati.{nl} Semoga perjalanan kamu selanjutnya selalu dilindungi oleh kekuatan Goddess.

column2: It doesn't matter anymore.{nl}I just want to take a break...
column3: 움직이지도, 떠나지도 못하는 몸 따위 어찌 된들 무슨 상관인가.{nl}그저 쉬고 싶을 뿐..
column4: Tiada gunanya bagi tubuh seperti ini yang tidak dapat bergerak dan pergi.{nl} Hanya istirahat yang diinginkan..

column2: [Ordeal of Cleros]
column3: [클레로스의 고난]
column4: [Chelorose's Suffering]

column2: [The death of Cleros]
column3: [클레로스의 최후]
column4: [Chleorose's End]

column2: The sun of gold ray, the moon of silver ray and the land of bronze ray.{nl}What is your number.{nl}
column3: 금빛의 태양과 은빛의 달, 동빛의 땅.{nl}그대의 숫자는 무엇인가.{nl}
column4: Matahari yang bercahaya emas dan Bulan yang bercahaya perak.{nl} Apakah angka yang kamu miliki.{nl}

column2: It seems you don't know anything about our merchants.{nl}
column3: 도무지 우리 상단에 대해 모르겠다는 표정이군.{nl}
column4: Entah kenapa ekspresimu sepertinya tidak mengetahui tentang committee kami.{nl}

column2: Hmm, have you ever seen the Great Cathedral or Mage Tower before?{nl}Or something like the gigantic Goddess Statue of Fedimian?{nl}
column3: 흠. 혹시 대성당이라던가 마법사의 탑을 본 적이 있나?{nl}아니면 페디미안의 거대 여신상 같은 것 말이다.{nl}
column4: Hmm. Pernahkah kamu melihat Mage Tower atau Big Cathedral?{nl} Kalau tidak seperti Giant Goddess Statue di Fermidian.{nl}

column2: Do you think a large construction like that can be completed by one individual?{nl}Of course not. It's hard to supply such materials even if the kingdom comes first.
column3: 그렇게 큰 공사를 일개 개인이 할 수 있을 것 같나?{nl}물론 아니지. 왕국이 나서더라도 그런 엄청난 자재들을 대는 건 힘들껄?{nl}
column4: Pekerjaan konstruksi sebesar itu, apakah sepertinya bisa dilakukan oleh seorang diri?{nl}Tentu saja tidak. Terlepas dari kerajaan, kurasa sulit untuk mencari material yang sebanyak itu?{nl}

column2: We are the merchants that supplied materials to the historic construction.{nl}Do you understand now?{nl}
column3: 우리가 바로 그 역사적인 대공사의 자재를 공급해 온 유서 깊은 상단이시다. {nl}라는 말씀이지. 이제 좀 알 것 같나?{nl}
column4: Kami adalah Merchant Alliance yang sejak lama mensupply material konstruksi besar dan bersejarah. {nl} Apakah kau sekarang telah mengerti?{nl}

column2: We helped for the completion of it.{nl}The objective of our merchants is the will of the goddesses.{nl}
column3: 역사를 뒤에서 보좌해왔다고나 할 수 있지.{nl}우리 상단의 목표 자체가 전부 여신의 뜻이라는 거야.{nl}
column4: Bisa dikatakan telah mendukung terjadinya sejarah dari belakang kan.{nl} Tujuan dari Merchant Alliance ini adalah semua atas kehendak Goddess.{nl}

column2: Ah, I am in charge of newcomers of Kedoran Merchant Alliance.{nl}We've received severe damages on Medzio Diena so even the newcomers are trying their best to restore the place.{nl}
column3: 아, 난 우리 케도라 상단의 신입 단원 관리를 맡고 있네.{nl}신수의 날에 막대한 피해를 입어서 신입들까지 동원해가며 피해를 복구하고 있지.{nl}
column4: Ah, Aku bertugas mengatur member baru dari Merchant Alliance.{nl} Karena ketika hari Medzio Diena telah terjadi kerusakan yang sangat parah, saat ini kami sampai menggerakan seluruh member baru dan melakukan restorasi kerusakan.{nl}

column2: We are in a trouble.{nl}We have to put up a notice board, but we're just too busy.{nl}
column3: 정말 큰일이에요.{nl}알림판을 세워야 하는데 몸이 두세 개라도 모자랄 지경이에요.{nl}
column4: Sungguh masalah besar.{nl}Padahal harus memasang papan pengumuman, tetapi kami kekurangan orang disini.{nl}

column2: The Kedoran Merchant Alliance act harsh on newcomers.{nl}Especially Leopoldas, he's really scary... He wants me to do this alone.
column3: 저희 케도라 상단은 신입들에겐 정말 가차없거든요.{nl}특히 레오폴다스님은 어찌나 무서운지.. 꼭 혼자서 이걸 다 해내라 하시네요.
column4: Kami Kedora Merchant Alliance sungguh tidak ada rasa ampun kepada para anggota baru.{nl} Terutama tuan Leopoldas, entah kenapa sungguh menakutkan.. Ia selalu berkata untuk melakukan segalanya sendirian.

column2: If that's so, can you place this notice board on Kluibe Road?{nl}Edita, our leader, is excavating this sacred object.{nl}
column3: 그렇다면 크뤼베 가도쪽에 이 알림판을 세워 주시겠어요?{nl}에디타 조장님이 성물을 발굴하고 계시거든요. {nl}
column4: Kalau begitu maukah kamu memasang papan pemberitahuan ini di Kluibe Road?{nl} Edita Team Leader sedang menggali relic loh. {nl}

column2: I am counting on you to do this secretly without being detected by Leopoldas.{nl}I have to go somewhere.
column3: 레오폴다스님께 들키지 않게 몰래 부탁드릴게요.{nl}저는 또 다른 곳에 가 봐야 해서요.
column4: Aku meminta diam-diam agar tidak ketahuan oleh tuan Leopoldas.{nl} Karena saya harus pergi ke tempat lainnya.

column2: I am counting on you to do this secretly without being detected by Leopoldas.{nl}For sure.
column3: 레오폴다스님께 들키지 않도록 잘 부탁드려요.{nl}꼭이요.
column4: Mohon bantuannya supaya tidak ketahuan oleh tuan Leopoldas.{nl} Tolong ya.

column2: I am helping the Revelators who have just started their journeys from the Kedoran Merchant Alliance.{nl}If you don't mind, can you help us?
column3: 전 케도라 상단에서 갓 모험을 시작하는 계시자들을 돕고 있어요.{nl}괜찮으시다면 저희 일을 도와주시겠어요?{nl}
column4: Aku dari Kedora Merchant Alliance sedang membantu para Savior yang baru memulai petualangan.{nl} Jika boleh maukah kamu membantu pekerjaan kami?{nl}

column2: It's not that difficult.{nl}You just have to pass the blessing which is needed for their journeys.
column3: 별로 어려운 일은 아니에요.{nl}모험에 필요한 좋은 축복을 그 분들께 내려드리면 되는 거예요.
column4: Bukan hal yang terlalu sulit.{nl} Cukup dengan memberikan berkat kepada mereka yang membuthukannya pada petualangan.

column2: Thank you.{nl}Then, I will tell you how you can do it.{nl}
column3: 도와주신다니 감사합니다.{nl}그럼 방법을 알려드릴게요.{nl}
column4: Terima kasih karena bermaksud untuk membantu.{nl} Kalau begitu kuberitahukan caranya.{nl}

column2: Please look for the Revelators who have started their journeys around Orsha or Klaipeda.{nl}When you use this scroll on them, they will receive a helpful blessing for their journeys.
column3: 오르샤나 클라페다 주변에서 이제 막 모험을 시작하신 계시자님을 찾아주세요.{nl}그 분에게 이 스크롤을 사용하면 모험에 필요한 축복이 내려질 거예요.{nl}
column4: Tolong temukan para Savior yang baru memulai petualangan sekarang di sekitar Orsha atau Klaipeda.{nl} Jika menggunakan Scrool ini pada mereka, maka kau bisa memberikan berkat yang dibutuhkan mereka pada petualangan.{nl}

column2: Ah, it won't be effective to ones who have already been blessed, so please keep that in mind.
column3: 참, 이미 축복이 내려진 분에겐 소용 없으니 꼭 알아두세요.
column4: Ah, Cobalah mencari tahu dahulu, karena tidak ada gunanya memberikan berkat pada mereka yang telah mendapatkannya.

column2: We can't just rely on the goddess.{nl}We should do it ourselves in order to reduce the burden on the goddesses.
column3: 여신께만 의지할 순 없는 일이지요.{nl}요즘같은 때에 저희라도 나서야 여신께서도 짐을 덜 수 있지 않겠습니까.
column4: Hal itu adalah bukan sesuatu yang ditujukan kepada Goddess saja.{nl} Belakangan ini kami pun harus muncul langsung, untuk mengurangi beban Goddess kan.

column2: We, Kedoran Merchant Alliance helped the goddesses secretly until now.{nl}But, since the world turned into a chaos, we are going to help her actively.
column3: 저희 케도라 상단은 여태껏 음지에서만 여신을 도와왔지요.{nl}세상이 이렇게 된 지금은 적극적으로 나설 생각인가봐요.
column4: Kami Kedora Merchant Alliance telah membantu Goddess dari belakang dengan sepenuh hati.{nl} Sekarang kami sedang berpikir untuk muncul secara aktif pada dunia yang berubah seperti ini ya.

column2: We are in trouble...{nl}There are so many things to retrieve, but I don't know what people are doing.
column3: 이것 참 큰일이네..{nl}회수해야 할 건 산더미 같은데 회수조는 도대체 어디서 뭘 하고 있담?
column4: Wah ini sungguh masalah besar ya..{nl} Hal yang harus diambil kembali ada setumpuk gunung, entah apa yang sedang dilakukan oleh tim pengambil?

column2: Ah, so Leopoldas sent you here?{nl}Finally, it seems he has stopped being so stubborn.{nl}
column3: 아, 레오폴다스 아저씨께서 보내서 오셨다고요?{nl}드디어 아저씨께서도 고집을 굽히셨나 보네요.{nl}
column4: Ah, Kau datang karena paman Leopoldas mengirimmu rupanya?{nl} Akhirnya paman itu mulai mengurangi sifat keras kepalanya ya.{nl}

column2: A long time ago, I was sending the sacred objects to Fedimian.{nl}But, I didn't realise it was on Medzio Diena.{nl}
column3: 아주 예전에, 페디미안으로 보내야 할 성물들을 보내고 있던 중이였죠.{nl}하지만 꿈에도 몰랐어요. 하필 그 날이 신수의 날일 줄 누가 알았겠어요?{nl}
column4: Dahulu kala sekali, Ketika sedang mengirimkan benda-benda relic ke Fermidian.{nl} tetapi entah mimpi atau bukan. Siapa yang tahu bahwa hari itu adalah hari Medzio Diena kan?{nl}

column2: It was such a mess.{nl}They took care of urgent matters in other regions and they now came out to retrieve the sacred objects.{nl}
column3: 여기저기 뒤집어지고 진짜 난리도 아니었어요.{nl}일단 다른 지역의 급한 것부터 처리하고 이제서야 성물 회수에 나선 거죠.{nl}
column4: Sungguh waktu itu terjadi kekacauan sangat besar bukan main.{nl} Pertama-tama bereskanlah mulai dari area yang mendesak, lalu sekarang harus keluar mengambil relic kan.{nl}

column2: Okay, let's stop complaining. I want you to retrieve the sacred objects from Goanar Path.{nl}I believe that they are buried deep in the ground.{nl}
column3: 자, 하소연은 이쯤 하고요, 당신에겐 고야나르 숲길의 성물 회수를 부탁드릴게요.{nl}아마 땅 속에 고이 묻혀 있을 거예요.{nl}
column4: Nah, sampai disini saja mengeluhnya, aku meminta tolong padamu untuk mengambil relic di Gayanar Forest Road.{nl} Mungkin saja benda itu terkubur di dalam tanah.{nl}

column2: Ah, and there are many monsters around that threaten us merchants.{nl}If it's alright with you, I want you to defeat them as well.
column3: 아, 그리고.. 그 주변에 저희 상단원들을 위협하는 몬스터들이 많아요.{nl}괜찮으시다면 몬스터 정리도 함께 부탁드릴게요.
column4: Ah, lalu.. Di sekitar situ banyak monster yang mengancam para anggota kami.{nl} Jika boleh, tolong sekalian habisi para monster tersebut.

column2: Be careful since there are many monsters around there.{nl}If there weren't any monsters, our task would not have been completed this late.
column3: 그 주변에 몬스터들이 많으니 조심하세요.{nl}몬스터만 없었어도 작업이 이리 늦진 않았을 거라고요.
column4: Berhati-hatilah karena banyak monster di sekitar situ.{nl} Jika saja tidak ada monster itu maka pekerjaan tidak akan terlambat seperti ini.

column2: Leopoldas never asks anyone for help.{nl}I never knew that you were this good.
column3: 레오폴다스 아저씨는 원래 남에게 부탁하는 분이 아니세요.{nl}결국 부탁했다는 사람이 이렇게 실력 좋은 분일 줄은 몰랐는걸요?
column4: Bukankah paman Leopoldas adalah orang yang meminta tolong pada orang lain.{nl} Intinya kurasa ia tidak tahu, orang yang dimintainya tolong memiliki kemampuan sebaik ini?

column2: Actually, we received a strange report.{nl}The monsters at Kluibe Road are digging only one spot.
column3: 흠. 마침 이상한 보고가 들어와 있어요.{nl}크뤼베 가도의 몬스터들이 한 곳만 집요하게 파헤치고 있다네요.{nl}
column4: Hmm. Akhirnya laporan yang aneh telah datang.{nl} Para monster dari Kluibe Road sedang menggali di satu tempat dengan bersusah payah.{nl}

column2: I think what they are looking for is one of our Merchants' obejct.{nl}And it would take some time until the retrieval group reaches here.
column3: 아마 그것도 저희 상단의 물건일 것 같은데 확인해 주시겠어요?{nl}회수조가 그 쪽까지 도착하려면 시간이 걸려서요.
column4: Mungkin juga hal itu adalah barang milik Merchant Alliance kami, maukah kau memeriksanya?{nl} Tim pengambil membutuhkan waktu untuk tiba di tempat itu.

column2: Is it the sacred obejct?{nl}It's been such a long time so I can't think of anything else.
column3: 설마 그 성물인가?{nl}흠.. 하도 오래전이다 보니 짚히는 것이 없네요.
column4: Mungkinkah Relic itu?{nl}Hmm.. Mungkin karena sudah terlalu lama, sehingga tiada yang tersisa.

column2: Those are the records from the merchants.{nl}They are badly torn.{nl}
column3: 그건, 상단의 기록이군요.{nl}형편없이 찢어져 있네요.{nl}
column4: Itu, catatan Merchant Alliance rupanya.{nl} tersobek-sobek hancur parah sekali ya.{nl}

column2: I am sure the monsters created this mess.{nl}Give it to me.
column3: 분명 몬스터들이 이 난리를 쳐 놓은 것이겠죠.{nl}이리 주세요.
column4: Tentu saja para monster yang melakukan hal ini.{nl} Segera berikan itu.

column2: Let's see.{nl}It is about..{nl}
column3: 어디보자.{nl}대충 내용이..{nl}
column4: Coba lihat.{nl} Kira-kira isinya..{nl}

column2: This is the book about the materials for the arrow.{nl}Long time ago, they were supplied to Lydia Schaffen and the first Fletcher Master.{nl}
column3: 이건 화살 재료에 관한 장부에요.{nl}아주 옛날에 리디아 샤펜이랑 초대 플레처 마스터에게 발주했었네요.{nl}
column4: Ini adalah Ledger mengenai bahan anak panah.{nl} Ini adalah pesanan dari Lidia Sharpen kepada Fletcher Master pertama dahulu kala.{nl}

column2: I thought it was the sacred object that was lost long ago, it's an unexpected gift.{nl}It is said that the arrow of Lydia Schaffen has some special power in it.{nl}
column3: 예전에 잃어버린 성물일 줄 알았는데, 뜻밖의 수확이에요.{nl}리디아 샤펜의 화살은 특별한 힘이 깃들어 있다고 전해지거든요.{nl}
column4: Kukira adalah relic yang telah hilang dulu, ini adalah penemuan yang tak terduga.{nl} Katanya panah milik Lidia Sharpen memiliki kekuatan yang spesial.{nl}

column2: It is hard to restore it myself.. {nl}I should put it somewhere in the safe place and restore it when I go back to the headquarter.
column3: 일단 제 힘으로는 복원이 힘드니.. {nl}잘 보관했다가 본부에 가서 복원해 봐야겠네요.
column4: Pertama-tama karena sulit untuk memulihkannya dnegan kekuatanku.. {nl}Akan kusimpan dengan baik lalu setelah kembali ke markas utama akan coba kupulihkan.

column2: The remaining spot should be somewhere around Juikas Field.. but, I have no idea where it is exactly.{nl}If it's alright with you, could you help me out with this?
column3: 이제 남은 지점은 율카스 벌판 어딘가일텐데.. 정확히 어딘지를 몰라요.{nl}괜찮다면 이것까지만 도와주시겠어요?
column4: Sekarang poin yang tersisa adalah seharusnya ada di Juikas Field.. Tapi tidak tahu dimana tepatnya.{nl} Jika boleh maukah kamu membantu hal ini juga?

column2: I will give you the detector so please see how it reacts to it.{nl}It will only react on the marks that were put on by merchants so you won't get lost.
column3: 탐지기를 드릴 테니 이걸로 반응을 살펴 보세요.{nl}상단 표시에만 반응을 하니 허탕치실 일은 없을 거예요.
column4: Gunakanlah detektor yang kuberikan untuk memeriksa reaksinya.{nl} Karena hanya bereaksi pada tanda Merchant Alliance saja, maka tidak mungkin pulang dengan tangan kosong.

column2: Isn't this really a good method?{nl}We put marks on all objects of the Merchants just in case they happened to get lost.
column3: 정말 괜찮은 방법이죠?{nl}상단의 모든 물건은 잃어버릴 때를 대비해서 전부 표시를 넣어 놓죠.
column4: Caranya boleh juga bukan?{nl} Ketika kehilangan seluruh benda Merchant Alliance,semua sudah ditandai sebelumnya untuk berjaga-jaga.

column2: Ahah, you've found the most important object!{nl}This is the mysterious ink.{nl}
column3: 아아, 제일 중요한 걸 찾아오셨네요!{nl}이건 신비한 잉크예요.{nl}
column4: Ahhh, Kau telah menemukan sesuatu yang paling penting!{nl} Ini adalah Mysterious Ink.{nl}

column2: This is the secret ink which you use when you have to hide the records.{nl}It is very expensive as a result.{nl}
column3: 기록을 숨겨야 할 필요가 있을 때 쓰는 비밀 잉크지요.{nl}그만큼 무척 비싸요.{nl}
column4: Tinta rahasia yang digunakan ketika butuh untuk menyembunyikan catatan.{nl} Sesuai kemampuan itu harganya juga sangat mahal.{nl}

column2: You've been a great help to me so far.{nl}We will take care of the rest!{nl}
column3: 그 동안 정말 많은 도움이 되었어요.{nl}나머지 일들은 저희가 알아서 할게요!{nl}
column4: Selama itu telah banyak membantu sekali.{nl} Hal tersisa lainnya akan kami lakukan sendiri nanti!{nl}

column2: Leopoldas?{nl}Ah, he is our brother. What's the matter?{nl}
column3: 레오폴다스?{nl}아아, 우리 형님이지. 무슨 일이지?{nl}
column4: Leopoldas?{nl}Ahhh, Kakak kami rupanya. Ada urusan apa?{nl}

column2: He sent you to help me?{nl}I can't believe it.{nl}
column3: 날 도와주라고 자넬 보냈다고?{nl}이것 참, 해가 서쪽이 아니라 북쪽에서 떴다고 해도 못 믿겠군.{nl}
column4: Ia mengirimkanmu untuk membantuku katamu?{nl} Wah, aku sungguh tidak dapat mempercayai hal ini.{nl}

column2: Well, anyways, it's good.{nl}That damn monster took away everything.{nl}
column3: 뭐, 어쨌든 마침 잘 됐어.{nl}망할 몬스터가 여길 전부 털어 가 버렸거든.{nl}
column4: Yah, intinya bagus lah kalau sudah beres.{nl} Semua monster penganggu disini, semuanya telah kabur ketakutan.{nl}

column2: Other things are fine, but the problem is the teaching materials for the newcomers.{nl}If we don't have those, we have to work from the beginning.{nl}
column3: 다른 건 상관 없는데 문제는 신입 교육 자료야.{nl}그게 없으면 처음부터 전부 다시 작업을 해야 한다고.{nl}
column4: Yang lain tidak ada masalah, tetapi persoalnnya adalah material pendidikan anggota baru.{nl} Jika tidak ada itu, harus melakukan pekerjaan lagi semua dari awal.{nl}

column2: You've seen the newcomers who Leopoldas manages right?{nl}These are the documents to educate those newcomers.{nl}
column3: 레오폴다스가 관리하는 신입 단원들 봤지?{nl}그 신입 단원들을 교육하는 데 필요한 자료다.{nl}
column4: Kau telah melihat para anggota baru yang dikontrol oleh Leopoldas kan?{nl} Itu adalah material yang diperlukan untuk melatih para anggota baru itu.{nl}

column2: Well, we, merchants support the will of the goddesses, but we moved secretly from behind.{nl}But, we can't stand anymore since the world is like this.
column3: 원래 우리 상단은 여신의 뜻을 받들기는 해도 나서지 않고 뒤에서만 움직였거든.{nl}그런데 세상이 이 모양이니 가만히 있을 수가 있나.{nl}
column4: Sebenarnya Merchant Alliance kami walau menerima kehendak Goddess hanya bergerak dari belakang saja dan tidak muncul di permukaan.{nl} Tetapi karena dunia berubah seperti ini, tentu kami juga tidak bisa diam saja.{nl}

column2: That's why we've decided to hire new people and participate more actively.{nl}But, since the world is like this, we can't just do nothing.{nl}
column3: 그래서 신입들도 새로 모집하면서 적극적으로 나서기로 했어.{nl}마족의 표적이 되는 한이 있어도 말이야.{nl}
column4: Maka dari itu kami memutuskan untuk muncul secara aktif dengan mengumpulkan anggota baru.{nl} Walaupun menjadi target dari demo juga.{nl}

column2: Anyways, if you are going to help me, please get me those documents again.{nl}If we don't have those, it would become complicated.
column3: 어쨌든 날 돕겠다면 그 자료들을 다시 찾아와 줘.{nl}그게 없으면 복잡해진단 말이다.
column4: Bagaimanapun, jika mau membantuku, temukanlah kembali material-material itu.{nl} Jika tidak ada itu maka urusan menjadi semakin rumit.

column2: It's not going to be over even if we find all those documents.{nl}Get ready since we also have to create the manuscript.
column3: 그 자료를 다 찾는다고 끝난 게 아냐.{nl}필사본도 만들어야 하니까 준비해 두라고.
column4: Walau semua material itu telah ditemukan, bukan berarti semua sudah beres.{nl} Karena harus membuat salinannya, persiapkanlah juga itu.

column2: I know the good meaning of it, but I am not sure if we are going to survive.{nl}If so, we are not doing something that we hadn't done before so it doesn't matter.{nl}
column3: 좋은 뜻은 알겠는데 목숨이 남아날 지는 모르겠어.{nl}뭐, 그렇다고 해서 안하던 일을 하게 된 건 아니니까 상관 없어.{nl}
column4: Aku mengerti akan maksud baik itu, tetapi bisa juga kehilangan nyawa.{nl}Yah, walau begitu tidak ada hubungannya karena bukan berarti melakukan pekerjaan yang tidak bisa dilakukan.{nl}

column2: Fighting against monsters are not something rare.
column3: 평소에도 몬스터와의 전투 같은 건 흔히 있는 일이라고.
column4: Pertempuran dengan monster adalah hal yang biasa sehari-harinya.

column2: Good. Our brother send us a good helper.{nl}Let's make the manuscript now.
column3: 좋아. 형님께서 좋은 도우미를 보내 주셨는데?{nl}이제 필사본을 만들어 보자고.
column4: Bagus. Kakak telah mengirimkan asisten yang hebat ya?{nl} Sekarang mari coba membuat salinannya.

column2: I will do the writing anyways so you don't have to worry.{nl}What I need is the ink.{nl}
column3: 어차피 글 쓰는 건 내가 할 거니까 걱정 안해도 돼.{nl}필요한 건 잉크지.{nl}
column4: Bagaimanapun aku yang akan melakukan penulisannya, sehingga kau tidak perlu khawatir.{nl} Yang dibutuhkan adalah tinta.{nl}

column2: If there's an ink that is made up the body fluid from the monsters, it would last long.{nl}I will give you the trap so I am counting on you for the monster body fluid.
column3: 몬스터의 체액으로 만든 잉크가 있으면 오래 가고 좋아.{nl}내가 덫을 줄 테니 그걸로 몬스터 체액을 부탁해.
column4: Jika memiliki tinta yang terbuat dari cairan tubuh monster, tulisan bisa bertahan lama dan bagus hasilnya.{nl} Aku akan memberikanmu perangkap, gunakanlah untuk mendapatkan cairan tubuh monster.

column2: Put the trap on the way that monsters cross.{nl}When monsters faint out after stepping on the trap, get the body fluid.{nl}
column3: 몬스터가 지나가는 길에 덫을 놓는 거다.{nl}덫을 밟고 기절 할 때 바로 채액을 뽑는 거지.{nl}
column4: Taruh perangkap di jalan tempat monster berlalu lalang.{nl} Ketika ia menginjak perangkap dan pingsan, segera ambil cairan tubuhnya.{nl}

column2: Ah, this is the trick that only works at Droze Empty Lot so you should only put the trap there.
column3: 참, 이건 드로즈 공터에서만 먹히는 꼼수니까 거기에만 덫을 놓도록 해.
column4: Wah, ini adalah umpan yang dimakan hanya di Drose Empty Lot, tolong letakkan perangkap hanya disana ya.

column2: You've already obtained all of them?{nl}
column3: 벌써 다 구해 온 건가?{nl}
column4: Wah kau sudah mendapatkan semuanya?{nl}

column2: I knew it. We still need more.
column3: 그럼 그렇지. 아직 모자라.
column4: Yah begitulah. Masih kurang.

column2: This is enough.{nl}You've done well so far.{nl}
column3: 이 정도는 충분한 양이군.{nl}그 동안 수고했어. {nl}
column4: Jumlahnya sudah cukup jika sebanyak ini.{nl} Terima kasih ya. {nl}

column2: If we meet next time, I will treat you a lot from our merchants,.{nl}I will do the rest so go back.
column3: 나중에 또 만날 일이 있다면 우리 상단에서 아주 푸짐하게 대접하지.{nl}나머진 내가 알아서 할 테니 이만 가 봐.
column4: Jika nanti ada kesempatan bertemu lagi, kami Merchant Alliance akan menerima dengan senang hati.{nl} Sisanya akan kami lakukan sendiri, maka dari itu  segera pergi sekarang.

column2: Hello.{nl}Have you ever heard of Nestospa?{nl}
column3: 안녕하시오.{nl}혹시 네스토스파라고 들어 보셨소?{nl}
column4: Halo.{nl} Apakah kamu pernah mendengar nama Nestospa?{nl}

column2: Well, it doesn't really matter even if we didn't hear anything about it.{nl}They only concentrate on their religious belief quietly.{nl}
column3: 뭐, 들어본 적 없어도 별로 상관은 없네만.{nl}본디 조용하게 자기의 신앙에만 충실한 사람들이니까.{nl}
column4: Yah, walaupun tidak pernah mencobanya pun, tidak ada masalah ya.{nl} Sejak awal mereka hanya orang-orang yang setia pada kepercayaan diri sendiri dengan tenang.{nl}

column2: I am one of those Nestospa.{nl}Prayers are good, but I am making a tombstone to see if that's going to help the goddesses.{nl}
column3: 나도 그 네스토스파의 일원이요.{nl}기도도 좋지만 여신께 힘이 되지 않을까 해서 비석을 만들고 있다오.{nl}
column4: Aku juga adalah pengikut dari Nestospa.{nl} Berdoa adalah hal baik, sehingga aku membuat monumen yang mungkin dapat menjadi kekuatan bagi Goddess.{nl}

column2: I am trying to get rid of the evil energy and send only sacred energy to the goddess.{nl}But, I am having a problem collecting materials. {nl}
column3: 사악한 기운은 거르고 성스러운 기운만을 모아 여신께 보내려는 것이지.{nl}그런데 영 재료들이 모이질 않네. {nl}
column4: Filter energi yang jahat, dan kumpulkan hanya energi suci yang ingin dikirimkan kepada Goddess.{nl} Tetapi sepertinya material tidak terkumpulkan juga ya. {nl}

column2: Can you help me?
column3: 조금 도와줄 수 있겠소?
column4: Bisakah kau membantu sedikit?

column2: There are too many materials.{nl}Listen well.{nl}
column3: 이거 원 재료가 한두 가지여야지.{nl}잘 들으시오.{nl}
column4: Bahan utamanya ada beberapa kan.{nl}Dengarkanlah baik baik.{nl}

column2: Get some lime powder from monsters, and then some flat stones for construction.{nl}You'll be busy.
column3: 석재용 돌도 구해야 하고 몬스터에게 횟가루도 얻어야 하오. {nl}많이 바쁠 거요.
column4: Harus mencari batu untuk material dan mendapatkan White Powder dari monster. {nl} Sungguh sibuk sekali.

column2: I can't just stand still even if I can't fact demons directly.{nl}Everyone does his/her own task.
column3: 직접 나서서 마족을 상대하지 못한다고 해서 가만히 있을 순 없지 않겠소.{nl}각자 자기가 할 수 있는 일을 하는 것이지.
column4: Katanya tidak dapat menghadapi Demon dengan berhadapan langsung, sehingga aku tidak dapat diam saja.{nl} Lakukanlah hal yang bisa dilakukan diri sendiri saja.

column2: Goold. Well done.{nl}Now the materials are all collected.. We need some special tools.
column3: 이야, 잘 해 주었소.{nl}이제 재료는 모였고.. 특별한 도구가 필요하지.
column4: Wah, kau melakukannya dengan baik.{nl} Sekarang setelah material telah terkumpul.. Membutuhkan peralatan khusus ya.

column2: Good. Since you've helped me until now, why don't you make a tombstone yourself?{nl}Your name will be reached to the goddess with the sacred power.{nl}
column3: 자. 여태껏 날 도왔으니 자네도 비석 하나 정돈 만들어 보는 게 어떻겠소.{nl}여신께 자네의 이름이 신성한 힘과 함께 닿을 거요.{nl}
column4: Nah. Karena waktu itu kau telah membantuku waktu lalu, bagaimana jika kamu juga membantuku untuk membuat satu buah monumen.{nl} Aku akan menyampaikan nama kamu dengan kekuatan suci kepada Goddess.{nl}

column2: Just do your best to make a shape.{nl}How about it? Do you want to try it?
column3: 온 신심과 정성을 다해서 모양만 잡아보면 되오.{nl}어때, 한 번 해 보겠소?
column4: Kau dapat melakukannya dengan menggunakan tubuh dan hati keseluruhan secara tulus.{nl}Bagaimana, Apakah kau mau mencobanya?

column2: Make it beautiful.{nl}I will do the rest so don't worry too much.
column3: 어디 한 번 잘 예쁘게 만들어 보시오.{nl}마무리는 내가 할 테니 너무 걱정 말고.
column4: Cobalah membuat dengan baik sekali.{nl} Karena aku yang akan melakukan finishing, maka janganlah terlalu khawatir.

column2: It's quite a nice shape, composed but heavy.{nl}Leave the final touches to me.{nl}
column3: 담담하니 묵직한 모양이 인상깊군.{nl}마무리는 내게 맡기시오.{nl}
column4: Karena selaras, bentuk yang berat seperti memberikan kesan yang mendalam.{nl}Serahkan finishing kepadaku.{nl}

column2: I don't know how many tombstones we are going to make..{nl}But, when you see this kind of tombstone from now on, please remember that there are people like us.{nl}
column3: 우리가 얼마나 많은 비석을 만들게 될런진 모르겠지만.. {nl}앞으로 이런 비석을 보면 우리 같은 사람도 있을 거라고 기억해 주면 좋겠소.{nl}
column4: Entah berapa banyak monumen yang kami telah buat dan selesaikan.. {nl} Tetapi alangkah baiknya jika kedepannya jika kamu melihat monumen seperti ini, kau teringat akan orang-orang seperti kami ini.{nl}

column2: The kingdom hasn't been collapsed by the demons yet.{nl}If we do our best, we would be able to find the peace.{nl}
column3: 왕국은 아직 마족에게 무너지지 않았소.{nl}정성을 다하면 언젠간 예전같은 평화를 찾을 수 있을 게요.{nl}
column4: Kerajaan masih belum hancur oleh karena Demon.{nl} Jika melakukan sepenuh hati, maka dapat menemukan kedamaian kembali seperti dulu.{nl}

column2: Ah, up there, We need help from Gierda near Baderam Hill.{nl}If you are okay, I want you to help me.
column3: 참, 아마 저 위쪽, 바데람 언덕 근처의 기에드라도 도움이 필요하다오.{nl}괜찮다면 자네가 도와줬으면 좋겠군.
column4: Wah, Mungkin di bagian atas sana, Gieraldo yang ada di sekitar Baderam Hill membutuhkan bantuan.{nl} Jika boleh, alangkah baiknya jika kamu membantunya.

column2: Do you have any business with me?{nl}
column3: 저에게 무슨 일이시지요?{nl}
column4: Ada urusan apa dengan saya?{nl}

column2: Antanas has asked you to help me?{nl}That's good. I am compiling the scripture of the goddesses here.{nl}
column3: 아, 안타나스 아저씨께서 도와주라 하셨다고요?{nl}정말 잘 됐네요. 저는 여기서 여신의 경전을 만들고 있어요.{nl}
column4: Ah, Paman Antanas menyuruhmu untuk memberikan bantuan?{nl}Sungguh bagus ya. Saya sedang membuat Scripture Goddess disini.{nl}

column2: We should have something that we can rely on when we are facing diffculties like nowadays.{nl}
column3: 이렇게 힘들고 어려운 때일 수록 마음에 기댈 곳이 있어야 어떻게든 버티지 않겠어요?{nl}
column4: Pada saat sulit maka hati ini butuh tempat untuk bersandar dan bertahan, bukankah begitu?{nl}

column2: The scripture helped that.{nl}We should calm us down by reading the words of the goddesses.{nl}
column3: 그걸 경전이 도와주는 거죠.{nl}여신의 말씀을 읽으면서 마음을 차분하게 하는 거예요.{nl}
column4: Itu adalah fungsi dari Scripture itu bukan.{nl} Sambil membaca kata-kata Goddess, akan membuat hati tenang.{nl}

column2: We should first collect the materials to compile the scripture.{nl}Normal sheets become yellow and break.. We are trying to compile it with new materials now.{nl}
column3: 일단 경전을 만들기 위한 재료를 모아야 해요.{nl}일반 종이들은 금방 누래지고 부스러져서.. 이번에는 새로운 재료로 해보려고요.{nl}
column4: Pertama-tama perlu mengumpulkan material untuk membuat Scripture.{nl}Kertas biasa mudah rusak dan lapuk.. Sehingga kali ini aku bermaksud menggunakan material baru.{nl}

column2: Transparent shells of monsters are good.{nl}When we engrave letters on them, they last long.{nl}Could you get me those?{nl}{nl}
column3: 몬스터들의 투명한 껍질이 딱 좋아요. {nl}잘 다듬어서 글을 새기면 오래 가죠.{nl}그것들을 좀 구해 주시겠어요?{nl}{nl}
column4: Kulit dari monster yang transparan sepertinya cocok. {nl} Dapat menyerap tinta dari tulisan dengan baik dan bertahan lama.{nl} Bisakah kau mencarikan itu?{nl}{nl}

column2: Those are easy to find.{nl}Okay, then I am counting on you.
column3: 흔한 재료라서 구하기는 쉬워요.{nl}그럼 잘 부탁드립니다.
column4: Karena itu adalah bahan yang umum, maka mudah untuk mencarinya.{nl} Kalau begitu mohon bantuannya ya.

column2: Everyone needs something to rely one.{nl}But the goddesses.. {nl}
column3: 누구나 마음에 기댈 곳은 필요해요.{nl}하지만 여신께서는.. {nl}
column4: Siapapun membutuhkan tempat bagi hatinya untuk bersandar.{nl} Tetapi Goddess.. {nl}

column2: Yes.{nl}We should be like a big tree that can be relied on.
column3: 그렇죠. {nl}저희가 기댈 수 있는 큰 나무가 되어 드려야 할 텐데요.
column4: Begitulah. {nl} Kami bermaksud menjadi pohon besar yang bisa disandari.

column2: You've brought them sooner than I expected.{nl}This shell would become the scripture after polising it up. Thank you.{nl}
column3: 생각보다 빨리 가져오셨네요.{nl}이 껍질은 잘 다듬어서 경전이 될 거예요. 감사합니다.{nl}
column4: Kau membawanya kembali lebih cepat dibandingkan dugaan ya.{nl} Akan kugunakan kulit ini dengan baik. Terima kasih.{nl}

column2: To make the scripture, sheets are important, but binding is also important.{nl}Especially, the strings. It will be no good if the scripture gets untied.{nl}
column3: 경전을 만드려면 종이도 중요하지만 제본 작업도 중요해요.{nl}특히 끈이 중요하죠. 기껏 만든 경전이 다 풀어지면 무슨 소용이겠어요?{nl}
column4: Jika ingin membuat Scripture maka bahan kertasnya memang penting, tetapi pekerjaan menyalin juga sama pentingnya.{nl} Terutama Strap. Apa gunanya jika Scripture yang dibuat dengan sepenuh hati lepas berantakan?{nl}

column2: The string that is made up of the leather of monster is the best, but the problem is that it is short.{nl}I will give you a Moru so can you make a leather string for the binding?{nl}
column3: 몬스터의 가죽으로 만든 끈이 참 좋은데, 짧은 게 문제예요.{nl}제가 무두질용 모루를 드릴 테니 가죽 끈으로 제본용 끈을 만들어 주시겠어요?{nl}
column4: Strap yang dibuat dari kulit monster bagus loh, masalahnya hanya pendek saja.{nl} Karena aku akan memberimu anvil untuk mengasah kulit, maka maukah kamu membuatkan Strap untuk digunakan menjilid?{nl}

column2: We should first obtain leather strings from monsters.{nl}After that, we will use this Moru to make a string for the binding.{nl}
column3: 일단 몬스터에게서 가죽 끈을 구해야겠죠.{nl}그 다음에 이 모루를 사용해서 제본용 질긴 끈 뭉치로 만드는 거예요.{nl}
column4: Pertama-tama pergilah mencari Monster, lalu dapatkanlah Strap Leather.{nl} Setelah itu gunakan Anvil dan buatlah setumpuk Tough Strap untuk menjilid.{nl}

column2: We will connect short ones to make a long string for the binding.
column3: 짤막한 것들을 한데 이어서 긴 제본용 끈으로 뭉치는 거죠.
column4: Mengumpulkan benda yang pendek lalu menyambungnya menjadi Strap panjang untuk menjilid.

column2: I've learned the binding from Orsha long time ago.{nl}But, the task is too much with my own power.
column3: 제본은 예전에 오르샤에서 배웠죠.{nl}하지만 제 힘으론 그 작업은 무리더라고요.
column4: Penjilidan telah dipelajari di Orsha dulu.{nl} Tetapi mustahil untuk melakukan pekerjaan itu hanya dengan kekuatanku saja.

column2: Ah! What should I do? what should I do..{nl}Without it, I won't know if I am a Nestos or Anastos.{nl}
column3: 아! 어떡하지? 어떡해야해..{nl}그게 없으면 내가 네스토스인지 아나스토스인지 어디 누구의 시정잡배인지 누가 어떻게 알아.{nl}
column4: Ah! Bagaimana ya? Harus bagaimana..{nl} Jika tidak ada benda itu, bagaimana aku dapat mengetahui Nestos atau anastos, atau dimana dan siapa yang merupakan kumpulan preman.{nl}

column2: I am done. done.{nl}Since the pilgrim is over, I am trying to go to Pasaka Canyon, but I've done it again.{nl}Ahah.. I don't want to do this..
column3: 난 망했어. 망했다고.{nl}순례가 끝났으니 파사카 협곡으로 가려고 했는데 또 저질러 버렸어.{nl}아아.. 다 때려치고 싶다..
column4: Aku bangkrut. Bangkrut.{nl}Karena perjalanan ziarah telah selesai, aku bermaksud pergi ke Fasika Plateau tetapi aku membuat kesalahan.{nl}Ahhh..ingin kupukul semua rasanya..

column2: Yes? Ah, I didn't know you were there. I am sorry.{nl}I am now. Ah.. too desperate.{nl}
column3: 네? 아, 거기 계신줄도 몰랐어요. 죄송해요.{nl}제가 지금. 아.. 정말 절망적이거든요.{nl}
column4: Ya? Ah, Aku tidak tahu kalau ada disana. Maaf ya.{nl} Sekarang saya. Ah.. Sungguh putus asa sekali.{nl}

column2: My luggage is gone.{nl}In fact what's inside are potato dumplings, books and etc, but the sign of Nestos.{nl}
column3: 제 짐이 사라졌어요.{nl}사실 안에 든 건 감자만두랑, 책이랑 뭐 별건 아닌데, 네스토스 표식말이에요.{nl}
column4: Barang bawaanku telah hilang.{nl} Sebenarnya yang kubawa adalah Potato Dumpling, Buku, dan bukanlah sesuatu yang penting, yaitu Nestos Sign.{nl}

column2: Ah.. really. The sign of Nestos is most important.{nl}That is so important to me.. I am sure the monsters have taken it.
column3: 아.. 그래요. 네스토스 표식이 제일 중요하단 말예요.{nl}제가 그걸 얼마나 아꼈는데.. 분명 몬스터가 가져갔겠죠?
column4: Ah.. begitu. Nestos Sign adalah yang paling penting sebenarnya.{nl} Aku sungguh menjaganya dengan berhato-hati.. Pastinya dibawa pergi oleh monster kan?

column2: What should I do..{nl}How would I see the faces of Nestospa..
column3: 어쩌지..{nl}네스토스파 선생님들 얼굴을 무슨 낯으로 본담..
column4: Bagaimana ini..{nl} Bagaimana aku bisa menatap wajar dari para guru Nestospa..

column2: That's it!{nl}Wow, you've collected all of them!{nl}
column3: 그거예요!{nl}와, 다 모아 주셨군요!{nl}
column4: Itu dia!{nl}Wah, semuanya telah terkumpul ya!{nl}

column2: How can I pay for this?{nl}
column3: 이 은혜를 어떻게 갚죠?{nl}
column4: Bagaimana caranya aku membayar hutang budi ini?{nl}

column2: I was talking gibberish right?{nl}I am so sorry. I was too desperate so I wanted to give up on everything.{nl}
column3: 아깐 제가 너무 횡설수설했었죠.{nl}정말 미안해요. 진짜 다 그만두고 싶을 만큼 절망적이였거든요.{nl}
column4: Tadi saya terlalu bingung loh.{nl}Sungguh maaf sekali. Tadi itu benar-benar putus asa, sampai ingin berhenti rasanya.{nl}

column2: This sign is like a sacred object to us.{nl}This is the symbol that we gained lots of diverse knowledge and passed many ordeals.{nl}
column3: 이 표식은 저희에겐 성물과도 같은 거에요.{nl}수 많은 지식을 쌓고 시련을 통과했다는 인정을 받았다는 증표거든요.{nl}
column4: Tanda ini sama seperti benda suci bagi kami.{nl} Ini adalah bukti bahwa kami telah mendapatkan pengakuan berhasil melewati latihan dan menumpuk ilmu yang banyak sekali.{nl}

column2: We should go back.{nl}We won't lose it again right?{nl}
column3: 이젠 가봐야겠어요.{nl}설마 또 잃어버리진 않겠죠.{nl}
column4: Sekarang aku harus pergi.{nl} Tidak mungkin jika sampai kehilangannya lagi kan.{nl}

column2: Ah...{nl}Antanas and Gierda keeps them well, but I don't undertand why I am losing them so often.{nl}I think I possess some secret power that pulls monsters..{nl}
column3: 아, 정말이지..{nl}안타나스 아저씨나 기에드라는 잘 간수하고 있던데, 왜 저는 이렇게 잘 잃어버릴까요.{nl}뭔가 몬스터를 끌어당기는 힘이라도 있는 걸까..{nl}
column4: Ah, Sungguh..{nl}Pasti paman Antanas atau Giedra sedang merawatnya dengan baik, Kenapa saya mudah kehilangannya ya.{nl} Apakah aku memiliki kekuatan untuk memancing monster untuk datang..{nl}

column2: Anyways, I will go to Pasaka Canyon now where the masters are present!{nl}Thank you so much!
column3: 어쨌든 이젠 선생님들이 계신 파사카 협곡으로 갈래요!{nl}정말 감사했습니다!
column4: Bagaimanapun sekarang aku mau pergi ke Fasika Plateau, tempat dimana para guru berada!{nl}Sungguh terima kasih banyak!

column2: In order to collect the sacred power, we should possess some necessary tools.{nl}As you can see, I am not a priest who has been training for a long time.{nl}
column3: 성스러운 힘을 모으려면 그 만한 장비가 따라줘야 한다오.{nl}보다시피 난 오랜 수행을 쌓은 성직자는 아니니 말이오.{nl}
column4: Jika ingin mengumpulkan kekuatan suci, maka harus diikuti dengan equipment yang layak.{nl} Seperti yang dilihat, saya adalah buka orang suci yang telah menumpuk performa sejak lama.{nl}

column2: I've ordered some special hammer and chisel. {nl}Since the due date has reached, can you get me those?
column3: 내가 오르샤의 대장장이에게 특별한 망치와 정을 주문해 두었소.{nl}약속 날짜가 다 되었으니 그걸 좀 찾아와 줄 수 있겠소?
column4: Aku telah memesan Special Hammer dan Chisel kepada Blacksmith Orsha.{nl} Karena waktu yang dijanjikan telah tiba, bisakah kau pergi untuk mengambilnya?

column2: Normal tools won't work.{nl}If they work, I wouldn't have asked for your help.
column3: 보통 도구론 절대 안 되오.{nl}그게 되었으면 자네 도움을 빌릴 필요는 없었겠지.
column4: Bagaimanapun tidak dapat melakukannya dengan peralatan biasa.{nl} Kalau bisa menggunakan yang biasa, maka aku tidak perlu meminjam kemampuanmu bukan.

column2: Did Antanas send you?{nl}His orders are too difficult..{nl}
column3: 안타나스씨가 보내서 온 건가?{nl}어휴, 그 아저씨 어찌나 주문이 까다로운지..{nl}
column4: Kau datang karena Antanas mengirimkanmu?{nl}Fyuhh, paman itu sungguh memberikan pesanan yang merepotkan..{nl}

column2: Other blacksmiths would have problem fulfilling his orders.{nl}Here is the hammer. Are you going to engrave the sacred spell into it?
column3: 나니까 그 주문을 받은 거야.{nl}자. 여기 망치. 신성한 주문을 새길 건가 보지?
column4: Kalau bukan aku, sepertinya pesanan itu tidak akan diterima.{nl}Nah. Ini Hammer. Seperti terukirkan mantara sihir suci bukan?

column2: Chisel?{nl}I don't sell chisels so I've asked someone else to prepare for him.{nl}
column3: 정?{nl}아아. 그건 그 아저씨 주문에 도저히 맞출 수가 없는 부분이 있어서 따로 맡겼어.{nl}
column4: Chisel?{nl}Ahhh. Karena entah kenapa terdapat bagian yang tidak dapat dicocokan pada pesanan paman itu, akhirnya kutitipkan pada orang lainnya.{nl}

column2: Go meet Yula.{nl}She works at the equipment shop.
column3: 율라를 찾아가 봐.{nl}그 아이는 장비 상점에서 일하고 있어.
column4: Cobalah pergi mencari Jura.{nl} Ia bekerja di Equipment Shop.

column2: See you again later.{nl}You are going to repair your equipment here from now on right?
column3: 나중에 또 봐.{nl}앞으로 수리는 꼭 여기서 하실거죠, 손님?
column4: Sampai bertemu lagi nanti.{nl} Kau akan terus melakukan perbaikan di  tempat ini bukan?

column2: Welcome!{nl}The best equipment shop in Orsha!{nl}
column3: 어서 오세요! {nl}오르샤 제일의 장비 상점입니다!{nl}
column4: Selamat datang! {nl} Ini adalah toko Equipment terbaik di Orsha!{nl}

column2: Chisel?{nl}Are you talking about the chisel which Illanai has given to you?{nl}
column3: 정이요?{nl}아, 일라나이 언니가 맡긴 것 말씀이신가요?{nl}
column4: Chisel?{nl} ah, maksudmu benda yang dititipkan oleh Ilannye?{nl}

column2: Good. Receive it.{nl}I guess your religious belief in the goddesses is strong.
column3: 자, 받으세요.{nl}이런 걸 주문하신 걸 보면 여신의 신앙이 돈독하신 모양이시네요.
column4: Ini, Terimalah.{nl} Jika melihat pesanan yang seperti ini, sepertinya memiliki kepercayaan kuat akan Goddess ya.

column2: Yula has the chisel.{nl}She works at the equipment shop.
column3: 정은 내가 아니라 율라에게 맡겨 두었다구.{nl}장비 상점에서 점원으로 일하고 있어.
column4: Yang mengerjakan Chisel bukanlah aku, tetapi kutitipkan kepada Jura.{nl} Ia sedang bekerja di toko Equipment sebagai asisten.

column2: Oh, you've made it well according to the order.{nl}Now, I guess I can get to work.
column3: 오, 주문대로 정말 잘 만들어 왔구먼.{nl}이제 일을 시작할 수 있겠어.
column4: Oh, hasilnya bagus sesuai dengan pesanan ya.{nl} Sekarang aku dapat melakukan pekerjaan.

column2: Do you still have things to order?{nl}You can just take a look around so please visit here often.
column3: 앗, 또 주문하실 것이 있으신가요?{nl}구경만 하셔도 좋으니까 자주 찾아 주세요.
column4: Ah, apakah ada yang lainnya yang ingin dipesan?{nl} Seringlah mampir walaupun hanya melihat-lihat saja.

column2: Have you found the chisel?{nl}I welcome orders like this so please keep visit our shop.
column3: 정은 찾은 거야?{nl}앞으로도 이런 주문은 환영하니까 잘 부탁해.
column4: Kau telah mengambil Chisel?{nl} Ke depannya jika kamu mau memesan yang seperti ini, silahkan datang lagi.

column2: What do you think?{nl}Why don't you help us if you think eliminating demons is important even if our objectives are different from each other.
column3: 당신은 어떻게 생각하세요?{nl}뜻은 달라도 마족을 뿌리뽑는 게 중요하다 생각하시면 저희를 도와주시는 건 어떠신지요.
column4: Bagaimana menurut anda?{nl} Walau artinya berbeda, bagaimana jika kamu membantu kami untuk menghabisi para demon sampai ke akarnya.

column2: First of all, there are many polluted tombstones.{nl}I will break these so I want you to break the polluted tombstone at Usas Hill.{nl}
column3: 우선 오염된 비석은 한 두개가 아니에요.{nl}저는 이걸 부숴버릴 테니, 당신은 우사스 언덕에 있는 오염된 비석을 파괴해 주세요.{nl}
column4: Pertama-tama Monumen yang terpolusi, bukan hanya satu atau dua buah saja.{nl} Karena aku akan menghancurkan yang ini, Kamu tolong pergi dan hancurkan monumen terpolusi yang ada di Usas Hill.{nl}

column2: I think that tombstone is also spurting out the red energies.{nl}Like the tombstone beside. That's the proof of the pollution.
column3: 아마 그 비석도 붉은 기운을 뿜어 내고 있을 겁니다.{nl}옆에 있는 비석처럼요. 오염의 증거이지요.
column4: Mungkin juga Monumen itu sedang mengeluarkan energi yang berwarna merah.{nl} Seperti monumen yang ada di sebelah. Bukti dari polusi.

column2: I can't understand.{nl}Albinas? Are you the member of the Anastos?{nl}That doesn't make sense?{nl}
column3: 기도 안 차는구먼.{nl}알비나스? 아나스토스 파의 일원이라고? {nl}그럴리가 없는데?{nl}
column4: Berdoa tidak bisa kusuk rupanya.{nl}Albinas? Anggota dari Anastospa katamu? {nl} Tidak mungkin begitu kan?{nl}

column2: I'm not saying I know everyone from the Anastospa...{nl}But we used to be part of the same Order so I know them well.{nl}
column3: 내가 아나스토스파의 모든 사람을 아는 건 아니지만..{nl}같은 교단 사람인지라 그들과는 원래 잘 아는 사이란 말이오.{nl}
column4: Walaupun aku tidak mengetahui seluruh orang dari Anastospa..{nl} tetapi karena orang dalam sesama komunitas, saling mengenal satu sama lain.{nl}

column2: No way, bring him here at once! {nl}I'll have to hear from him myself!
column3: 안되겠어, 당장 그 사람을 데려오시오! {nl}내 직접 확인해야겠어!
column4: Ah tidak memungkinkan, Segera bawalah orang itu! {nl} Aku akan memeriksanya secara langsung!

column2: When you have enough stones, go see Eduinas at the Nestospa camp.{nl}He'll use them to make stones for construction.{nl}
column3: 적당한 석재를 구해서 네스토스파의 캠프에 있는 에뒤나스에게 찾아가시오.{nl}그가 복구용 석재로 다듬어 줄 거요.{nl}
column4: Carilah material batu secukupnya, lalu pergilah kepada Edwinas yang ada di Camp Nestospa.{nl} Ia akan memperbaikinya dengan dengan menggunakan material batu untuk pemulihan.{nl}

column2: Eduinas won't be happy if he finds out you made this tombstone, though.{nl}Just keep that in mind if you want to take responsibility.
column3: 하지만 당신이 비석을 이렇게 만들었다는 걸 알면 에뒤나스가 길길이 날뛰겠지.{nl}책임을 지려면 그 정도는 감수해야 할 게요.
column4: Tetapi jika Edwinas tahu bahwa kamu telah membuat monumen jadi seperti ini, pasti ia akan sangat marah.{nl} Jika ingin bertanggung jawab, maka harus menanggung hal itu.

column2: While I am polishing up the materials, I don't want to see your face.{nl}How about defeating the monsters that make the place around here messy.
column3: 자재를 다듬을 동안만이라도 당신 얼굴은 보고싶지 않네요.{nl}이 주변을 어지럽히는 몬스터나 정리해 주시던가요.
column4: Aku tidak ingin melihat wajahmu selama memoles material.{nl} Tolong pergilah menghabisi monster yang mengganggu di sekitar sini.

column2: Since everything is done, go back to Damijonas with this.{nl}Do not ever do it again.
column3: 다 됐으니 이걸 가지고 다미요나스에게 돌아가 보세요.{nl}이젠 다시는, 절대로 그러지 마세요.
column4: Karena semua sudah beres maka bawalah ini, dan kembalilah kepada Damiyonas.{nl} Sekarang jangan pernah lakukan itu lagi.

column2: You've obtained it. Now, I will start the recovery.{nl}It is fortunate that the damage wasn't severe.
column3: 구해 왔군. 이제 복구를 시작하겠소.{nl}파손 정도가 심하지 않아서 이 정도로 끝난 게 다행이군.
column4: Kau telah datang membawakan rupanya. Sekarang akan kumulai pekerjaan pemulihan.{nl} Sungguh beruntung karena kerusakannya masih bisa diperbaiki.

column2: We and the Anastospa have different opinions, but we are not hostile to each other.{nl}Ever since the unknown name came out, it's apparent that we suspect it.{nl}
column3: 우리와 아나스토스파와는 그저 의견이 좀 다를 뿐이지 서로를 적대시하던가 하는 일은 없소.{nl}그런데 알지도 못하는 이름이 튀어나오니 의심하는 것이 당연하지 않겠소?{nl}
column4: Kami dan Anastopa hanya memiliki sedikit pendapat yang berbeda kan, tetapi kami tidak bermusuhan satu sama lainnya.{nl}Tetapi karena mendadak muncul suatu nama yang tidak diketahui, apakah tidak mencurigakan.{nl}

column2: And you even broke the tombstone.{nl}Anyways, since you've done your responsibility, I will forgive you.{nl}
column3: 게다가 힘들게 세운 비석을 부숴버렸으니 말이오.{nl}어쨌든 책임을 졌으니 일단 이 정도로 용서하겠소.{nl}
column4: Ditambah lagi monumen yang telah didirikan dengan susah payah, dihancurkan.{nl}Bagaimanapun karena telah bertanggung jawab, kalau begitu bisa dimaafkan.{nl}

column2: Don't you feel it's unfair to just let it go?{nl}Since there's a camp of Anastospa up there, go there and ask.{nl}It's really strange.
column3: 자네도 이대로 넘어가기엔 억울하지 않소?{nl}저 위에 아나스토스파의 캠프가 있었으니 한 번 가서 물어나 보시오.{nl}정말 이상해..
column4: Kau juga jika melewatkannya begitu saja, terasa tidak adil bukan.{nl} Karena di atas sana terdapat Anaastopa Camp, cobalah pergi kesana dan bertanya.{nl} Sungguh aneh..

column2: Yes, I am Anastos'... yes that's right.{nl}What brought you here?{nl}
column3: 예, 제가 아나스토스의.. 맞습니다.{nl}뭘 물어보러 오셨다고요?{nl}
column4: Ya, Saya adalah.. benar.{nl}Apa yang ingin kamu tanyakan?{nl}

column2: Sorry, I can't answer your questions at the moment since I am too busy at the moment..{nl}If you can find my research documents, I may get some spare time...
column3: 아이고, 지금 제가 정신이 없어서 뭐든 물어보셔도 답해 드리기가 좀..{nl}제 연구 자료를 되찾아 주시면 여유가 생길지도..
column4: Aduh, saat ini aku sedang pusing, sehingga sepertinya sulit untuk menjawab pertanyaan apapun..{nl} Jika mendapatkan kembali material penelitian yang sedang saya cari, entah apakah Aku akan lebih luang atau tidak…

column2: Instead of blind devotion, a life of eliminating demons and preparing for chaos..{nl}I mean those kind of things.{nl}
column3: 여신만을 향한 맹목적인 신앙 보다는 마족 퇴치, 재앙에 대비하는 삶.. {nl}그런 것들 위주로 말이에요.{nl}
column4: Dibandingkan kepercayaan membabi buta hanya pada Goddess saja, hidup mempersiapkan bencana, pembantaian demon…{nl} Atas dasar hal itu maka aku berkata harus keluar.{nl}

column2: This is truly strange.{nl}I should send one of my colleagues to find it out.
column3: 이건 확실히 이상해요. {nl}동료를 보내서 알아 볼 필요가 있겠어요.
column4: Sungguh aneh.{nl} Hal ini perlu dicek dengan mengirimkan orang.{nl}

column2: Ah, by the way, I am thinking about giving him a flare to prepare for any danger, but{nl}There aren't any adequate flares.{nl}
column3: 아 그런데, 혹시 모를 위험에 대비해서 신호탄을 들려 보낼 건데요.{nl}적당한 게 없네요.{nl}
column4: Ah tetapi, Untuk menpersiapkan bahaya yang tidak diketahui seharusnya membawa Flare ini.{nl} Tidak ada yang layak ya.{nl}

column2: Can you get us the powders that burn well in the fire?{nl}There are so many monsters around so it won't be hard to obtain the materials.
column3: 불에 잘 타는 가루를 구해 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}몬스터들은 언제나 들끓으니까, 재료를 구하는 것은 어렵지 않을 거예요.
column4: Tolong carikanlah bubuk yang mudah terbakar pada api.{nl}Karena para monster bisa berkerumun kapanpun, maka tidaklah sulit untuk mencari material itu.

column2: Let's wait for the investigation results.{nl}He is a competant lad so he will find it out soon.
column3: 이제 조사 결과를 기다려보죠.{nl}유능한 친구이니 금방 알아올 거예요.
column4: Sekarang harus menunggu hasil dari penyelidikan.{nl}Karena ia adalah teman yang pandai, sebentar saja pasti dapat mengetahuinya.

column2: Since we can't just stand still, how about we find it out ourselves as well?{nl}
column3: 그 동안 가만히 있기 뭐하니 우리도 따로 알아보도록 할까요?{nl}
column4: Karena selama ini hanya diam saja, kami juga mencari tahu sendirian.{nl}

column2: Good. Barte may have seen something.{nl}He recently joined our camp.{nl}
column3: 그렇지. 바르테라면 뭔가 본 게 있을 지도 몰라요.{nl}우리 캠프에 합류한 지 얼마 안되었거든요.{nl}
column4: Begitu ya. Entah apakah Barete mengetahui sesuatu atau tidak.{nl} Karena baru bergabung pada camp kami belum berapa lama.{nl}

column2: How about you ask her about Albinas?{nl}
column3: 그녀에게 알비나스라는 사람에 대해 물어보고 오시면 어떨까요?{nl}
column4: Bagaimana jika bertanya mengenai orang yang bernama Albinas kepadanya?{nl}

column2: Albinas?{nl}I saw someone with the apperances like your explanations near Majiva Grave Field.{nl}
column3: 알비나스요?{nl}음.. 당신이 말한 인상착의와 비슷한 사람을 마지바 묘지에서 보긴 했어요.{nl}
column4: Albinas?{nl}Emm.. Aku pernah melihat orang yang seperti kamu bicarakan di Majiva Grave Field.{nl}

column2: When you go back to Majiva Grave Field, that leather may be still there.{nl}I... even if the goddesses tell me to go, I can't since I am too scared.
column3: 마지바 묘지에 다시 가면 그 가죽이 남아 있을지도 몰라요.{nl}전.. 여신께서 가라 하셔도 무서워서 도저히 못가겠네요.
column4: Jika pergi lagi ke Majiva Grave Field, entah apakah kulit itu masih tersisa atau tidak.{nl} Walaupun Goddess menyuruhku pergipun… aku tidak dapat pergi karena terlalu ketakutan.

column2: What's the matter?{nl}I can't think anyone who would use that pattern except for the servant of Vaiga.{nl}
column3: 도대체 이게 무슨 일이죠?{nl}저런 문양을 쓰는 건 바이가의 하수인 말곤 생각할 수 없어요.{nl}
column4: Omong-omong ada urusan apa ya?{nl} Sepertinya hanya anak buah dari Vaiga yang menggunakan pola seperti itu.{nl}

column2: We better let other people know this fast.{nl}You let Gedas know!{nl}
column3: 이건 빨리 사람들에게 알려야 할 것 같아요.{nl}당신은 게다스에게 알려주세요!{nl}
column4: Ini sepertinya harus segera diberitahukan kepada orang-orang.{nl}Tolong beritahukan kepada Gedas!{nl}

column2: Please, save Fabijus!{nl}Ah, before that, we better go back to Nestospa!{nl}
column3: 제발, 파비유스를 구해 주세요!{nl}아, 그 전에 네스토스파에게 들르는 게 좋겠어요!{nl}
column4: Kumohon, Selamatkanlah Fabius!{nl}Ah, sungguh baik jika sebelumnya mampir kepada Nestospa!{nl}

column2: This holy water, please take it.{nl}You will get at least one chance of using it on the demons.{nl}
column3: 여기 성수, 이걸 가져가세요.{nl}한 번 정도는 마족에게 크게 본때를 보일 수 있을 겁니다.
column4: Ini bawalah Holy Water.{nl} Dengan ini kau dalam memberi pelajaran kepada Demon.

column2: So you were safe.{nl}I've heard about Albinas from Fabijus.{nl}
column3: 무사하셨군요.{nl}알비나스라는 사람, 아니 그 마족의 정체는 파비유스에게 들었습니다.{nl}
column4: Telah melakukannya dengan baik ya.{nl}Orang yang bernama Albinas, maksudnya identtias demon itu telah kduengar dari Fabius.{nl}

column2: Do you think that makes sense?{nl}You broke the well working tombstone and you are saying there is no tombstone?{nl}
column3: 그걸 지금 말이라고 하는 게요?{nl}멀쩡한 비석을 맘대로 부수고 이제와서 뭐? 없다고?{nl}
column4: Apa yang barusan dikatakan?{nl} Sudah menghancurkan monumen yang bagus begitu saja, dan sekarang? Tidak ada katanya?{nl}

column2: What do you want me to say?{nl}I have a headache due to the tombstone so don't talk to me.
column3: 뭘 더 말하라는 게요?{nl}비석 때문에 머리가 아프니 더 이상 말 걸지 마시오.
column4: Apa yang suruh dibicarakan lagi?{nl} Kepalaku pusing akibat monumen, maka dari itu janganlah berkata-kata lagi.

column2: It is so fortunate that the divine water I gave to you was helpful.{nl}It gives me goose bumps to think that the demons are within humans and alienate.{nl}
column3: 아, 제가 드린 성수가 도움이 되었다니 정말 다행이에요.{nl}이젠 하다하다 마족이 사람 틈에 섞여서 이간질까지 하다니 정말 소름돋아요.{nl}
column4: Ah, untunglah holy water yang kuberikan dapat berguna.{nl} Sekarang demon bercampur dan menyamar menjadi manusia, lalu memprovokasi kita satu sama lain, sungguh membuat merinding.{nl}

column2: Can you tell Damijonas about this?{nl}I think they must be protecting the broken tombstone near Usas Hill.
column3: 다미요나스에게도 이 사실을 알려주시겠어요?{nl}아마 아직도 우사스 언덕에서 부서진 비석을 지키고 있을 겁니다.
column4: Maukah kamu memberitahukan kebenaran ini pada Damiyonas?{nl} Mungkin ia masih sedang menjagai monumen yang hancur di Usas Hill.

column2: I was able to protect the conspiracy of the demons because of you.{nl}I thought we may have been seperated.
column3: 당신 덕분에 마족의 음모를 막을 수 있었습니다.{nl}하마터면 저희들끼리 정말 영영 갈라설 뻔 했어요.
column4: Berkat anda, kita berhasil menghalangi rencana konspirasi Demon.{nl} Hampir saja kami semua terpisah untuk selamanya.

column2: Oh. That's right.{nl}Is there anything you found out about Albinas?{nl}
column3: 오, 그래. {nl}알비나스란 자에 대해 알아온 게 있소?{nl}
column4: Oh, begitu. {nl} ada yang kau ketahui mengenai orang yang bernama Albinas?{nl}

column2: I am sure there are people who fell into their alienating.{nl}They are trying to break them from inside...{nl}
column3: 분명 우리 말고도 이런 이간질에 넘어간 사람들이 있을 게요.{nl}힘으로 눌러찍는 것 뿐만 아니라 속에서부터 점점 무너뜨리려는 게지..{nl}
column4: Pasti selain kita, pasti ada orang-orang yang berbuat nakal.{nl}Bukan hanya menekan dengan menggunakan kekuatan, tetapi menghancurkan secara perlahan dari dalam kan..{nl}

column2: Anyways, thank you.{nl}I hope the goddesses bless you.
column3: 어쨌든 시작은 사고였지만, 정말 고마웠소.{nl}여신의 가호를 빌겠소.
column4: Bagaimanapun, permulaannya adalah suatu kecelakaan, tetapi sungguh terima kasih.{nl} Semoga berkat Goddess bersamamu.

column2: Albinas has disappeared! What's going on?
column3: 알비나스가 사라졌다! 무슨 일이지?
column4: Albinas menghilang! Apakah yang terjadi?

column2: What, Are you interested in the revelation?{nl}But, there arent anything besides those writings...{nl}
column3: 어라, 너 계시에 관심이 있는 거야?{nl}하지만 저 글귀 외엔 별다른 내용은 없는걸..{nl}
column4: Datanglah, Kau tertarik pada Revelation?{nl} Tetapi disini tidak ada cerita yang berhubungan dengan hal itu..{nl}

column2: I will tell you slowly so please first get the eggs of green infroholders.
column3: 차례차례 일러 줄 터이니 일단 초록 인프로홀더의 알을 가져오게.
column4: Karena akan kuberitahukan tahap demi tahap, maka bawalah Green Infro Holder Egg kemari.

column2: The eggs of this green infroholder represent the power to bind the souls.{nl}Now, we need to substantiate it.
column3: 이 초록 인프로홀더의 알은 영혼을 구속하는 힘이네.{nl}이제 이걸 실체화할 것이 필요하지.
column4: Green Infroholder Egg ini memiliki kekuatan mengikat jiwa.{nl} Sekarang membutuhkan realisasi hal ini.

column2: Don't think of it as unpleasant. {nl}This is the best I can do for now.
column3: 꺼림칙한 방법이라 생각하지 말게. {nl}지금으로선 내가 자네를 도울 수 있는 최선의 방법이니까.
column4: Berhenti berpikir kalau ini adalah metode yang buruk. Ini adalah metode terbaik yang bisa saya pikirkan untuk membantu Kamu saat ini.

column2: First, you bring their attention as Eminent tells you to.{nl}At the same time, let's activate the magic circle at Paramiso Battle Field in secret with me.
column3: 우선 넌 에미넌트가 시키는 대로 해서 시선을 끌어.{nl}동시에 몰래 나랑 파라미조 격전지에서 마법진을 활성화 시키자.
column4: Pertama, kau lakukanlah sesuai perintah Eminent, dan alihkan perhatiannya.{nl}Pada saat bersamaan mari kita aktifkan Magic Circle diam-diam.

column2: Hey!{nl}Please help me.
column3: 이보시오!{nl}제발 날 좀 도와주시오.
column4: Lihatlah kemari!{nl} Tolong bantulah aku.

column2: My friends are being attacked by the demons!
column3: 내 친구들이 마족들에게 공격 받고 있소!
column4: Teman-temanku mendapat serangan dari para Demon!

column2: Please save my friends from the demons. I beg you.
column3: 마족에게서 내 친구들을 구해주시오. 부탁하오.
column4: Tolong selamatkanlah teman-temanku dari Demon. Mohon bantuannya.

column2: If you were not there, we would have killed brutally by now.
column3: 당신이 없었다면 우린 끔직하게 살해 당했을거예요.
column4: Jika tidak ada anda, maka kami pasti sudah terbunuh dengan mengenaskan.

column2: At AA village.{nl}He is hiding, but the demons would find him quickly.
column3: AA 마을에 있소.{nl}숨어있긴 하지만 마족들이 금방 찾아낼 같소.
column4: Ada di AA Village.{nl} Walaupun sedang bersembunyi, sepertinya akan ditemukan oleh para demon dalam sekejap.

column2: Thank you for helping us. I am Rose. We are merchants who go various places to sell the goods.
column3: 저흴 도와주셔서 감사합니다. 저는 로제라고 해요. 저희들은 이곳 저곳을 돌아다니면서 물건을 사고 파는 행상인들이죠.
column4: Terima kasih telah membantu kami. Nama saya adalah Rose. Kami adalah para pedagang yang berkelana kesana kemari untuk menjual dan membeli benda.

column2: We've decided to sell the goods to XX village which is my hometown and visited XX village.
column3: 저희들은 제의 고향인 XX 마을에 물건을 사고 팔기로 결정을 했고 XX 마을에 방문했습니다.
column4: Kami memutuskan untuk menjual dan beli barang dari desa kami yaitu XX, sehingga berkunjung pada desa XX.

column2: But, there were no one in the village. There were really no one to think about they've gone to pick up the brackens.{nl}Therefore, we looked around various places to look for the villagers and ran away here after being attacked by the demons.
column3: 하지만 마을엔 사람은 없었어요. 고사리를 캐러 갔다고 생각하기엔 마을엔 아무도 없었습니다.{nl}그래서 저희는 마을 사람들을 찾기 위해서 마을 곳곳을 둘러보다가 마족에게 습격을 받아 이곳까지 도망쳤죠.
column4: Tetapi di desa tidak ada orang sama sekali. Disini terlalu tidak ada orang jika mereka pergi untuk mengambil Bracken.{nl} Maka dari itu kami kabur sampai ke tempat ini karena mendapat serangan dari demon ketika sedang berkeliling di desa, untuk mencari orang-orang desa.

column2: While running away, we've got seperated from our colleagues. It is important to find whereabouts of the villagers, but I am more worried whether my colleagues weren't attacked by the demons.
column3: 도망을 치는 과정에서 동료과 흩어졌습니다. 마을 사람들의 행방도 중요하지만 동료들이 마족에게 공격은 안 당했는지 걱정입니다.
column4: Ketika sedang melarikan diri, saya terpisah dengan kawan-kawan. Jejak keberadaan orang-orang desa memang penting, tetapi saya khawatir jika kawan-kawan diserang oleh para Demon.

column2: Are you really helping us?{nl}I guess the goddess hasn't abondoned us yet. It's not common these days which a competent person like you help someone who needs help.
column3: 정말로 도와주시는 겁니까?{nl}여신은 아직 저희를 버리지 않으셨나봅니다. 요즘 같은 세상에 당신같이 실력 있는 사람이 도움을 필요로 한 사람을 돕는 일은 드물죠.
column4: Apakah kamu benar mau membantu?{nl} Goddess sepertinya belum melupakan kami. Sungguh langka orang yang berkemampuan, mau membantu sesamanya yang kesulitan belakangan ini.

column2: We better use the olfactory sense of Rash. But, while Rash was running away from the demons, it consumed lots of stamina
column3: 라쉬의 후각을 이용하면 될 것 같아요. 하지만 라쉬가 마족에게 도망치는 과정에서 체력을 많이 소진됐습니다.
column4: Sepertinya bisa melakukan dengan menggunakan penciuman Lashias. Tetapi Lashias telah kelelahan ketika melarikan diri dari Demon.

column2: If we recover Rash's stamina, it will be easy to find our colleagues.
column3: 라쉬의 체력을 회복만 시키면 동료를 찾는 일은 쉬울거예요.
column4: Jika memulihkan stamina Lashias, maka akan mudah untuk melakukan pencarian kawan-kawan.

column2: This is the potion to recover stamina.{nl}I will give it to Rash.
column3: 체력 회복 물약이군요.{nl}라쉬에게 먹여보도록 하겠습니다.
column4: Stamina Recovery Potion.{nl} Akan kuberikan kepada Lashias.

column2: Due to the potion you gave to me, Rash recovered its stamina fast.
column3: 제게 주신 체력 회복 물약 덕분에 라쉬가 금방 체력을 회복했습니다.
column4: Berkat Stamina Recovery Potion yang diberikan kepadaku, stamina Lashias telah pulih dalam sekejap.

column2: I am going to make Rash to smell the odor that is coming out from the goods of my colleagues. Rash will guide you to the place where our colleagues are.
column3: 라쉬에게 제 동료들의 물품에서 나는 냄새를 맡게 할 겁니다. 냄새를 맡은 라쉬가 제 동료들이 있는 곳으로 인도해 줄겁니다.
column4: Aku akan membuat Lashias mengendus bau temen-temanku melalui barang mereka. Lashias yang mengendus bau itu, akan mengarahkan kamu ke tempat teman-teman saya berada.

column2: If Rash starts to wander around, let it smell the odor from the good I've handed over to you.
column3: 라쉬가 헤매는 모습이 보인다면 제가 드린 물품에서 나는 냄새를 맡게 해주세요.
column4: Jika lashias terlihat berkeliling tanpa arah, maka buatlah ia mengendus kembali benda-benda temanku yang saya berikan.

column2: I will pray so that my colleagues are safe.
column3: 동료들이 무사하길 빌어야겠습니다.
column4: Kudoakan agar teman-teman selamat.

column2: How did you know I am here?
column3: 내가 여기 있는건 어떻게 알았습니까?
column4: Bagaimana kamu tahu bahwa keberadaanku disini?

column2: How did Rash come here..{nl}Who are you and how have you come here with Rash?
column3: 라쉬가 어떻게 여기까지..{nl}당신이 누구시길래 라쉬랑 함께 제가 있는 곳으로 오셨습니까?
column4: Bagaimana lashias bisa sampai kesini..{nl}Siapakah anda, bagaimana bisa datang ke tempatku berada bersama dengan Lashias?

column2: I was able to encounter with my colleagues because of you.{nl}Thank you so much.
column3: 덕분에 다신 못 볼 줄 알았던 제 동료들과 재회하게 됐습니다.{nl}정말 감사합니다.
column4: Kukira tidak dapat bertemu mereka lagi, berkat kamu kami semua kembali dipertemukan.{nl} Terima kasih banyak.

column2: Now, le'ts chase the whereabouts of XX villagers.
column3: 이제 XX 마을 사람들의 행방을 추적하러 가시죠.
column4: Sekarang tolong pergilah mencari jejak keberadaan orang-orang desa XX.

column2: I was too busy running away from the demons so I could not think about my luggages well. There are many goods that can be sold at expensive prices in the luggage. If we go out of the village, the demons would definitely run at me and attack me.
column3: 마족에게 도망치는데 급급하다 보니 막상 제 짐엔 신경을 못썼습니다. 짐 안에는 비싼 값에 팔릴 만한 것들도 있죠. 마을 밖으로 나가면 분명 마족들이 득달같이 달려와 절 공격할 거 같습니다.
column4: Karena aku melarikan diri secara tergesa-gesa dari Demon, sehingga tidak memperhatikan barang bawaanku. Di dalamnya terdapat barang-barang berharga yang mahal jika dijual. Kalau saya pergi keluar desa, pasti para demon akan datang mengejar dan menyerangku.

column2: Can you look for the luggage on behalf of me?
column3: 제 대신 짐을 찾아주시겠습니까?
column4: Maukah kamu mencarikan barang bawaanku?

column2: What happened to my luggage?
column3: 제 짐은 어떻게 됐나요?
column4: Bagaimana dengan barang bawaanku?

column2: You've found my luggage.{nl}Thank you so much for finding my luggage.
column3: 짐을 찾아오셨군요.{nl}짐을 찾아 주셔서 정말 고맙습니다.
column4: Kamu telah menemukan barang bawaanku rupanya.{nl} Terima kasih banyak telah menemukan barang bawaanku.

column2: You saved us from the demons. Even so, we can't guarantee that we are now safe from the demons.
column3: 당신이 마족에게 당할 뻔한 우릴 구해주셨습니다. 그렇다고 해서 마족에게서 안전하다고 장담할 수 있는건 아닌거 같군요.
column4: Kamu telah menyelamatkan kami yang hampir dihabisi oleh demon. Walau begitu tidak ada jaminannya bahwa kami telah aman dari Demon.

column2: There are also Beast-type monsters around AA village other than the demons so it looks more dangerous.
column3: AA 마을 주변엔 마족 말고도 야생 몬스터들도 있으니 더 위험한거 같습니다.
column4: Karena di sekitar desa AA banyak monster liar selain Demon, seperginya lebih berbahaya.

column2: I can't stay here since it's too unstable. Can you defeat the demons and the beast monsters around AA village?
column3: 너무 불안해서 여기 못있겠어요. AA 마을 주변에 있는 마족과 야생 몬스터를 처치해주시겠습니까?
column4: Kami tidak dapat berada disini karena merasa tidak nyaman. Maukah kamu menghabisi monster liar dan demon yang ada di sekitar desa AA?

column2: I guess I should think about doing other jobs.
column3: 오늘 일로 해서 다른 일을 생각해봐야겠네요.
column4: Harus memikirkan pekerjaan lainnya, karena pekerjaan hari ini sudah dilakukan.

column2: The demons and the beast monsters are still wandering around, but I am relieved a bit since at least they are not close enough to come to the village.
column3: 마족과 야생 몬스터들은 여전히 돌아니지만 적어도 이 마을로 들어올 정도 가까이에 있진 않아 조금이나마 안심이 됩니다.
column4: Walau demon dan Monster liar masi tetap berkeliaran, tetapi karena mereka tidak berada di dekat desa saat ini, sekarang kami sudah bisa merasa sedikit lebih tenang.

column2: Herbalist Tails
column3: 약초꾼 테일스
column4: Herbalist Tails

column2: I was attacked by the demons while picking up the herbs. Fortunately, I saved my life, but I got hut a lot.
column3: 약초를 캐다가 마족에게 공격 받았습니다. 다행히 마족에게서 도망쳐 목숨은 부지했지만 많은 상처를 입었습니다.
column4: Ketika sedang mengumpulkan Herb, saya mendapat serangan dari Demon. Untungnya saya berhasil melarikan diri dan selamat dari Demon, tetapi banyak mengalami luka.

column2: Please pick up the herbs that can cure the wounds. I think I may be better off if I get it on.
column3: 상처를 치유할 수 있는 약초를 캐주세요. 그걸 바르면 좀 나아질거 같습니다.
column4: Tolong ambilkan Herb yang dapat menyembuhkan luka. Kalau mengoleskannya pada luka, maka akan sedikit membaik.

column2: I want to go pick up the herbs myself, but it hurts a lot whenever I move.
column3: 제가 직접 약초를 구하러 가고 싶어도 상처가 심해 움직일 때마다 너무 아픕니다.
column4: Walaupun saya ingin pergi mencari Herb langsung, karena terluka terlalu parah maka setiap bergerak sakit rasanya.

column2: Have you obtained the herbs?
column3: 약초는 구해오셨나요?
column4: Apakah kamu telah mendapatkan Herb?

column2: Please give to me.
column3: 제게 어서 주세요.
column4: Cepat berikan kepada saya.

column2: The pain still remains even after rubbing the herb on the wound area.
column3: 약초를 상처 부위에 발라도 고통이 여전합니다.
column4: Walaupun mengoleskan herb di atas luka, rasa sakit tetap sama.

column2: It seems that I am addicted to the poison that is being used by the demons.
column3: 마족이 사용하는 독에 중독된거 같아요.
column4: Sepertinya telah keracunan oleh racun yang dipakai Demon.

column2: It hurts a lot on the wound areas and I have hard time breathing..{nl}When you tell my symptoms to
column3: 상처가 있는 부위엔 고통이 심하고 숨쉬기가 조금씩 힘듭니다.{nl}오르샤에 계신 클레릭 서브 마스터님에게 제 증상을 말씀드리면 금방 도와주시지 않을까요?
column4: Rasa sakit akan bagian atas luka sangat parah, sehingga sulit untuk bernapas.{nl} Cobalah bicara kepada Cleric Sub Master yang ada di Orsha mengenai gejala ini?

column2: It is the deadly poison. We don't have enough time. I will give you the medicine so please give to the patient fast.
column3: 치명적인 독입니다. 일분 일초가 급합니다. 제가 약을 드릴테니 빨리 환자에게 가 약을 먹이세요.
column4: Racun yang mematikan. Setiap detiknya berpengaruh. Cepat berikan kepada pasien obat yang kuberikan ini.

column2: Due to the medicine, I have less pain and I can breathe well.{nl}Thank you.
column3: 약 덕분에 고통이 덜하고 숨쉬기가 한결 편해졌습니다.{nl}감사합니다.
column4: Berkat obat itu, rasa sakit sudah mulai berkurang dan dapat bernapas dengan mudah.{nl} Terima kasih.

column2: Let's check what happened at the village to find out whereabouts of the villagers.{nl}I want you to check A, B and C districts.
column3: 마을에 무슨 일이 있었는지 확인해 마을 사람들의 행방을 찾아보죠.{nl}당신은 a지역하고 b지역, c지역을 확인해주세요.
column4: Mari coba temukan jejak keberadaan orang-orang desa dengan memeriksa apa yang telah terjadi di desa.{nl} Kamu pergilah memeriksa area a dan area b, lalu area c.

column2: I'll have a look in other places.
column3: 전 다른 장소를 확인해볼게요.
column4: Aku akan memeriksa ke tempat lainnya.

column2: Have you found any clues to to find the whereabouts of the villagers?
column3: 마을 사람들의 행방 쫓는데 도움이 될만한 단서를 발견하셨나요?
column4: Apakah kamu telah menemukan klue yang berguna untuk mencari jejak keberadaan dari orang-orang desa?

column2: I've checked the footsteps of the demons in the village. I am sure the demons have intruded into the village. There are no corpses and the house looks normal so the demons are not planning to steal.
column3: 전 마을 안에서 마족의 발자국 같은걸 확인했어요. 아무래도 마족이 마을에 침입을 했어요. 사람 시체가 없고 집안의 멀쩡한 걸로 봐선 마족은 약탈이 목적이 아닌거 같아요.
column4: Saya telah memeriksa sesuatu yang seperti jejak kaki para demon di dalam Desa. Bagaimanapun demon telah memasuki desa. Sepertinya tujuan mereka bukanlah melakukan looting, karena tidak ada mayat dan di dalam rumah barang-barang pun masih rapi.

column2: Then, why and what for, demons took the villagers?
column3: 그렇다면 마족은 왜, 무엇때문에 마을 사람을 데리고 갔을까요?
column4: Kalau begitu kenapa demon membawa pergi para penduduk desa? Karena apa?

column2: There. The marble of Polki. As I arrived the village, I saw the marble of Polki dropped on the ground.
column3: 저기! 폴키의 구슬이 또 있어요. 제가 마을에 막 도착했을 때에도 폴키의 구슬이 떨어져 있었던 걸 봤어요.
column4: Disana! Ada Polki Bead lagi. Ketika saya baru tiba di desa pun, saya melihat Polki Bead sedang terjatuh.

column2: The marble of Polki can be an important clue to look for the villagers.
column3: 폴키의 구슬이 마을 사람을 찾는데 중요한 단서가 되지 않을까요?
column4: Mungkinkah Polki Bead bisa menjadi klue yang penting untuk menemukan penduduk desa?

column2: Let's look for the marble of Polki.
column3: 폴키의 구슬을 찾아보죠.
column4: Cobalah mencari Polki Bead.

column2: I can't see the marble of Polki anymore.
column3: 폴키의 구슬이 더 이상 보이지 않아요.
column4: Tidak terlihat lagi Polki Bead.

column2: I think Polki dropped the marble, but we can't just find it.{nl}Let's look around.
column3: 폴키가 구슬을 떨어드렸는데 우리가 못찾은걸거예요.{nl}주변을 찾아보죠.
column4: Polki telah menyebarkan Bead, kita mungkin tidak bisa menemukannya.{nl} Cobalah cari di sekitar.

column2: I am sure Polki dropped the marble around here.
column3: 분명히 폴키는 이 주변에 구슬을 떨어놓았을 거예요.
column4: Jelas sekali Polki telah menaruh Bead di sekitar sini.

column2: XX Villager
column3: XX 마을 주민
column4: Penduduk desa XX

column2: W-who... are you!
column3: 다... 당신 누구야!
column4: Anda.. Kamu siapa!

column2: A-are you... on the same side with the demons?
column3: 다.. 당신도 마족하고 한편 아니야?
column4: Apakah.. Kamu juga di pihak demon?

column2: Oh goddess! Thank you.
column3: 오 여신이시여! 감사합니다.
column4: Oh Goddess rupanya! Terima kasih.

column2: If it wasn't you, we would all have died.
column3: 당신이 아니였으면 분명 우리 모두 죽었을거예요.
column4: Jika bukan karena anda, kami semua mungkin sudah mati.

column2: Demons told us that they are going to use the braken and use us as the source of the divine tree! We should just look for someone who is qualified.
column3: 마족이 고사리를 이용해서 우릴 신수의 양분으로 만드고 했어! 적합자만 준비 되면 된다고 했어.
column4: Demon menggunakan Bracken dan bermaksud membuat kami sebagai pupuk untuk Medzio Diena! Semuanya sudah hampir selesai dipersiapkan.

column2: Demons intruded into the village and took the people away.
column3: 마족이 마을에 침입해서 사람들을 모두 끌고 갔어.
column4: Demon telah menyerbu masuk desa, dan membawa pergi seluruh orang-orang.

column2: Demons were taking the villagers and heading towards the monastery. Demons stopped while taking us for a long time and then wizards appeared.
column3: 마족은 마을 주민을 데리고 수도원으로 향하는 중이였지. 마족이 우릴 한참을 끌려가던 중 멈춰섰고 마법사가 나타났어.
column4: Demon membawa para penduduk desa dan sedang mengarah ke Monastery. Para  yangdemon sedang membawa kami, mendadak berhenti lalu muncul seorang Magician.

column2: The wizard has done some unidentified ritual to the villagers.{nl}When he did the ritual to the villagers, there weren't any unique responses, but I was able to see the response when we did the ritual to your brother, Edmundas.
column3: 마법사는 마을 주민에게서 정체를 알 수 없는 의식을 진행했어.{nl}마을 사람에게 의식을 진행했을 때 별 반응이 없었는데 로제 너의 오빠, 에드문다스에게 의식을 진행하니 반응이 보였어.
column4: Magician itu melakukan ritual yang tidak diketahui apakah itu kepada para penduduk desa.{nl}마을 사람에게 의식을 진행했을 때 별 반응이 없었는데 로제 너의 오빠, 에드문다스에게 의식을 진행하니 반응이 보였어.

column2: The wizard ordered the demons to take Edmundas seperately.
column3: 마법사는 마족에게 에드문다스만 따로 데려가라는 지시를 했어.
column4: Magician memerintahkan kepada Demon untuk membawa Edmundas secara terpisah.

column2: The wizard threatened us. We've told the wizard that Edmundas has sister who is you.{nl}And I also described your appearances.
column3: 마법사는 우릴 협박했어. 우린 마법사에게 에드문다스에겐 여동생 로제, 네가 있다는 사실을 알려줬어.{nl}그리고 로제 너의 생김새 등을 말해줬어.
column4: Magician mengancam kami. Kami memberitahukan kepada memberitahukan tentang keberadaan anda, adik perempuan Rose.{nl} Lalu kami telah memberitahukan rupa anda, Rose.

column2: After hearing the information about you, the wizard told us that
column3: 마법사는 로제, 너의 정보를 듣고 나선 우리에게
column4: Setelah Magician mendengar informasi mengenai kamu dan Rose

column2: Kruvina is already prepared and the giant brackens
column3: 크루비나는 이미 준비됐고 거대 고사리들은 곧 죽음의 포자를 내뿜을 것이다.
column4: berkata kepada kami, bahwa Kruvina telah selesai bersiap dan Giant Bracken akan segera menyebarkan Spora kematian

column2: would soon spurt out the spores of the death.
column3: 라고 말을 했어.
column4: katanya.

column2: And he continued,
column3: 그가 이어서 말하길
column4: Jika mengurutkan perkataannya,

column2: if someone with the qualifications are ready, all humans will die.
column3: 적합자만 준비된다면 너희들은 물론이고 인간들 모두가 죽을 것이다. 영혼은 신수의 양분으로 쓰겠다.
column4: Jika waktu bersiap telah selesai, maka sudah pasti seluruh manusia dan kalian akan mati. Jiwa yang ada akan dipakai sebagai gizi dan pupuk untuk Medzion Diena.

column2: Your spirits will be used as sources for the divine trees.
column3: 라는 말을 했어.
column4: katanya.

column2: After hearing the words from the wizard, I ran away to let the lord of Orsha know it.
column3: 난 마법사의 말을 듣고 빨리 오르샤 영주에게 알려야겠다 싶어 기회를 노려서 도망을 쳤어.
column4: Setelah aku mendengar perkataan magician, lalu aku kabur mencari kesempatan untuk memberitahukan bangsawan Orsha segera.

column2: Let's go to the monastery fast
column3: 어서 수도원으로 가죠.
column4: Cepat pergilah ke Monastery.

column2: Herbalist Ash
column3: 약초꾼 아스
column4: Herbalist Ash

column2: While I was picking up the herbs, the demons appeared and attacked me. Fortunately, I ran away, but I am scared whether the demon would attack me again.
column3: 약초를 캐다가 마족이 나타나 절 공격했어요. 다행히 도망은 쳤지만 마족이 또 절 공격할까 두렵네요.
column4: Ketika sedang mencari Herb, para demon muncul dan menyerangku. Untungnya aku berhasil melarikan diri, tetapi aku takut akan mendapat serangan demon lagi.

column2: Starting from a few months ago, the demon started to appear at Knidos Forest.
column3: 요 몇 달전 부터 마족이 크니도스 숲에 나타나기 시작했어요.
column4: Sejak beberapa bulan lalu, Demon mulai muncul di Knidos Jungle.

column2: Because of you, the place seems to be stabilized a bit.
column3: 덕분에 지역이 좀 안정된거 같네요.
column4: Berkat kamu area ini kembali stabil ya.

column2: As I was moving around to pick up the herbs, it was my first time to see the demons picking up the grass. I am not sure whether or not the demons are plotting something. I guess I should check which grass they are picking up.
column3: 제가 약초를 캐러다니면서 마족이 풀을 채취하는 모습은 생전 처음 봤어요. 마족이 뭔가 일을 꾸미는거 찜찜하네요. 마족이 무슨 풀을 채취하는지 확인해봐야겠어요.
column4: Ini pertama kalinya aku melihat demon yang mengumpulkan rumput, ketika aku sedang memetik herb. Sepertinya demon itu sedang merencanakan sesuatu. Aku harus memeriksa rumput apa yang dikumpulkan oleh para demon itu.

column2: Have you checked what grass did the demons extract?
column3: 마족이 무슨 풀을 채취하는지 확인하셨나요?
column4: Apakah kau telah memeriksa rumput apa yang dikumpulkan oleh Demon?

column2: As I expected. {nl}The demons are actually extracting the herbs that are highly toxic.
column3: 역시 제 예상이 맞았어요. {nl}마족은 독성이 강한 약초를 캐고 있었어요.
column4: Sudah kuduga perkiraanku itu benar. {nl} Demon sedang mengumpulkan herb yang memiliki racun kuat.

column2: If we process this herb further, it would become a deadly poison to humans. It is so certain that the demons are extracting these herbs. I guess I should do something so that the demons would not be able to pick up the herbs. I will sprinkle the body fluid of the monsters to kill the herbs.
column3: 이 약초를 가공하면 사람에게 치명적인 독이 돼요. 이 약초를 마족이 채취한다는 것은 불 보듯 뻔해요. 마족이 약초를 채취하지 못하도록 조치를 취해야겠어요. 몬스터의 체액을 뿌려서 약초를 죽여야겠어요.
column4: Jika berhasil mengolah herb ini, maka akan menjadi racun yang sangat mematikan bagi manusia. Sungguh kebetulan sekali dapat melihat demon yang mengumpulkan herb ini. Kita harus bertindak agar para demon tidak dapat mengumpulkan Herb ini. Kita harus mematikan Herb ini dengan menuangkan cairan tubuh monster.

column2: I won't let the demons do what they want to do.
column3: 절대 마족이 원하는대로 하게 두진 않을거예요.
column4: Pastinya aku tidak akan tinggal diam melihat para demon melakukan rencananya.

column2: This would be enough.
column3: 이정도 양이면 충분해요.
column4: Jika jumlahnya segini banyak, sepertinya cukup.

column2: Sprinkle the body fluid of the monsters onto the herbs
column3: 약초에다 몬스터의 체액을 뿌리세요.
column4: Sebarkanlah cairan tubuh monster ini pada Herb.

column2: Sprinkle the body fluid of the monsters onto the place where there are herbs.
column3: 약초 있는 곳에 몬스터의 체액을 뿌리세요.
column4: Tebarkanlah cairan tubuh monster di tempat Herb berada.

column2: Since there are no more herbs, the demons would not be able to pick up the herbs anymore.
column3: 약초가 없으니 마족은 더 이상 약초를 캐지 못할거예요.
column4: Karena sudah tidak ada Herb, maka demon sudah tidak dapat mengumpulkan Herb lagi.

column2: You guys should be punished according to kingdom orders in principle.{nl}But, since you've saved our lives and many of our collegues have failed..{nl}
column3: 원칙적으론 당신들은 왕명에 의해 처벌 받아야 합니다.{nl}하지만 목숨을 구해주신데다가 많은 동료들이 낙오되었으니..{nl}
column4: Secara teori, kalian semua harus mendapatkan hukuman atas nama raja.{nl} Tetapi ketika sedang menyelamatkan nyawa mereka, banyak kawan-kawan yang tertinggal..{nl}

column2: The safety of our colleagues comes first instead of your punishment.{nl}If you could help me retrieving the headquarter, then I will not ask you why you've entered here.
column3: 당신들의 처벌보단 동료들의 안전이 우선입니다.{nl}주둔지를 다시 탈환하는 걸 도와 주신다면 여기에 들어온 이유도 묻지 않고 눈감아 드리죠.
column4: Sekarang yang paling penting adalah keselamatan kawan-kawanku, dibandingkan hukuman kalian.{nl} Jika kamu bisa membantuku merebut markas, maka aku tidak akan bertanya kenapa kamu ada di sini.

column2: You don't look like a settler, where are you coming from?
column3: 보아하니 이주민은 아닌 거 같은데 어떻게 오시는 길입니까?
column4: Tampaknya bukan Imigran, bagaimana bisa datang kemari?

column2: {nl}Ahha! You are the one who came with the elder.{nl}To meet the elder, you better go to the camp fast.{nl}When a person comes out from Orsha, he would go meet the lord.{nl}
column3: {nl}아하! 촌장님과 함께 오셨던 분이시군요.{nl}촌장님을 만나시려면 빨리 캠프지역으로 가보시는 게 좋을 겁니다.{nl}곧 오르샤에서 사람이 나오면 영주님을 뵈러간다고 하셨거든요.{nl}
column4: {nl}Aha! Rupanya orang yang datang bersama dengan mayor.{nl} Jika ingin bertemu dengan Mayor, maka alangkah baiknya coba pergi ke Camp Area secepatnya.{nl} Jika segera muncul orang dari Orsha, maka berkata akan pergi menemui tuan bangsawan loh.{nl}

column2: You don't look like a settler.. Are you a traveler?{nl}There was an order from the lord for the settlers at the west district of Orsha to wait at Lemprasa Pond.{nl}When they come this far, the lord told us that he would send the soldiers and the officiers, but{nl}I can't see any people like them.
column3: 이주민은 아닌거 같은데 여행자 이십니까?{nl}오르샤 서쪽 지역의 이주민들은 렘파라사 연못에서 대기하라는 영주님의 명령이 있었습니다.{nl}여기까지 오면 영주님이 병사들과 관리들을 보내서 도와주신다고 하셨는 데{nl}그런 사람들은 보이지 않는 군요..
column4: Sepertinya kamu bukan Imigran, apakah petualang?{nl} Para imigran di area barat Orsha, mendapat perintah untuk menunggu di Lemprasa  Pond.{nl} Jika datang sampai kesini, seharusnya tuan bangsawan berkata membantu dengan mengirimkan pasukan dan para asisten{nl} Tetapi tidak terlihat seorang pun..

column2: {nl}I am waiting for my friends so please go to the 2nd district and meet Bropen.{nl}He will tell you where Romanis has gone to.
column3: {nl}저는 동료를 기다리는 중이니 2번 지역으로 가셔서 브로펜을 만나보십시오.{nl}그가 로마나스 촌장님이 어디로 갔는지 알려줄 겁니다.
