column4: Karena tidak ada efek bagi tuan Savior jika menciumnya, maka janganlah khawatir.{nl} Karena telah kubuat agar memiliki efek hanya pada Ferret saja.

column2: Here's the scent.{nl}Let's see now... About the ferrets...{nl}
column3: 자, 향은 완성이예요. {nl}그리고 보자.. 페릿들은 아마.. {nl}
column4: Nah, Wewangian telah selesai. {nl} Coba lihat.. Mungkin para Ferret.. {nl}

column2: There are a few ferret hideouts around the Balais Highway and the Zelbe Shelter.{nl}That's probably where they're keeping the girl.{nl}
column3: 바라이스 가도 근처와 젤베 쉼터에 페릿들의 근거지가 몇 군데 있어요.{nl}아마 페릿들은 거기로 소녀를 데리고 가지 않았을까 싶어요.{nl}
column4: pada Varais Gado dan Zelbe Shelter terdapat markas Ferret dan beberapa tempat lainnya.{nl} Mungkin para Ferret membawa gadis itu kesana.{nl}

column2: When you find the girl, throw the scent pouch I gave you.{nl}When the ferrets react to it, take the girl and come back!{nl}
column3: 소녀를 발견하시거든 제가 드린 향 주머니를 바로 던져 터뜨리세요. {nl}페릿들이 정신을 못 차리는 사이에 소녀를 데리고 빠져나오시는 거예요!{nl}
column4: Jika menemukan gadis itu, segeralah lempar kantong wewangian yang kuberikan. {nl}para Ferrets membawa gadis tersebut cepat tolong dia!!{nl}

column2: Here...
column3: 이거..
column4: Ini..

column2: I hope my words can reach you...{nl}I am Laima, goddess of destiny and premonition.{nl}
column3: 이 전언이 부디 당신에게 닿길 바라면서..{nl}저는 운명과 예지의 여신인 라이마라고 합니다.{nl}
column4: Pesan ini kuharap untuk disampaikan padamu..{nl} Aku adalah Goddess Laima, Goddess dari Takdir dan Ramalan .{nl}

column2: Before Medzio Diena, the goddesses lost much of their power.{nl}Because of this, Goddess Lada, unable to resist, was taken away by Demon Lord Zaura.{nl}
column3: 신수의 날이 도래하면서 여신들은 대부분의 힘을 잃고 말았습니다.{nl}그 때문에 라다 여신은 마군주 자우라에게 반항할 기력도 없이 납치되고 말았지요.{nl}
column4: Ketika hari Medzio Diena datang, sebagian besar para Goddess kehilangan kekuatannya.{nl} Karena itu Goddess Lada diculik oleh Demon Lord Zaura tanpa bisa melakukan perlawanan apapun.{nl}

column2: Zaura is using the life force of Goddess Lada to create an evil contraption called Kruvina.{nl}The same Kruvina to which countless lives were sacrificed in Castlefield.{nl}
column3: 자우라는 라다 여신의 생명력으로 크루비나라는 사악한 것을 만들고 있습니다.{nl}캐슬필드에서 수 많은 인명을 제물삼아 만들었던 그 크루비나를 말입니다.{nl}
column4: Zaura sedang membuat sesuatu yang jahat bernama Kruvina dengan menggunakan vitalitas Goddess Lada.{nl} Kruvina dibuat dengan mengorbankan nyawa yang banyak di Castlefield.{nl}

column2: The evil energy of Kruvina can make objects grow.{nl}Depending on how it is used, it can enhance the power of the demons, too.{nl}
column3: 크루비나는 사악한 힘으로 모든 것을 거대하게 만듭니다.{nl}하지만 쓰임에 따라서는 마족의 힘을 강대하게 만들어 주기도 하지요.{nl}
column4: Kruvina membuat semuanya menjadi raksasa dengan kekuatan jahat.{nl} Tetapi tergantung pemakaiannya, ia juga dapat membuat kekuatan Iblis menjadi lebih kuat.{nl}

column2: By the time I had a vision of this horrible future, it was too late to do anything.{nl}That's why... I sent a young girl to meet you.{nl}
column3: 제가 이 끔찍한 미래를 보았을 때에는 이미 아무것도 할 수 없었습니다.{nl}그러기에.. 당신에게 제 의지를 담은 소녀를 보낸 것입니다.{nl}
column4: Ketika saya telah melihat masa depan yang menyeramkan, tiada hal apapun yang dapat dilakukan.{nl}Maka itu.. Kukirimkan gadis yang menyimpan keinginan saya kepada anda.{nl}

column2: Only one person can free this forest from the calamity that fell upon it...{nl}A savior among the Revelators. You.{nl}
column3: 이 숲에 드리운 재앙을 걷어 낼 수 있는 이는.. {nl}계시자 중에서도 오직 구원자인 당신 뿐입니다.{nl}
column4: Untuk bisa membereskan bencana yang turun di hutan ini.. {nl} Diantara para Savior hanya kamu lah satu-satunya penyelamat.{nl}

column2: Take this orb...{nl}Goddess Lada is being held captive at the Seir Rainforest. Please, rescue her and stop the demons' plans...
column3: 이 보주를 가져가세요..{nl}부디 세이르 숲에 붙잡혀 있는 라다 여신을 구하고 마족의 계획을 막아주세요..
column4: Bawalah catatan tambahan ini..{nl} Tolong selamatkan Goddess Lada yang tertangkap di Seir Rainforest dan halangilah rencana para demon..

column2: An outsider...? Hm, you'll have to do.{nl}Hey, um... will you give me a hand?{nl}
column3: 이런.. 외지인이지만, 어쩔 수 없지.{nl}이봐, 나 좀 도와줄 수 있을까?{nl}
column4: Ini.. Orang luar, tetapi tidak ada pilihan lain.{nl} Lihat ini, bisakah kau membantuku sedikit?{nl}

column2: I'm trying to figure out why the ferrets are siding with the demons.{nl}So I found a way to turn into one and talk to them.{nl}
column3: 난 페릿이 마족 편에 동조하는 이유를 찾고 있어.{nl}뭐, 연구하다 보니 페릿으로 변신해서 대화할 수 있는 방법도 알아냈지.{nl}
column4: Aku sedang mencari alasan para Ferret berada di pihak Demon.{nl} Yah, aku telah mendapatkan cara untuk berbicara pada Ferret, dengan melakukan transformasi.{nl}

column2: Thing is, they've seen me too many times already.{nl}Even when I turn into a ferret, they recognize my smell and start attacking me.{nl}
column3: 문제는 내가 그 이전부터 페릿과 너무 자주 접촉했다는 거야.{nl}내 냄새를 기억하는지 페릿으로 변신해도 날 알아채고 공격하더라고.{nl}
column4: Masalahnya, aku sejak sebelum itu terlalu sering bertemu dengan Ferret.{nl} Karena mereka mengingat bauku walaupun melakukan transformasi, mereka akan  tahu dan menyerangku.{nl}

column2: If that's okay with you, will you turn into a ferret and snoop around for me?{nl}
column3: 괜찮다면 내 대신 페릿으로 변신해서 녀석들의 속셈을 알아봐 줄 수 있을까?{nl}
column4: Jika boleh, maukah kamu menggantikanku untuk mencari tahu rencana mereka dengan bertransformasi sebagai Feret?{nl}

column2: I'm going to make a transformation scroll from the information we collect.{nl}Write everything down. You can't act too awkward as a ferret.
column3: 관찰한 내용을 기본으로 페릿 변신 주문서를 만들 거야.{nl}그러니 최대한 상세하게 적어 줘. 변신해도 어색하지 않도록 말이지.
column4: Aku akan membuat Ferret Transformation Scroll dengan dasar hasil pengamatan Ferret.{nl} Maka itu tuliskan selengkap dan maksimal mungkin. Agar ketika melakukan transformasi tidak mencolok.

column2: Your observations are pretty detailed.{nl}You should be ready to transform now. Hold on.
column3: 자세하게 잘 관찰해 왔네.{nl}이 정도면 변신해도 큰 문제 없겠어. 잠시만.
column4: Kau telah melakukan pengamatan dengan detil ya.{nl}Jika melakukan trasnformasi dengan ini, sepertinya tidak akan ada masalah besar. Sebentar ya.

column2: Here you go.{nl}The transformation scroll is ready.{nl}
column3: 자. 여기. {nl}페릿 변신 주문서가 완성되었어.{nl}
column4: Nah. Ini. {nl} Ferret Transformation Scroll telah selesai.{nl}

column2: From your observations I don't think you'll be awkward at all.{nl}I trust that you'll be comfortable talking to the ferrets.{nl}
column3: 네가 워낙 관찰을 꼼꼼히 해줘서 전혀 어색하진 않을 거야.{nl}아마 페릿 부족과 대화도 자연스럽게 할 수 있을거라 믿어.{nl}
column4: Karena kau telah melakukan pengamatan dengan baik, maka penyamaran ini tidak akan mencolok sama sekali.{nl} Mungkin ketika berbicara dengan kepala suku Ferret pun , akan dipercayai secara natural.{nl}

column1: 아마 페릿 부족과 자연스럽게 대화도 가능할겁니다. {nl}페릿 부족과 대화해서 페릿이 마족 편에 동조하고 있는 이유를 알아봐 주세요.
column4: 드루이드 베네스

column2: See if you can find out why the ferrets are siding with the demons.{nl}Don't forget to turn into a ferret first with the scroll.
column3: 페릿이 왜 마족 편에 서고 있는 지 이유를 알아봐 줘.{nl}그 전에 변신 주문서로 먼저 변신하는 걸 잊지 말고.
column4: Tolong carilah tahu alasan mengapa Ferret berada di pihak Demon.{nl} Sebelumnya jangan lupa untuk melakukan transformasi dengan Scroll terlebih dahulu.

column2: If the scroll wears out in front of the ferrets they'll come at you, so be careful.
column3: 페릿 앞에서 변신이 풀리면 페릿들이 한꺼번에 덤벼들 수도 있으니 조심해.
column4: Berhati-hatilah jika melepaskan transformasi di depan Ferret, kamu dapat dikeroyok oleh para Ferret secara bersamaan.

column2: Hm? So what you're saying is...{nl}The ferrets are helping the demons on purpose?{nl}
column3: 응? 그 말대로라면.. {nl}페릿이 자발적으로 마족을 돕고 있다는 얘긴가?{nl}
column4: Hmm? Kalau begitu.. {nl} Ferret secara sukarela membantu demon maksudnya?{nl}

column2: How does...{nl}I can't believe it!
column3: 그럴 수가.. {nl}믿을 수 없어!
column4: Bisa begitu.. {nl}Tak dapat dipercaya!

column2: Did the ferrets really say that?{nl}I know you have no reason to lie, but still...{nl}
column3: 페릿이 정말 그렇게 말한 거야?{nl}아, 물론 네가 거짓말을 할 이유는 없겠지만..{nl}
column4: Ferret sungguh berbicara seperti itu?{nl}Ah, tentu saja tidak ada alasan kamu untuk berbohong, tetapi..{nl}

column2: I really can't believe it, though.{nl}The ferrets have always been nothing but friendly.{nl}
column3: 하지만 도저히 믿을 수가 없어.{nl}페릿 부족은 원랜 엄청 온순한 녀석들이었단 말야.{nl}
column4: Tetapi entah kenapa hal tersebut tidak dapat dipercaya.{nl} Kepala suku Ferret adalah mahluk yang sangat ramah awalnya.{nl}

column2: I need to see if they at least still feel some compassion to humans.{nl}I'll try and enchant a piece of wood to look like someone injured.{nl}
column3: 안되겠어. 적어도 사람에게 동정심이라도 남아있는지 알아봐야겠어.{nl}내가 주술로 나무토막을 부상당한 사람 모습으로 변신시켜 볼게.{nl}
column4: Tidak bisa. Walau sedikit, kita harus mencari tahu apakah mereka masih memiliki rasa simpati pada manusia atau tidak.{nl} Aku akan mengubah potongan kayu menjadi seperti orang yang terluka dengan ilmuku.{nl}

column2: The wood is going to look like someone who's hurt to whoever looks at it.{nl}Place it close to the ferrets and see if they attack.
column3: 내 주술은 확실하니까 누구에게나 부상당한 사람 모습으로 보일 거야.{nl}이걸 페릿 주변에 놔 두고 페릿이 공격을 하는지 지켜 봐줘.
column4: Karena ilmuku ini ampuh, maka ia akan terlihat seperti orang yang terluka oleh siapapun juga.{nl} Taruhlah ini di sekitar Ferret, dan cobalah amati apakah Ferret menyerangnya atau tidak.

column2: Will they attack someone if they're injured? {nl}Nah... If they do, it's even more serious than I thought...
column3: 설마 부상당한 사람까지 공격하겠어?{nl}아냐.. 만약 공격한다면 정말 위험한 상태인데..
column4: Tak mungkin mereka juga menyerang orang yang terluka?{nl}tidak.. Kalau sampai menyerang, sungguh situasi berbahaya ya..

column2: They really attacked the piece of wood?{nl}That's a bad sign. It means they're attacking anyone and everyone...
column3: 정말 페릿이 주술 걸린 나무토막을 공격했어?{nl}큰일이네. 페릿이 무차별로 사람을 공격한다는 뜻이니까..
column4: Apakah benar Ferret menyerang batang kayu yang kusihir?{nl}Masalah besar ini. Karena itu berarti Ferret menyerang orang tanpa pandang bulu.

column2: There's no doubt after this experiment.{nl}The ferrets are very, very dangerous now.{nl}
column3: 이번 실험으로 확실해졌어.{nl}지금 상태의 페릿은 정말 위험해.{nl}
column4: Dengan percobaan kali ini, semuanya telah menjadi jelas.{nl} Ferret dalam keadaan sekarang sungguh berbahaya.{nl}

column2: Still, there's no way I can fight all those ferrets.{nl}The most I can do is chase away the ones closest to the village.{nl}
column3: 그렇다고 저 많은 페릿과 싸울 순 없어.{nl}하다못해 마을 사람들 근처에 있는 페릿이라도 쫓아내야겠지.{nl}
column4: Maka dari itu, saya tidak dapat bertarung melawan banyak Ferret.{nl} Walau begitu saya harus mengusir para Ferret yang ada di sekitar orang-orang.{nl}

column1: 하지만 당장 페릿을 어떻게 할 수가 없으니 쫓아내기라도 해야겠어요.{nl}저에게 페릿들이 싫어하는 지독한 향이 있어요.{nl}모닥불을 피워두고 지독한 향을 태우면 페릿들이 냄새를 맡고 도망갈겁니다.{nl}사람한테도 조금.. 고약한 냄새지만 참고 부탁드리겠습니다..
column4: 드루이드 베네스

column2: There's a type of strong scent that ferrets hate.{nl}If we make a fire and burn this scent, that should keep the ferrets away.{nl}
column3: 나에게 페릿들이 싫어하는 지독한 향이 있어.{nl}모닥불을 피워서 그 향을 태우면 페릿들이 냄새를 맡고 도망갈 거야.{nl}
column4: Aku memiliki wewangian yang tidak disukai oleh para Ferret.{nl} Jika membakar wewangian itu pada Bonfire, maka para Ferret akan kabur begitu menciumnya.{nl}

column2: Would you spread the scent around the Bellai Forest Workshop?{nl}It smells a bit... foul, but please do me this favor.
column3: 이 향을 벨라이 숲 작업장 근처에 피워주곘어?{nl}사람에게도 조금.. 고약한 냄새지만 참고 부탁할게.
column4: Mau kah kamu menyebarkan scent di Bellai Forest Workshop?{nl}Sedikit  tidak memengenakkan…tapi tolong bantu aku.

column2: I should make more of the scent.{nl}In case the effect wears out.
column3: 향을 더 많이 만들어둬야겠어.{nl}언제 향의 효과가 떨어질 지 모르니까.
column4: Aku harus membuat scent lebih banyak lagi.{nl}Jaga-jaga jika efeknya habis.

column2: Thanks.{nl}I don't think the ferrets are going to go near the workshop now.{nl}
column3: 고마워. {nl}이제 한동안 페릿들이 작업장 근처에는 얼씬도 못 할 거야.{nl}
column4: Terima Kasih.{nl}Kukira Farrets tidak akan menuju Workshop sekarang.{nl}

column2: It makes me mad to think the ferrets are using the scent thanks to the demons' dirty tricks.{nl}I should talk to Widas when I go back.{nl}
column3: 마족들의 더러운 술수 때문에 페릿에게 지독한 향을 쓰게 되다니 정말 속상해.{nl}마을로 돌아가면 위다스씨랑 좀 상의해 봐야겠어.{nl}
column4: Sangat mengecewakan melihat Ferrets menggunakan Scent berterimakasih untuk tipuan demon.{nl}Aku harus memberitahukan pada Widas saat aku kembali.{nl}

column2: But I still think there has to be a way to make the ferrets go back to normal.{nl}R-right...?
column3: 어떻게든 페릿들을 예전 상태로 되돌릴 방법이 있을 거야.{nl}정말.. 그럴 수 있겠지?
column4: Tapi aku mesih yakin pasti ada jalan untuk membuat Ferret menjadi normal kembali.{nl}Benar…?

column2: You...{nl}You've finally saved me.{nl}
column3: 그대는.. {nl}드디어 그대가 절 구해 주셨군요.{nl}
column4: Kamu telah…{nl}Akhirnya kamu menyelamatkan ku.{nl}

column2: When Laima entrusted this forest to me...{nl}She said it would be consumed by a wave of calamity.{nl}
column3: 라이마가 제게 이 숲을 부탁할 때.. {nl}재앙의 파도가 이 숲을 덮칠 것이라 하였어요.{nl}
column4: Saat Laima mempecayakan hutan ini padaku…{nl}Dia mengatakan akan terjadi bencana.{nl}

column2: And, she said, after the wave has washed away, I would meet you.{nl}The one holding the light of salvation...{nl}
column3: 그리고 그 파도의 끝에서 그대를 만날 것이라고도 하였지요.{nl}구원의 빛을 안고서..{nl}
column4: Dan, dia berkata, setelah bencana berlalu, aku akan menemukan mu.{nl}Seorang yang memegang cahaya keselamatan…{nl}

column2: You are the one, the Revelator who will save our world...{nl}I have hope that it will be you now.
column3: 그대는 계시자 가운데서도 이 세계를 구할 구원자..{nl}이제야 겨우 그대라는 희망을 만날 수 있게 되었습니다.
column4: Kamulah satu-satunya, yang akan menyelamatkan dunia…{nl}Aku mempunyai harapan dan harapan itu adalah kamu.

column2: The reason behind the red water flowing in this forest and the contaminated crops...{nl}The plan to grow a giant bracken and spread the death spores...{nl}
column3: 이 숲을 흐르는 물이 붉게 물들고 모든 과실이 거대해진 원흉..{nl}그리고 고사리를 거대화시켜 죽음의 포자를 퍼뜨리려던 계획..{nl}
column4: Alasan dibalik air merah yang mengalir di hutan ini dan menkontaminasi hasil panen…{nl}Bertujuan untuk menciptakan Giant Bracken dan menyebarkan Death Spores…{nl}

column2: All of that was possible because of the Kruvina.{nl}But their schemes didn't end there.{nl}
column3: 이 모든 것은 크루비나가 있기에 가능했던 일이었어요.{nl}하지만 그들의 계획은 아직 끝난 것이 아닙니다.{nl}
column4: Semua dapat terwujud karena Kruvina.{nl}Namun bagian mereka tidak berakhir sampai sana saja.{nl}

column2: After the experiment yielded good results, the demons wanted to create a Kruvina that was even more powerful.{nl}
column3: 실험 결과가 만족스러웠던 마족들은 더 강력한 크루비나를 만들길 원했으니까요.{nl}
column4: Setelah eksperimen Yielded menghasilkan hasil yang bagus, demon akan menciptakan Kruvina yang lebih kuat.{nl}

column2: Their plan was to use not human lives...{nl}But mine. The life force of a goddess.{nl}
column3: 인간의 생명이 아닌.. {nl}바로 저. 여신의 생명으로요.{nl}
column4: Rencana mereka tidak ditujukan pada kehidupan manusia…{nl}Tapi pertambangan. The life force of a Goddess .{nl}

column2: There cannot be a weapon like the Kruvina in our world.{nl}Only you can destroy the Kruvina and stop the demons' plans. {nl}
column3: 크루비나는 세상에 절대 존재해서는 안 될 물건이에요.{nl}그대만이 크루비나를 파괴하고 마족의 음모를 막을 수 있어요.{nl}
column4: Tidak akan ada senjata seperti Kruvina di dunia.{nl}Hanya kamu yang dapat menghancurkan Kruvina dan mengehentikan rencana Demon. {nl}

column2: Demon Lord Zaura is gravely injured; now is your chance!
column3: 마군주 자우라가 치명상을 입은 지금이 기회입니다!
column4: Demon Lord Zaura terluka parah, sekarang adalah kesempatanmu!

column2: The Kruvina may be unfinished...{nl}But the fact that it uses my life force means it cannot be destroyed by human powers.{nl}
column3: 크루비나는 아직 완성되지 않았지만..{nl}저의 생명력으로 만들어지고 있기에 인간의 힘 만으론 파괴할 수 없어요.{nl}
column4: Kruvina belum berakhir…{nl}namun faktanya bahwa alat itu tidak dapat dihancurkan oleh kekuatan manusia.{nl}

column2: There is only one way...{nl}I need to impart my power on the orb Laima gave you...{nl}
column3: 방법은 오직 하나..{nl}라이마가 그대에게 맡긴 보주에 미약하게나마 제 힘을 보태는 것 뿐..{nl}
column4: Hanya ada satu cara…{nl}Aku perlu menyalurkan kekuatanku pada Orb Laima…{nl}

column2: Alas, most of my power was stolen from me during Medzio Diena, and what was left of it is with the Kruvina device.{nl}If only that power is released... I can use it to help you.
column3: 하지만 신수의 날에 거의 모든 힘을 빼앗긴데다가, 남은 힘마저도 크루비나 생성 장치에 묶여 있어요.{nl}그 힘만이라도 해방될 수 있다면.. 그대에게 힘을 보태드릴 수 있습니다.
column4: Alas, sebagian besar kekuatanku telah dicuri saat Medzio Diena, dan yang tersisa pada Kruvina device.{nl}Jika saja kekuatan itu terlepaskan… aku dapat menggunakanya untuk membantumu.

column2: You did well.{nl}With the production stopped, the Kruvina cannot be completed.
column3: 잘 해주셨습니다. {nl}이제 크루비나는 불완전한 상태로 생성을 멈출거예요.
column4: Kamu berhasill.{nl}Dengan berhentinya produksi, Kruvina tidak dapat lengkap.

column2: Even an unfinished Kruvina is too dangerous for this world, however...{nl}It needs to be destroyed before the demons make use of it.{nl}
column3: 하지만 불완전한 크루비나라도 이 세상에 있어선 안 될 존재..{nl}마족이 악용하기 전에 빨리 파괴해야해요.{nl}
column4: Bahkan Kruvina yang belum sempurna saja sudah terlalu berbahaya untuk dunia,{nl}Harus dihancurkan sebelum Demon menggunakanya..{nl}

column2: Whatever little power I have recovered, I will entrust it unto you.{nl}You have one chance... Please, destroy the Kruvina.
column3: 제 힘이 미약하게나마 돌아왔으니 그대에게 힘을 나눠드리겠습니다.{nl}기회는 단 한번.. 부디 크루비나를 파괴해 주세요.
column4: Berapapun kekuatan ku yang sembuh, akan kupercayakan padamu.{nl}Kamu mempunyai 1 kesempatan… Tolong hancurkan Kruvina.

column2: Before transforming into a ferret, you need to study their behavior.{nl}They're going to know something's up if you act weird.{nl}
column3: 일단 페릿으로 변신하기 전에 페릿들의 행동을 잘 관찰해야해.{nl}어색하게 행동하면 페릿들에게 들킬 게 뻔하거든.{nl}
column4: Sebelum berubah menjadu Ferret, kamu harus mempelajari kebiasaanya.{nl}Mereka akan mengetahui sesuatu yang baru apabila kamu berlaku aneh{nl}

column2: I'm going to give you an empty scroll so you can take notes on the ferrets.{nl}After that you can transform.
column3: 내가 빈 주문서를 줄 테니까 페릿의 행동을 관찰하고나서 여기에 적어줘.{nl}변신은 그 뒤에나 가능할 것 같아.
column4: Aku akan memberikanmu Empty Scroll jadi kamu dapat menggunakanya ke Ferrets.{nl}Setelah itu kamu dapat berubah.

column2: Demon Lord Zaura will never stand for this.{nl}May you be blessed in the name of the goddesses.
column3: 마군주 자우라가 가만히 구경만 하고 있진 않을 거예요.{nl}여신의 이름으로 그대의 가호를 빌겠습니다.
column4: Demon Lord Zaura tidak akan diam untuk ini.{nl}Diberkatilah kamu dalam nama Goddesses.

column2: The Kruvina... is in the hands of the demons.{nl}I'm glad you, savior, were able to return in safety.{nl}
column3: 크루비나는.. 결국 마족이 가져갔군요.{nl}구원자님께서 무사히 돌아오신 것 만으로도 정말 다행이예요.{nl}
column4: Kruvina… adalah alat Demon.{nl}Aku lega kamu dapat kembali dengan selamat.{nl}

column2: Don't blame yourself.{nl}This is not your fault.
column3: 너무 자책하지 마세요. {nl}이건 그대의 탓이 아닙니다.{nl}
column4: Jangan salahkan dirimu.{nl}Ini bukan salahmu.

column2: If you handn't stopped the demons' plans, they would have completed the Kruvina.{nl}I believe Laima will be aware of this, too.{nl}
column3: 만약 마족의 계획을 막지 못했다면, 그들은 완전한 크루비나를 만들었겠지요.{nl}아마 라이마도 충분히 알고 있었을 것입니다.{nl}
column4: Jika kamu tidak dapat menghentikanrencana Demon, mereka akan menyempurnakan Kruvina.{nl}Aku percaya Laima akan waspada akan hal ini juga.{nl}

column2: That feat alone was immensely important for us.{nl}No one can blame you...
column3: 그걸 막은 것 만으로도 큰 일을 해 주신 거예요.{nl}그 누구도 그대를 탓하지 않습니다..
column4: Hal itu sangat penting untuk kami.{nl}Tidak ada yang dapat menyalahkan mu…

column2: Laima...{nl}How despairing it must have been for her, knowing she was powerless to change what would happen.{nl}
column3: 라이마는.. {nl}이 모든 것을 알고도 어떻게 할 수 없는 자신이 괴로웠을 거예요.{nl}
column4: Laima…{nl}Betapa tertekannya jika menjadi dia, mengetahui dia tidak dapat berbuat apa-apa untuk merubah nasib dunia.{nl}

column2: I imagine that's why she took it upon herself and drifted away.{nl}To find a solution for this calamity... she had no choice but to walk a lonely path.{nl}
column3: 그래서 혼자서 모든 것을 지고 방랑의 길에 오른 것이겠지요.{nl}이 재앙을 멈출 수 있는 방법을 찾아서.. 외롭고 고통스러운 방랑을요.{nl}
column4: Aku membayangkan mengapa dia menyendiri dan melangkah pergi.{nl}Untuk menemukan solusi dari malapetaka ini… dia tidak mempunyai pilihan kecuali menjalani sendiri.{nl}

column2: Oh...!{nl}I just heard Laima's voice.{nl}She was calling out for you...{nl}
column3: 아..!{nl}방금 라이마의 목소리를 들었어요.{nl}당신을 애타게 부르는듯한..{nl}
column4: Oh…!{nl}Aku baru saja mendengar suara Laima.{nl}Dia memanggilmu…{nl}

column2: I think it's Laima's statue in Zeraha.{nl}You should go there.
column3: 제라하에 있는 라이마의 여신상인 것 같아요.{nl}어서 가 보세요.
column4: Menurutku patung Laima di Zeraha.{nl}Kamu harus pergi kesana.

column2: Her voice was calling out for you, yearning.{nl}Hurry and go to the statue of Goddess Laima in Zeraha.
column3: 마치 당신을 애타게 부르고 있는 듯한 목소리였어요.{nl}어서 제라하의 라이마 여신상으로 가 보세요.
column4: Suaranya memanggil mu.{nlSegera lah menuju patung Goddess Laima di Zeraha.

column2: Laima...{nl}
column3: 라이마..{nl}
column4: Laima…{nl}

column2: She gave me a sad smile and walked away.{nl}She knew what would happen... And yet, she made a difficult choice...{nl}
column3: 라이마는 제게 슬픈 미소만을 남기곤, 방랑을 떠났어요.{nl}이렇게 될 것을 알면서.. 알았으면서 왜 그렇게 힘든 길을 택했는지..{nl}
column4: Dia memberikanku senyuman sedih dan berjalan pergi.{nl}Dia mengetahui apa yang akan terjadi… belum lagi dia harus membuat keputusan yang sulit…{nl}

column2: Seeing you now, I can try to understand the reason behind her choice.{nl}The meaning of a savior... what she saw at the end of this catastrophe.{nl}
column3: 하지만 그대를 보니 그녀가 왜 이런 위험한 선택을 했는지 조금이나마 알 것 같아요.{nl}구원자의 의미를.. 이 재앙의 끝에서 그녀가 무엇을 봤는지를요.{nl}
column4: Melihatmu sekarang, aku mengerti alasan dibalik keputusannya.{nl}Arti dari penyelamat… Apa yang dia lihat pada akhir dari  catastrophe.{nl}

column2: You said Laima asked you to find the revelations.{nl}The one closest from here will be in Fedimian.{nl}
column3: 라이마가 계시를 찾아달라고 말했다 하셨지요.{nl}여기서 가장 가까운 계시는 페디미안에서 찾을 수 있을 거예요.{nl}
column4: Kau bilang Laima memintamu untuk menemukan revelations.{nl}Satu - satunya yang terdekat dari sini adalah pada in Fedimian.{nl}

column2: I understand the weight of this task, but we must act now.{nl}It has to be you... No one but you can save Laima.{nl}
column3: 신성한 임무가 그대를 짓누르더라도 결코 지지 말아야 해요.{nl}당신이 아니면.. 아무도 이 세계와 라이마를 구할 수 없어요.{nl}
column4: Aku mengerti tugas berat ini, tapi kita harus bergerak sekarang.{nl}Sudah pasti harus kamu… Tidak ada orang lain selain kamu yang dapat menyelamatkan Laima.{nl}

column2: I will pass onto you the power of Laima's orb.{nl}Let it guide you to the revelation she has hidden.{nl}
column3: 마지막으로 라이마의 보주에 깃든 힘을 당신에게 전해드릴게요.{nl}그녀가 숨겨 둔 계시를 찾는 데 커다란 보탬이 될 거예요.{nl}
column4: Aku akan memberikan kekuatan Laima Orb padamu.{nl}Biarkan membimbingmu pada sabda. Dia sedang bersembunyi.{nl}

column2: Please, save Laima...{nl}Rescue her from the hands of Giltine...
column3: 부디 라이마를.. {nl}길티네의 손에서 그녀를 구해 주세요..
column4: Tolong selamatkan Laima…{nl}Selamatkan dia dari tangan Giltine…

column2: You were brought here by destiny!{nl}Thank you, thank you for rescuing Goddess Lada.{nl}
column3: 전승이 당신을 여기까지 이끌어 주셨군요!{nl}라다 여신을 구해주셔서 정말 감사했습니다.{nl}
column4: Kamu dibawa kesini oleh takdir!{nl}Terima kasih, terima kasih untuk menyelamatkan Goddess Lada.{nl}

column2: Someday I'm going to rebuild a temple for Goddess Lada and Goddess Laima, when they return.{nl}
column3: 전 언젠가 돌아오실 라이마 여신과 라다 여신을 위해 신전을 재건하려고 합니다.{nl}
column4: Suatu hari aku akan membangun kembali kuil untuk Goddesses Lada dan Laima, saat dia kembali.{nl}

column2: But the demons will not give up.{nl}And Lada's condition itself is still unstable.{nl}
column3: 하지만 마족들의 기세는 아직도 여전하지요.{nl}라다 여신께서도 보전하시기 어려운 상태이고요.{nl}
column4: Demon tidak akan menyerah.{nl}dan kondisi Lada's sendiri masih belum stabil.{nl}

column2: We would like to chase away the demons left around here, would you help?{nl}
column3: 이 곳에 남은 마족들을 몰아내려고 하는데 힘을 보태주실 수 있을까요?{nl}
column4: Kami akan menyejar Demon yang tersisa sekitar sini, apakah kau mau membantu?{nl}

column2: Goddess Lada is still not feeling well.{nl}We'll look after Her now.
column3: 라다 여신께선 아직 많이 힘들어하세요.{nl}이젠 저희가 지켜드려야지요.
column4: Goddess Lada is still not feeling well.{nl}We'll look after Her now.

column2: Thank you.{nl}There are a lot less demons around now.
column3: 감사합니다. {nl}덕분에 마족들이 눈에 띄게 줄어들었네요.
column4: Terima kasih.{nl}Terdapat banyak Demon tersisa disekitarmu.

column2: Now we need to purify the land contaminated by evil energy.{nl}But I don't know how.{nl}
column3: 이제 사악한 기운으로 오염된 대지를 정화해야 해요.{nl}하지만 방법을 도저히 모르겠어요.{nl}
column4: Sekarang kita harus menyembuhkan tanah yang terkontaminasi oleh kekuatah jahat.{nl}Tapi aku tidak tahu bagaimana.{nl}

column2: This wasn't even the work of demons, but a human...{nl}Widas can't seem to find a solution right away, either.{nl}
column3: 이건 마족의 짓이 아니라 놀랍게도 사람이 저지른 것이라서..{nl}딥디르비인 위다스씨도 당장은 정화할 방법을 찾지 못하신 것 같고요.{nl}
column4: Ini bukan ulah Demon, tapi manusia…{nl}Widas sepertinya tidak dapat menemukan solusi segera.{nl}

column2: Not far from here there's a big city called Fedimian.{nl}I wonder if there is a master there who could come up with something.{nl}
column3: 이 숲에서 멀지 않은 곳에 페디미안이라는 대도시가 있어요.{nl}혹시 페디미안에 계신 마스터님 중에 이런 경우에 해박한 분이 있지 않을까요?{nl}
column4: Tidak jauh dari sini terdapat kota besar Fedimian.{nl}Semoga terdapat master disana yang dapat menolong sesuatu.{nl}

column2: Of course I would go there myself but...{nl}We're short-handed as it is here, I don't think it would be right for me to leave.{nl}
column3: 물론 제가 직접 찾아 뵈는 것이 예의이지만.. {nl}이 곳의 일손이 부족해서 자리를 비우기가 힘든 상황이라서요.{nl}
column4: Tentu saja aku akan kesana sendiri tapi…{nl}Kita kekurangan tenaga disini, ku kira tidak benar jika aku untuk meninggalkannya.{nl}

column2: If you can, I would like you to go to Fedimian and ask the masters there for advice.
column3: 괜찮으시다면 페디미안에서 조언을 주실 마스터님을 찾아 주셨으면 합니다.
column4: jika kamu mau, aku akan menuju Fedimian dan bertanya pada master disana untuk nasihat.

column2: So the land was contaminated not by demons, but a human...{nl}With the world as it is, who would have thought...?{nl}
column3: 마족이 아니라 사람이 오염시킨 대지라고요.{nl}저런.. 세상이 이리도 어지러우니 헛된 꿈을 꾸는 이들이 생겨나는군요.{nl}
column4: Jadi tanah telah terkontaminasi bukan oleh Demon, tapi oleh manusia...{nl}siapa yang mengira?…?{nl}

column2: I have a solution. I'm going to write you a purification scroll.{nl}That should be enough to solve the problem.
column3: 일단 제가 방법은 알고 있으니 정화의 마법진을 주문서에 써 드리지요.{nl}이것이라면 충분히 해결될 겁니다.
column4: Aku mempunyai solusi. Aku akan menuliskan mu purification scroll.{nl}Itu harusnya cukup untuk menyelesaikan masalah.

column2: One of the masters in Fedimian should be able to help us!{nl}I hope so...
column3: 페디미안에 있는 마스터님들이라면 분명 해박한 분이 계실 거에요!{nl}계셔야 하는데..
column4: Salah satu dari master di Fedimian seharusnya dapat membantu kita!{nl}Aku harap demikian…

column2: You're back already.{nl}Did... you find a master to help us?{nl}
column3: 금방 다녀오셨네요.{nl}저.. 아시는 분이 계시던가요?{nl}
column4: Kamu telah kembali.{nl}Apakah…kamu menemukan master untuk menolong kita?{nl}

column2: The Druid Master wrote this scroll herself? {nl}That's even better than I expected. Thank you!
column3: 드루이드 마스터님께서 직접 주문서를 써 주셨다고요?{nl}이거 기대 이상의 수확인데요. 정말 감사합니다!
column4: Druid Master menulis scroll ini sendiri? {nl}Itu sudah lebih bagus dari perkiraan ku. Terima kasih!

column2: I found the source of the contamination.{nl}The demons set up another totem.{nl}
column3: 일단 오염의 근원은 제가 찾아 놓았어요.{nl}마족들이 그새 또 토템을 세워놨더라고요.{nl}
column4: Aku menemukan sumber dari kontaminasi.{nl}Demon mengatur totem lain.{nl}

column2: This purification scroll should do it but...{nl}With the demons guarding it, I can't get close enough to the totem.{nl}
column3: 이 정화의 주문서라면 문제 없겠지만..{nl}토템을 지키는 마족들 때문에 도저히 가까이 갈 엄두가 안나요.{nl}
column4: Purification scroll ini dapat digunakan tapi…{nl}Dengan penjagaan Demon, aku tidak dapat berada cukup dekat dengan totem.{nl}

column2: Will you destroy the demon totem and purify it with the scroll?
column3: 마족 토템을 파괴하고 정화의 주문서로 정화해 주실 수 있을까요?
column4: Mau kah kamu menghancurkan Demon Totem dan menyembuhkannya dengan scroll ini?

column2: I can't understand why someone would side with the demons...{nl}How powerful is their evil energy, that even ferrets can't handle it?
column3: 도대체 마족 편에 섰다는 사람들은 무슨 생각으로..{nl}사악한 기운이 얼마나 지독하면 페릿까지도 정신을 못 차리는 걸까요?
column4: Aku tidak mengerti mengapa seseorang mau berada di sisi yang sama dengan Demon…{nl}Berapa besar kekuatan jahat mereka, hingga Ferret tidak dapat menanganinya?

column2: Revelator, your help has given us new hope. {nl}We couldn't have solved this without you...{nl}
column3: 계시자님의 도움이 큰 힘이 되었습니다.{nl}마을 사람들만으론 엄청 오래 걸렸을 거예요..{nl}
column4: Penyelamat, Pertolonganmu memberikan kami harapan baru. {nl}Kami tidak dapat menanganinya tanpa kamu…{nl}

column2: After the new temple is completed, feel free to come by again, Revelator!
column3: 언젠가 이 곳에 여신을 위한 신전이 세워지면 계시자님도 한번 들려 주세요!
column4: Setelah Temple baru selesai, datanglah kembali sesuka hati, Penyelamat!

column2: Our people feel safe now that everything's come to an end...{nl}You really are our savior. Thank you, thank you!{nl}
column3: 우리 마을은 이제 다 끝났다고 생각했는데..{nl}자네는 우리 마을의 은일일세. 정말 고맙네, 고마워!{nl}
column4: Rakyat kami merasa aman sekarang saat semua telah berakhir...{nl}Kau adalah penyelamat kamu. Terima kasih, terima kasih!{nl}

column2: Our people are going to join forces and build a temple for the goddesses now.{nl}By the way, I was looking around the Irbedi Cliff for a spot to build the temple and I found a place with a strong vital force.
column3: 이제 마을 주민들과 힘을 합쳐서 여신을 위한 신전을 재건할 걸세.{nl}참. 어디에 신전을 지으면 좋을까 터를 둘러보다가 이르베디 절벽에서 생명력이 가득한 곳을 찾았지.{nl}
column4: Rakyat kami akan bergabung dan membuat temple untuk Goddess sekarang.{nl}Dan juga, aku sedang mencari tempat sekitar Irbedi Cliff untuk tempat membangun temple dan aku menemukan tempat dengan kekuatan vital yang kuat.

column2: I couldn't do much more because of the demons...{nl}But the energy of that land, I'm sure it'll help Goddess Lada recover Hers.{nl}
column3: 마족들이 덤벼드는 통에 자세히 살펴보진 못했지만..{nl}그 땅의 기운이라면 필히 라다 여신께서 기운을 회복하는데 큰 도움이 될 게야.{nl}
column4: Aku tidak dapat berbuat banyak karena Dmeon…{nl}Tapi energy dari tanah itu, aku yakin dapat membantu penyembuhan Goddess Lada.{nl}

column2: So I want to ask you.{nl}They say this seed grows a flower that takes on whatever properties of the land where it's planted.
column3: 내 자네에게 부탁이 있네.{nl}이 씨앗은 자라난 땅의 성질을 그대로 품어서 꽃을 피운다네.{nl}
column4: Jadi aku bertanya padamu.{nl}Katanya bibit ini akan tumbuh bunga dimana pun ditanam diatas properti apapun pada tanah ini.

column2: If we plant it on that land, the flower too will have the same life force.{nl}Will you bring that flower to Goddess Lada?
column3: 생명력이 가득한 땅에서 피운 꽃은 생명력을 가득 머금을 게야.{nl}부디 그 꽃을 라다 여신께 전해줄 수 있겠나?
column4: Jika kita menanamnya pada tanah, bunga tersebut juga ajan memiliki life force.{nl}Mau kah kau membawakan bunga itu pada Goddess Lada?

column2: I have never felt a force so powerful.{nl}I only hope this flower can heal the wounds in Goddess Lada's body and spirit...
column3: 그렇게 강한 생명력은 처음이었어.{nl}라다 여신께서 이 꽃으로 상처받은 몸과 마음을 치유할 수 있길 바라네..
column4: Aku tidak pernah merasakan kekuatan begitu besar.{nl}Aku harap bunga ini dapat menyembuhkan luka tubuh dan kekuatan Goddess Lada…

column2: Even if it happened in accordance with Laima's prophecy, I have fallen and left the townspeople helpless and worried..{nl}My gratitude cannot be expressed through mere words...
column3: 라이마가 예지했던 재앙이라곤 해도 주민들을 지키지 못했는데..{nl}이렇게 저를 생각해 주시니 너무 감사하네요.{nl}
column4: Nahkan jika itu terjadi berdasarkan keinginan Laima, aku kalah dan membuat rakyat khawatir..{nl}Terima kasih ku tidak dapat di ekspresikan dengan kata...

column2: And this flower is filled with great life force...{nl}My recovery won't take long with this. Again, thank you...{nl}
column3: 정말.. 생명력이 가득한 꽃이예요.{nl}덕분에 금방 기운을 차릴 수 있을 것 같아요.{nl}
column4: Dan bunga ini dipenuhi oleh kekuatan kehidupan yang besar...{nl}Penyembuhan ku tidak akan memerlukan waktu lama dengan ini, sekali lagi, Terima kasih…{nl}

column2: Thank you.{nl}May you be blessed by all the living beings in this forest...
column3: 감사합니다.{nl}그대에게 이 숲과 모든 생명의 가호가 깃들길..
column4: Terima kasih.{nl}Semoga kau diberkati atas semua yang hidup pada hutan ini…

column2: If only I can escape the Redemption Ward... I can get my energy back.{nl}Please hurry...
column3: 구속구에게서 벗어날 수 있다면.. 기운을 차릴 수 있을 것 같습니다.{nl}부디 서둘러주세요..
column4: Jika saja aku dapat lolos dari Redemption Ward… Aku dapat mengambil kembali energy ku.{nl}Tolong lebih cepat…

column2: The Kruvina is still being produced.{nl}You need to hurry...
column3: 지금도 크루비나가 만들어지고 있어요.{nl}어서 서둘러야 해요..
column4: Kruvina masih dalam pembuatan.{nl}Kau harus cepat…

column2: Please lend me just a little more of your strength.{nl}Only you can do this.
column3: 조금만 더 힘을 내 주세요.{nl}그대만이 해낼 수 있는 일입니다.
column4: Please lend me just a little more of your strength.{nl}Only you can do this.

column2: A human sided with the demons...{nl}With the world as it is, who would have thought...?
column3: 마족의 편에 선 인간..{nl}세상이 이리도 어지러우니 헛된 꿈을 꾸는 이들이 생겨나는군요.
column4: Manusia dengan Demon…{nl}Atas dasar dunia, siapa yang dapat mengiranya?…?

column2: I... feel my conscience fading away...{nl}Hurry and destroy the three devices... before the Kruvina is completed.{nl}
column3: 점점.. 정신이 아득해져가요..{nl}어서 크루비나가 완성되기 전에.. 세 개의 장치를 파괴해 주셔야 해요.{nl}
column4: Aku…merasa hati nuraniku menghilang perlahan…{nl}Cepat lah dan hancurkan tiga device… sebelum Kruvina menjadi sempurna.{nl}

column2: Fortunately, should I say... those devices were made by a human...{nl}Your abilities should be enough to destroy them.{nl}
column3: 다행이라고 해야 할지.. 그 장치들은 인간이 만든 것이기에..{nl}그대의 힘으로도 쉽게 파괴할 수 있을 거예요.{nl}
column4: Untungnya, device tersebut dibuat oleh manusia…{nl}Kekuatanmu seharusnya cukup untuk menghancurkannya.{nl}

column2: The Redemption Ward first...{nl}Please, before I lose my senses...
column3: 먼저 구속구를..{nl}제가 정신을 잃기 전에 부탁드리겠습니다..
column4: Redemption Ward dahulu…{nl}Tolong, sebelum aku kehilangan indra ku…

column2: You... destroyed the Redemption Ward.{nl}I'm fine. I'm just a little dizzy.
column3: 구속구를.. 파괴하셨군요.{nl}저는 괜찮습니다. 조금 어지러울 뿐이예요.
column4: Kau… menghancurkan Redemption Ward.{nl}Aku tidak apa-apa. Aku hanya sedikit pusing.

column2: Now only the vitality absorption device and the suppressor are left.{nl}If you destroy the vitality absorption device, you'll stop the production of the Kruvina.{nl}
column3: 이제 남은 건 생명력 흡수 장치와 제어 장치예요.{nl}그 중 생명력 흡수 장치를 파괴한다면 크루비나가 만들어지고 있는 걸 당장은 멈출 수 있어요.{nl}
column4: Sekarang hanya tertinggal Vitality Absorption device dan Suppressor.{nl}jika kamu menghancurkan Vitality Absorption Device, kau akan menghentikan pembuatan dari Kruvina.{nl}

column2: The device was made to absorb only the vitality of goddesses...{nl}If it absorbs that of another being it will shut down.{nl}
column3: 그 장치는 순수한 여신의 생명력만을 흡수하도록 만들어져 있기에..{nl}다른 생명력이 흡수되면 작동을 멈출 겁니다.{nl}
column4: Device terbuat hanya untuk menghisap vitality of Goddesses…{nl}Jika menghisap benda lain makan akan terhenti.{nl}

column2: Demon blood, especially, is opposite to my nature, and it will cause an ever stronger reaction on the device.
column3: 특히 저의 성질과 반대되는 마족의 혈액을 섞는다면 더 강력한 반발력이 생길 거예요.
column4: Terkecuali Demon blood, berlawanan dengan alamku, dan akan mengakibatkan reaksi kuat pada device.

column2: You really are Laima's chosen one...{nl}I feel like I'm regaining my energy a little now.
column3: 역시 라이마가 선택하신 분..{nl}조금씩 제 생명력이 돌아오는 것이 느껴지고 있어요.{nl}
column4: Kau benar-benar pilihan Laima…{nl}Aku merasa energy ku perlahan bertambah sekarang.

column2: Finally, the Kruvina suppressor.{nl}That's the device that collects my vitality and supplies it to the Kruvina.{nl}
column3: 마지막으로 남은 건 크루비나 제어 장치예요.{nl}제 생명력을 모아뒀다가 크루비나로 일정량씩 보내는 장치이지요.{nl}
column4: Akhirnya, Kruvina suppressor.{nl}Device tersebut yang telah mengumpulkan Vitality ku Kruvina.{nl}

column2: That much is operated by the demons' magic power alone.{nl}Use Laima's orb to overload the device.
column3: 이것 만큼은 마족의 마력으로 작동하고 있어요.{nl}그대가 가지고 있는 라이마의 보주로 마력 과부하를 일으키세요.
column4: Digerakkan oleh Demon Magic Power.{nl}Gunakan Laima Orb untuk menghentikan device.

column2: Fedimian is a really big city.{nl}Especially because it's close to the Great Cathedral, it's a common destination for pilgrims.{nl}
column3: 페디미안은 정말 거대한 도시예요.{nl}특히 대성당과도 가까워서 순례자라면 반드시 들르는 도시이기도 하지요.{nl}
column4: Fedimian merupakan kota sangat besar.{nl}Terutama karena sangat dekat dengan Great Cathedral, tempat tujuan umum untuk pilgrims.{nl}

column2: Fedimian, too, was afected by Medzio Diena...{nl}But even though the business district was destroyed, a surprising number of people survived.{nl}
column3: 페디미안도 신수의 날을 피해가진 못했지만..{nl}상업지구가 대파됐음에도 불구하고 기적처럼 정말 많은 사람들이 살아남았대요.{nl}
column4: Fedimian juga terkena dampak Medzio Diena…{nl}Namun walau bisnis distrik telah hancur, beberapa orang masih bertahan.{nl}

column2: People there think it was because Fedimian is in the divine area where the the great statue of Goddess Austeja is.{nl}Now they're hard at work to rebuild the city.
column3: 그 곳 사람들은 신성지구에 있는 거대 아우스테야 여신상 덕분이라고 생각한다죠?{nl}어쨌든 지금은 도시를 복구하는데 온 힘을 쏟고 있다네요.
column4: Orang -orang mengira bahwa Fedimian dalam Devine Area dimana terdapat patung Goddess Austeja.{nl}Sekarang mereka bekerja keras membangun kembali kota.

column2: Go down at the Kraijwi Crossings and you should see Fedimian.{nl}Alright then, I look forward to hear good news from you!
column3: 페디미안은 크라이쥐 사거리에서 아래쪽으로 내려가면 나올 거예요.{nl}그럼, 좋은 소식 기다리고 있겠습니다!
column4: Pergi ke bawah dari Kraijwi Crossings dan kau akan melihat Fedimian.{nl}Baiklah, aku akan menunggu kabar baik darimu!

column2: I'm very glad to hear that.{nl}The totems are close to the Inega Vacant Lot and in the Odur Backyard.
column3: 그렇게 말씀해주시니 정말 기뻐요.{nl}토템은 이네갈 공터 근처와 오두르 안뜰에 있으니 부탁드릴게요.
column4: Aku lega mendengarnya.{nl}Letak Totems dekat dengan Inega Vacant Lot dan dalam Odur Backyard.

column2: The girl is looking at the tree that is shining mysteriously.
column3: 소녀는 신비하게 빛나는 묘목을 지켜보고 있다.
column4: Gadis itu mencari pohon yang menimbulkan cahaya misterius.

column2: The girl disappeared with the light.
column3: 소녀는 빛과 함께 사라졌다.
column4: Gadis itu menghilang dengan cahaya.

column2: Elder Eloizard
column3: 촌장 알로이자스
column4: Elder Eloizard

column2: You must quite talented, coming all the way over here.{nl}I'm the chief of a village downstream from this lake.
column3: 이런 곳까지 오시다니 여행자님의 실력이 뛰어나신 것 같군요.{nl}저는 이 호수 하류에있는 마을의 촌장입니다.
column4: Kamu pasti benar-benar berbakat, datang sampai sejauh ini.{nl}Aku adalah pemimpin village downstream dari danau ini.

column2: We came up here to try and find out why the lake turned red.{nl}I looked around for a while but as I was about to go back I got my path blocked by monsters.{nl}If that's all right, will you give me a hand?
column3: 헌데 호수가 붉게 오염되서 원인을 찾기위해 올라왔습니다.{nl}이 근방을 둘러보고 마을 사람들이 모여있는 곳으로 가려던 차에 몬스터들이 길을 막고 있어서 곤란했습니다.{nl}괜찮으시다면 도와주실 수 있겠습니까?
column4: Kami kesini untuk mencari tahu mengaka danau ini menjadi merah.{nl}Saat aku melihat sekeliling tiba-tiba jalanku dihadang oleh monster.{nl}Jika boleh, mau kah kau membantuku?

column2: Please.{nl}I just need you to clear out some monsters around here.
column3: 잘부탁합니다.{nl}근방의 몬스터를 물리쳐주시면 고맙겠습니다!
column4: Tolong.{nl}Aku hanya memerlukanmu untuk memusnahkan beberapa monster sekitar sini.

column2: Samsonas
column3: 삼소나스
column4: Samsonas

column2: You're the traveler?{nl}I'm going to pray to the goddesses to make the lake clean again. {nl}Before the lake was contaminated I once saw people make offerings to an obelisk around here.
column3: 여행자이신가요?{nl}저는 호수가 정화될 수 있도록 여신께 기도를 드리려고 합니다.{nl}호수가 오염되기전 이 곳에서 어떤 사람들이 오벨리스크 앞에 공물을 받치고 기도하는 것을 본적이 있어요.
column4: Kau pengelana?{nl}Aku akan pergi berdoa pada Goddesses untuk membuat danau kembali bersih. {nl}Sebelum danau ini terkontaminasi, aku melihat orang menawarkan obelisk sekitar sini.

column2: You're the traveler?{nl}I'm going to pray to the goddesses to make the lake clean again. {nl}Before the lake was contaminated I once saw people make offerings to an obelisk around here.
column3: 저도 그렇게 하고싶은데 호수가 오염된 이후로 곡식도 먹을 수 없게되고 물고기도 모두 죽어버려서 식량이 부족합니다.{nl}그래서 인근에 서식하는 체이퍼러의 고기라도 여신께 받치고 싶은데 저를 도와주실 수 있나요?
column4: Kau pengelana?{nl}Aku akan pergi berdoa pada Goddesses untuk membuat danau kembali bersih. {nl}Sebelum danau ini terkontaminasi, aku melihat orang menawarkan obelisk sekitar sini.

column2: Please do me this favor.
column3: 잘부탁드립니다.
column4: Tolong bantu aku.

column2: You got it! Thank you for your help.
column3: 모아주셨군요! 도와주셔서 감사합니다.
column4: Kau mendapatkanya! Terima kasih atas bantuanmu.

column2: Nikodemas
column3: 니코데마스
column4: Nikodemas

column2: You wouldn't happen to have seen a young man around here?{nl}He said he was just going somewhere but hasn't been back since.{nl}Someone saw him head to the Absenta Reservoir.{nl}If you're going that way, would you look for him?
column3: 혹시 이 근방에서 청년 한명을 보지 못하셨습니까?{nl}근방을 살펴본다며 나갔는데 한참이 지나도 돌아오지 않고있습니다.{nl}마지막으로 압셈타 수원지로 가는 길 인근에서 봤다는 주민이 있습니다.{nl}그 근방에 가시면 혹시 찾아봐주실 수 있겠습니까?
column4: Apakah kau melihat laki-laki muda sekitar sini?{nl}Dia bilang hanya pergi  sekitar sini namun tidak pernah kembali.{nl}Seseorang melihatnya menuju Absenta Reservoir.{nl}jika kamu pergi kearas sana, mau kah kau mencarinya?

column2: It'll be okay, I hope...
column3: 무사히 돌아와야 할텐데...
column4: Akan baik-baik saja, aku harap…

column2: Isolated Youth
column3: 고립된 청년
column4: Isolated Youth

column2: Thank you.{nl}I was being chased by that huge monster and had to hide here, but it wouldn't move, so I was stuck.{nl}You saved me.
column3: 감사합니다.{nl}저 거대한 몬스터에게 쫒겨서 여기에 숨게되었는데 몬스터가 움직이지 않아서 꼼짝없이 숨어있었습니다.{nl}덕분에 살았습니다.
column4: Terima Kasih.{nl}Aku dikejar oleh monster besar itu dan bersembunyi disini, namun aku terdesak disini.{nl}Kau menyelamatkan ku.

column2: Is everything all right with him?
column3: 그에게 무슨 문제가 생긴건 아니겠지요?
column4: Apakah semuanya baik-baik saja dengan dia?

column2: Scalvis
column3: 스칼비스
column4: Scalvis

column2: So you're the traveler who helped our chief. {nl}After the lake was contaminated there's more monsters around and we're afraid they'll hurt someone.{nl}Will you clear out some around here?
column3: 촌장님을 도와주셨다는 여행자시군요{nl}호수가 오염된 후 몬스터들이 부쩍 늘어나서 마을 사람들이 다칠까 걱정입니다.{nl}혹시 근방의 몬스터의 수를 줄여주실 수 있겠습니까?
column4: Jadi kau pengelana yang menyelamatkan ketua kami?. {nl}Setelah danau terkontaminasi terdapat banyak monster sekitar sini dan kami takit mereka akan melukai seseorang.{nl}Mau kah kau membereskannya di sekitar sini?

column2: Hopefully we won't run into trouble before we go back to the village.
column3: 마을에 돌아갈때까지 별탈이 안생겼으면 좋겠습니다.
column4: semoga kita tidak menemui bahaya sebelum kita kembali ke desa

column2: Thank you for your help.{nl}I hope we can all return safely.
column3: 도와주셔서 감사합니다.{nl}별탈 없이 모두 돌아갈 수 있다면 좋겠습니다.
column4: Terima kasi atas pertolonganmu.{nl}Aku harap kita dapat kembali dengan selamat.

column2: The contaminated lake is a big problem.{nl}We really need to hurry and find a solution...
column3: 호수가 오염되서 큰일입니다.{nl}하루 빨리 해결해야 할텐데...
column4: Danau terkontaminasi adalah masalah besar{nl}Kita harus cepat menemukan solusinya…

column2: Lately there's a lot more monsters around, this area is dangerous now.
column3: 최근 근방에 몬스터가 부쩍 늘어서 위험해진 것 같습니다.
column4: Belakangan banyak sekali monster sekitar sini, daerah ini berbahaya sekarang.

column2: We came up all together but it's too dangerous here.
column3: 다같이 올라오긴 했지만 이 곳은 너무 위험합니다.
column4: Kami datang bersama tapi terlalu berbahaya disini.

column2: Thanks to you I was able to come back to my people.{nl}Thank you.
column3: 덕분에 무사히 마을 사람들 곁으로 돌아올 수 있어습니다.{nl}감사합니다.
column4: Terima kasih aku dapat kembali pada masyarakatku.{nl}Terima Kasih.

column2: Hm...?{nl}Why is the ground shaking?
column3: 음...?{nl}이 진동은 뭐지?
column4: Hm…?{nl}Mengapa tanah ini bergetar?

column2: I should go, something could have happened to the villagers.{nl}I apologize if I'm being a little shameless, but would you help us some more?
column3: 마을 사람들에게 무슨 일이 있을지도 모르니 서둘러 가보겠습니다.{nl}염치없지만 저희가 모여있는 곳에 오셔서 조금 더 도와주시면 감사하겠습니다.
column4: Aku harus pergi, sesuatu dapat saja terjadi pada penduduk desa.{nl}Maafkan aku jika aku tidak tahu malu, namun mau kah kau membantu sekali lagi?

column2: As black powders dropped from the pillar, the monsters are rushing in!
column3: 기둥에서 검은 가루가 떨어지자 몬스터들이 홀린 듯이 몰려듭니다!
column4: Jika Black powders jatuh dari tiang, para monster segera masuk!

column2: As you brushed off black powders, you can see the engraved letters!
column3: 검은 가루를 털어냈더니 새겨진 글씨가 보입니다!
column4: Jika kamu menggosok black powders, kau akan melihat huruf terkubur!

column2: The light of the crystal that shines mysterious ray seems weaker than I thought.{nl}In order for it to illuminate enough ray, please obtain luminous oil from the monsters nearby!
column3: 신비한 빛을 내는 결정의 빛이 생각보다 약한 것 같습니다.{np}충분한 빛을 내도록 주변 몬스터에게서 야광 기름을 구해 오세요!
column4: Cahaya dari Crystal yang memiliki kilau misterius sepertinya meredup dari yang kukira.{nl}Untuk mendapat cukup cahaya, tolong dapatkan Luminous oil dari monster sekitar!

column2: You would be able to read the letters after collecting luminous oil!
column3: 야광 기름을 모아야 글귀를 읽을 수 있습니다!
column4: Kau akan dapat membaca huruf setelah mengumpulkan Luminous oil!

column2: Say the numbers that the letters indicate near the pillar!
column3: 기둥 가까이에서 글귀가 말하는 숫자를 말해 보세요!
column4: Sebutkan angka yang mengindikasikan huruf dekat tiang!

column2: You can't see it clearly, but the moss that shines vaguely enables you to read the letters a bit. {nl}When you collect the mosses like these, you would be able to read the letters.
column3: 잘 보이진 않지만, 희미하게 빛나는 이끼가 글귀를 조금 비추었습니다.{nl}이것과 같은 이끼를 모으면 글귀를 읽을 수 있을 것 같습니다
column4: Kamu tidak dapat meluihat dengan jelas, namun Mosses yang bercahaya membantumu membaca huruf sedikit. {nl}Saat kau mengumpulkan mosses seperti ini, kau dapat membaca huruf.

column2: The pillar has collapsed!{nl}Obtain sticky liquid from the monsters and repair the pillar!
column3: 기둥이 무너져 버렸습니다!{nl}몬스터로부터 점성 있는 액체를 구해 기둥을 수리 하세요!
column4: Tiang telah hancur!{nl}Dapatkan Sticky liquid dari monster dan perbaiki kolam tiang!

column2: Please obtain some sticky liquid that would be used to repair the pillar!
column3: 기둥을 수리 할 만한 점성 있는 액체를 구해 오세요!
column4: Tolong dapatkan beberapa Sticky liquid yang akan digunakan untuk memperbaiki tiang!

column2: Finally, it seems I would be able to read the letters!
column3: 드디어 새겨진 글귀를 읽을 수 있을 것 같습니다!
column4: Akhirnya, sepertinya aku dapat membaca huruf!

column2: I will help
column3: 괜찮은 생각이니 돕겠다고 한다
column4: Aku akan bantu

column2: I am not interested in it
column3: 별로 관심 없다고 한다
column4: Aku tidak tertarik

column2: As Albinas told you, the polluted tombstones are attracting monsters!{nl}Defeat the monsters and break the tombstones!
column3: 알비나스가 말한 대로 오염된 비석이 몬스터를 끌어들입니다!{nl}몬스터를 물리치면서 비석을 파괴하세요!
column4: Seperti dikatakan Albinas,  polluted tombstones menarik perhatian monster!{nl}Kalahkan monster dan hancurkan Tombstones!

column2: Let's run away
column3: 도망가자
column4: Berlari lah!!

column2: Go out now
column3: 이만 물러난다
column4: Keluar sekarang!!

column2: You don't have to apologize anymore
column3: 여기까지 했으니 사과는 충분하다고 한다
column4: Kau tidak perlu minta maaf lagi

column2: Please wait until it finishes
column3: 끝날 때 까지 기다린다
column4: Tolong tunggu sampai selesai

column2: I will help with the investigation of Albinas
column3: 알비나스 조사를 돕겠다고 한다
column4: Aku akan menolong dengan investigasi dari Albinas

column2: I will find it out
column3: 알아오겠다고 한다
column4: Aku akan mencari tahu

column2: Let's just wait for the results
column3: 그냥 결과를 기다리자고 한다
column4: Mari tunggu dari hasilnya

column2: I will let them know
column3: 알려주겠다고 한다
column4: Aku akan memberitahumu

column2: I am quitting on this
column3: 이 일에서 손을 떼겠다고 한다
column4: Aku keluar dari sini

column2: I will go help Fabijus
column3: 당장 파비유스를 도우러 가겠다고 한다
column4: Aku akan menolong Paviyus

column2: Let's think about this for a moment
column3: 일단 생각할 시간을 갖자고 한다
column4: Mari cari waktu untuk memikirkannya

column2: I will pass it to him
column3: 흔쾌히 전해 주겠다고 한다
column4: Aku akan memberikan padanya

column2: It's now time to say farewell
column3: 이만 헤어져야 할 것 같다고 한다
column4: Saatnya untuk mengucapkan selamat tinggal

column2: I will help secretly
column3: 몰래 돕겠다고 한다
column4: Aku akan membantu diam-diam

column2: I came here since Leopoldas asked me to help
column3: 레오폴다스가 도와주래서 왔다고 한다
column4: Aku datang kesini sejak Leopoldas memintaku untuk menolongnya

column2: The place where the merchants' goods were located was digged by monsters!
column3: 상단 물건이 있던 곳은 이미 몬스터가 다 파헤친 뒤입니다!{nl}몬스터를 처치하고 물건을 되찾으세요!

column2: The Wizard Master is complaining about no one stepping up to solve the monster problem despite the constant danger. Go to East Siauliai Woods and defeat the Ironbaum.

column4: Wizard Master mengeluhkan mengenai tidak adanya yang maju untuk menyelesaikan masalah monster yang memberikan ancaman serius. Pergi ke East Siauliai Woods dan kalahkan Ironbaum.

column2: Set Up the Namotts of Purification in Canyon Area 36_1
