column2: The Oracle Master says evil energy is becoming stronger and interfering with her powers. Go to Canyon Area 36_1, where evil energy is at its strongest, and set up the Namotts of Purification.
column3: 오라클 마스터는 최근 마기가 강해져서 자신의 능력이 방해받고 있다고 합니다. 특히 마기가 강해 방해가 심한 협곡지대 36_1에 가서 정화의 나모트를 설치하세요.
column4: Oracle Master mengatakan evil energy telah menjadi lebih kuat dan mempengaruhi kekuatannya. Pergi ke Canyon Area 36_1, dimana evil energy berada dalam kondisi terkuat, dan memasang Namotts of Purification.

column2: You have set up all Namotts of Purification. Return to the Oracle Master.
column3: 정화의 나모트를 모두 설치했습니다. 오라클 마스터에게 돌아가세요.
column4: Kamu telah memasang semua Namotts of Purification. Kembali kepada Oracle Master.

column2: Suddenly the monsters came and started to attack the pillar! Protect the pillar.
column3: 갑자기 몬스터들이 몰려와서 기둥을 공격합니다! 기둥을 지키세요.
column4: Tiba - tiba para monster datang dan menyerang pilar! Lindungi pilar.

column2: It seems that the monsters reacted to the black powders. Since you've defeated all monsters, brush off all black powder that were on the pillar.
column3: 검은 가루에 몬스터들이 반응한 걸까요? 몬스터들을 모두 물리쳤으니 기둥에 붙어 있던 검은 가루를 모두 털어내 봅시다.
column4: Tampaknya para monster bereaksi terhadap black powder. Karena kamu telah mengalahkan semua monster, Hapus seluruh black powder yang terdapat di  pilar.

column2: Collect Glowing Oil
column3: 야광 기름 수집
column4: Kumpulkan luminous oil

column2: You can't check the carvings even with the crystal that illuminates a mysterious ray. It seems that you would need the luminous oil from the monsters nearby.
column3: 신비한 빛을 내는 결정으로도 글귀를 확인 할 수 없었습니다. 주변의 몬스터에게서 구할 수 있는 야광 기름이 필요할 것 같습니다.
column4: Kamu tidak dapat memeriksa surat bahkan dengan crystal yang menyinari cahaya ray yang misterius. Tampaknya kamu membutuhkan luminous oil dari monster terdekat.

column2: You've obtained all luminous oil. Go back to the pillar and read the carvings on the pillar.
column3: 야광 기름을 모두 모았습니다. 다시 기둥으로 가서 기둥에 새겨진 글귀를 읽어 봅시다.
column4: Kamu telah mengumpulkan seluruh luminous oil. Kembali ke pilar dan baca surat di pilar.

column2: Obtain Glowing Oil from monsters
column3: 몬스터에게서 야광 기름 획득
column4: Dapatkan luminous oil dari monster

column2: When you say the special number, it seems that you would be able to read the carvings on the pillar. Obtain a hint from some specific colored pillar and enter the numbers on chat window near the pillar.
column3: 특별한 숫자를 말하면 기둥의 글귀를 읽을 수 있는 것 같습니다. 특정 색상의 기둥에서 힌트를 얻은 뒤, 기둥 가까이에서 채팅창으로 숫자를 입력하세요.
column4: Ketika kamu mengatakan nomor special, Tampaknya kamu akan dapat membaca surat di pilar. Dapatkan petunjuk dari beberapa warna pilar yang spesifik dan masukkan nomor di dalam chat window dekat pilar.

column2: Writings have started to appear on the pillar. Move closer to read them.
column3: 기둥에 뭔가 새겨져 있는 것이 보이기 시작했습니다. 가까이 다가가 읽어 보세요.
column4: Tulisan telah terlihat di pilar. Bergerak mendekat untuk membacanya.

column2: Suddenly a pillar appreared from nowhere. Before it disappears, go there and take a look at it.
column3: 어디선가 갑자기 기둥이 나타났습니다. 다시 사라지기 전에 다가가 살펴 보세요.
column4: Secara tiba - tiba sebuah pilar muncul entah dari mana. Sebelum itu menghilang, Pergi kesana dan periksa lah.

column2: Collect Luminous Moss
column3: 빛나는 이끼 채집
column4: Mengumpulkan shining moss

column2: You'll need Luminous Moss in order to read the carvings on the summoned pillar, but if you don't come back within 5 minutes, the pillar will disappear so you should hurry.
column3: 소환된 기둥의 글귀를 읽으려면 빛나는 이끼가 필요할 것 같습니다. 단, 5분 안에 돌아오지 않으면 기둥은 다시 사라지니 서두르세요.
column4: Kamu akan membutuhkan shining moss untuk membaca surat yang terdapat di pilar, Tapi apabila kamu tidak kembali dalam 5 menit, pilar akan menghilang jadi kamu harus cepat.

column2: Now, you will be able to read the carvings on the pillar. Return to the pillar and read the carvings.
column3: 이제 기둥의 글귀를 읽을 수 있을 것 같습니다. 기둥으로 다시 돌아가 읽어 보세요.
column4: Sekarang, kamu akan dapat membaca surat yang terdapat di pilar. Kembali ke pilar dan baca suratnya.

column2: Collect Viscous Liquid
column3: 점성 있는 액체 수집
column4: Mengumpulkan sticky liquid

column2: The pillar collapsed although you didn't even touch on it. It seems that you'll need to repair the pillar, so acquire Viscous Liquid from the monsters nearby.
column3: 건드리지도 않았는데 기둥이 무너져 버렸습니다. 기둥을 수리해야 할 것 같으니, 주변의 몬스터에게서 점성 있는 액체를 구해 옵시다.
column4: Pilarnya rubuh walaupun kamu tidak menyentuhnya. Tampaknya kamu harus memperbaiki pilar jadi tolong dapatkan sticky liquid dari para monster terdekat.

column2: Repair the pillar
column3: 기둥 수리
column4: Perbaiki pilarnya

column2: You've obtained all stick liquid. Go back to the pillar and repair it.
column3: 점성 있는 액체를 모두 모았습니다. 다시 돌아가서 기둥을 수리해 보세요.
column4: Kamu telah mendapatkan seluruh stick liquid. Kembali ke pilar dan perbaiki.

column2: You can someone observing the tombstone at Pasaka Canyon. Meet him.
column3: 파사카 협곡에서 비석을 관찰하는 사람이 보입니다. 한 번 만나 보세요.
column4: Kamu dapat melihat seseorang mengamati tombstone di Pasaka Canyon. Temui dia.

column2: Rescue Albinas who fell in danger
column3: 위험에 빠진 알비나스 구출
column4: Selamatkan Albinas yang merasa dalam bahaya

column2: Destroy the tombstone of Nestospa at Usas Hill
column3: 우사스 언덕에 있는 네스토스파의 비석 파괴
column4: Hancurkan Nestoses tombstone di Usas Hill

column2: Albina told you that the tombstone which spurts out red energy is polluted and attracting monsters. Go to Usas Hill and destroy the polluted tombstone.
column3: 알비나는 붉은 기운을 내뿜는 비석은 오염된 것으로, 몬스터를 불러 모으고 있다고 합니다. 우사스 언덕으로 가서 오염된 비석을 파괴하세요.
column4: Albina memberitahukan kamu bahwa tombstone yang mengeluarkan red energy itu terkontaminasi dan menarik monster. Pergi ke Usas Hill dan hancurkan tombstone yang terkontaminasi.

column2: You can see the polluted tombstone of Nestospa at Usas Hill which Albinas told you before. Destroy it fast.
column3: 우사스 언덕에 알비나스가 말한 오염된 네스토스파의 비석이 보입니다. 어서 파괴하세요.
column4: Kamu dapat menlihat Nestoses tombstone yang terkontaminasi di Usas Hill yang telah diberitahukan oleh Albinas sebelumnya. Hancurkan segera.

column2: Check the destroyed tombstone
column3: 파괴된 비석 확인
column4: Periksa tombstone yang hancur

column2: As Albinas told you before, you've destroyed the tombstone. Look at it again.
column3: 알비나스가 시킨 대로 비석을 파괴했습니다. 다시 한 번 살펴 보세요.
column4: Seperti yang Albinas katakan sebelumnya, kamu telah menghancurkan tombstone. Periksa lagi.

column2: Report to Albinas
column3: 알비나스에게 보고
column4: Laporkan ke Albinas

column2: You've destroyed the tombstone as Albinas told you. Go back to Albinas now.
column3: 알비나스의 말대로 비석을 파괴했습니다. 이제 알비나스에게 돌아가세요.
column4: Kamu telah menghancurkan tombstone seperti yang diberitahu Albinas. Kembali ke Albinas sekarang.

column2: Go back to Albinas and check it
column3: 알비나스에게 돌아가서 사실 확인하기
column4: Kembali ke Albinas dan laporkan

column2: Damijonas is mad and saying that their tombstones are not polluted. Go back to Albinas, tell him about it and bring him here.
column3: 다미요나스는 화를 내며 자신들의 비석은 오염된 것이 아니라며 그런 오해를 불러 일으킨 사람이 누구냐며 노발대발 합니다. 알비나스에게 돌아가 이 사실을 전하고, 이쪽으로 데려와야 할 것 같습니다.
column4: Damiyonas marah dan mengatakan bahwa tombstone tidak terkontaminasi. Kembali ke Albinas, katakan padanya mengenai hal ini dan bawa dia kesini.

column2: Albinas has disappeared. It seems that you should go back to Damijonas and explain.
column3: 알비나스는 이미 사라진 뒤입니다. 다미요나스에게 돌아가서 해명을 해야 할 것 같습니다.
column4: Albinas telah menghilang. Tampaknya kamu harus kembali ke Damiyonas dan menjelaskannya.

column2: As an expression of an apology, it seems that you would need to help Damijonas. Talk with Damijonas again.
column3: 다미요나스에게 사과의 의미로 다미요나스의 일을 도와 주어야 할 것 같습니다. 다미요나스와 다시 대화해 보세요.
column4: Sebagai rasa penyesalan dan permintaan maaf, tampaknya kamu harus menolong Damiyonas. Bicara dengan Damiyonas sekali lagi.

column2: Tell Damijonas that you would restore the tombstone.
column3: 다미요나스에게 책임지고 이 비석을 복구하겠다고 말해보세요.
column4: Bicara dengan Damiyonas kamu akan memperbaiki tombstone.

column2: Collect the stones that will be used as materials for the restoration
column3: 복구 자재로 쓸 돌 수집
column4: Kumpulkan stones yang akan digunakan sebagai material untuk memperbaiki

column2: In order to restore the tombstone, you would need some stones. Obtain some stones and go back to the camp of Nestospa.
column3: 비석을 복구하려면 자재용 석재가 필요합니다. 적당한 돌을 구해 네스토스파의 캠프로 가져가세요.
column4: Untuk memperbaiki tombstone, kamu akan membutuhkan beberapa stones. Kumpulkan beberapa stones dan kembali ke camp of Nestoses.

column2: Request to Eduinas at the camp of Nestospa
column3: 네스토스파의 캠프에 있는 에뒤나스에게 부탁
column4: Berbicara pada Edinas di camp of Nestoses

column2: You've obtained all stones that can be used as materials. Ask Eduinas at the camp of Nestospa to refine them to be used as the materials.
column3: 자재로 쓰일 만한 돌을 모두 구했습니다. 네스토스파의 캠프에 있는 에뒤나스에게 비석 복구용 자재로 다듬어 달라고 부탁해 보세요.
column4: Kamu telah mendapatkan seluruh stones yang dapat digunakan sebagai material. Minta Edinas di camp of Nestoses untuk merifine itu agar dapat digunakan sebagai material.

column2: You would have to explain everything happened so far to Eduinas
column3: 그동안의 일들을 에뒤나스에게 설명해야 할 듯합니다.
column4: Kamu harus menjelaskan seluruh kejadiannya sejauh ini kepada Edinas

column2: Eliminate the monsters nearby
column3: 주변의 몬스터 정리
column4: Kalahkan monster terdekat

column2: It seems that Eduinas doesn't feel good after hearing that the tombstone was broken. He will refine the materials since Damijonas asked him to do it, but in the meantime he wants you to defeat the monsters around.
column3: 에뒤나스는 비석이 부서졌다는 이야기를 듣더니 기분이 좋지 않아진 모양입니다. 어쨌든 다미요나스가 시킨 일이니 자재를 다듬어주기는 하겠지만, 그 동안 캠프 주변을 위협하는 몬스터들이나 정리해 달라는 말을 하고 있습니다.
column4: Tampaknya Edinas merasa tidak senang setelah mendengar tombstone telah dirusak. Dia kan merifine material karena Damiyonas yang meminta, tapi sementara itu dia minta kamu mengalahkan monster disekitar.

column2: Go back to Eduinas and report
column3: 에뒤나스에게 돌아가 보고
column4: Kembali ke Edinas dan laporkan

column2: Find the Anastospa Camping Ground
column3: 아나스토스파의 야영지 찾아가기
column4: Albinas terlihat mencurigakan. Kembali ke camping ground of Anastoses dan tanyakan tentang Albinas.

column2: Albinas looks suspicious. Go back to the camping ground of Anastospa and ask about Albinas.
column3: 아무래도 알비나스가 수상합니다. 아나스토스파의 야영지로 가서 알비나스라는 사람에 대해 물어보세요.
column4: Mendapatkan material untuk penelitian

column2: Retrieve the research materials
column3: 연구자료 되찾기
column4: Mendapatkan material untuk penelitian

column2: It seems that you would need to help Gedas in order to receive the info on Albinas. Please retrieve the research materials of Gedas from the monsters around. Some monsters may have way more documents than you expected when you check by pressing spacebar.
column3: 게다스의 일을 빨리 도와야 알비나스에 대한 정부를 얻을 수 있을 것 같습니다. 주변 몬스터에게서 게다스의 연구자료를 되찾아 주세요. 어떤 몬스터는 스페이스바로 확인하면 훨씬 더 많은 자료를 가지고 있을 수도 있습니다.
column4: Tampaknya Gedas akan membutuhkan bantuanmu sebagai imbalan mendapatkan info tentang Albinas. Tolong dapatkan material untuk penelitian Gedas dari monster sekitar. Beberapa monster mungkin memiliki  lebih banyak dokumen dari yang kamu perkirakan ketika kamu check dengan menekan spacebar.

column2: Hand them over to Gedas
column3: 게다스에게 전달
column4: Serahkan semuanya kepada Gedas

column2: Collect the materials for Flame Bomb Powder
column3: 불꽃탄 가루 재료 수집
column4: Kumpulkan material untuk Flame Bomb Powder

column2: Gedas told you that he sent his collegues to find out about the identity of Albinas. Signal bombs should be prepared for the situations when the colleagues fall into dangers so he asked you to get the materials. Please obtain flame bomb powder from the monsters.
column3: 게다스는 알비나스의 정체를 조사하기 위해 동료를 보내겠다고 합니다. 동료가 위험에 처할 때를 대비해 신호탄을 준비해 줘야 하니, 그 재료를 구해 오라고 합니다. 몬스터로부터 신호탄의 재료인 불꽃탄 가루를 구해 오세요.
column4: Gedas memberitahukan bahwa dia mengirim temannya untuk mencari informasi tentang Albinas. Signal bombs harus dipersiapkan untuk situasi ketika mereka dalam kondisi berbahaya jadi dia meminta mu untuk mendapatkan materialnya. Tolong dapatkan flame bomb powder dari para monster.

column2: Ask Gedas about the flame bombs and the investigation about the truth.
column3: 신호탄과 진상 조사에 대해, 게다스에게 물어 보세요.
column4: Tanyakan Gedas mengenai flame bombs dan infestigasi tentang kebenarannya.

column2: While waiting for the results of the investigation arrive here, Gedas asked you to meet Barte who is one of the members of Anastospa who arrived here recently. You better ask her if there's anything she saw while coming here.
column3: 게다스는 조사 결과가 올 동안, 얼마 전 이 곳 캠프에 도착한 아나스토스파 일원인 바르테를 만나 보라고 합니다. 그녀가 이 곳에 오면서 본 것이 없는지 물어 보는 것이 좋겠습니다.
column4: Sambil menunggu hasil dari investigasi datang, Gedas akan meminta mu untuk menemui Barte yang merupakan salah satu member Anastoses yang baru saja tiba. Kamu sebaiknya bertanya apakah dia melihat sesuatu ketika datang kesini.

column2: Collect the traces of monsters from Majiva Grave Field
column3: 마지바 묘지의 몬스터에게서 단서 수집
column4: Kumpulkan jejak monster dari Majiva Grave Field

column2: Hand over the leather pieces to Barte
column3: 가죽 조각을 바르테에게 전달
column4: Serahkan leather pieces ke Barte

column2: Collect the pieces of leathers from monsters
column3: 몬스터에게서 가죽 조각 수집
column4: Kumpulkan pieces of leathers dari monster

column2: Let Gedas know about the symbol of the leather
column3: 가죽의 문양에 대해 게다스에게 알려 주기
column4: Biarkan Gedas mengetahui tentang symbol of the leather

column2: Barte told you that the symbol that is engraved on the leather belongs to Vaiga. Tell this to Gedas.
column3: 바르테는 가죽에 새겨진 문양은 마족 바이가의 것이라고 합니다. 이 사실을 게다스에게 알려 주세요.
column4: Barte memberitahukan kepada kamu bahwa simbol yang tergambar di leather merupakan milik Baiga. Beritahukan hal ini kepada Gedas.

column2: Request help from Eduinas of Nestospa
column3: 네스토스파의 에뒤나스에게 도움 요청
column4: Meminta bantuan kepada Edinas of Nestoses

column2: Gedas told you that in order to fight against the demons, he would need the help of Nestospa. Go meet Eduinas at the camp of Nestospa and ask for help.
column3: 게다스는 마족을 상대하기 위해선 네스토스파의 도움이 필요하다고 합니다. 네스토스파의 캠프에 있는 에뒤나스에게 도움을 요청해 보세요.
column4: Gedas berkata untuk bertarung dengan demon, dia butuh bantuan dari Nestoses. Pergi temui Edinas di Camp of Nestoses dan minta bantuan.

column2: Go to Liugas Access Road and save Fabijus
column3: 리우가스 진입로로 파비유스를 구하러 가기
column4: Pergi ke Liugas Access Road dan selamatkan Paviyus

column2: To save Fabijus and defeat Albinas, go to Liugas Access Road where you met Albinas for the first time.
column3: 파비유스를 구하고 알비나스를 처치하기 위해, 처음 알비나스를 만났던 곳인 리우가스 진입로로 가 봅시다.
column4: Untuk menyelamatkan Paviyus dan mengalahkan Albinas, pergi ke Liugas Access Road tempat dimana kamu menemui Albinas untuk pertama kali.

column2: Defeat Albinas
column3: 알비나스 처치
column4: Kalahkan Albinas

column2: As you sprinkled the holy water, Albinas has shown himself and turned into a Fire Lord! Don't miss this chance and defeat Fire Lord!
column3: 성수를 뿌리자 알비나스가 본색을 드러내어 파이어로드로 변했습니다! 이 기회를 놓치지 말고 파이어로드를 해치우세요!
column4: Ketika kamu memercikkan devine water, Albinas menampakkan wujud aslinya dan berubah menjadi Fire Lord! Jangan lewatkan kesempatan ini dan kalahkan Fire Lord!

column2: Report to Gedas
column3: 게다스에게 보고
column4: Laporkan kepada Gedas

column2: Tell Eduinas at Nestospa camp about what happened
column3: 네스토스 캠프의 에뒤나스에게 이야기 전해 주기
column4: Beritahukan Edinas di Nestos camp ceritanya

column2: Tell Damijonas at Usas Hill about the story
column3: 우사스 언덕의 다미요나스에게 이야기 전해 주기
column4: Beritahukan Damiyonas di Usas Hill ceritanya

column2: The newcomers which Leopoldas has told you before are right beside. Among them, talk to a newcomer called Gerda. There may be something you can help on.
column3: 레오폴다스가 말한 신입들이 바로 옆에 있습니다. 그 중에 게르다라는 신입 단원과 이야기 해 보세요. 도와 줄 일이 있을 지도 모릅니다.
column4: Penyihir pendatang baru Leopoldas telah memberitahukan mu sebelumnya tentang sisi kanan. Diantara mereka, bicara dengan pendatang baru bernama Gerda. Mungkin ada sesuatu yang dapat kamu bantu.

column2: Set the notice board on Kluibe Road
column3: 크뤼베 가도에 알림판 세우기
column4: Perhatikan notice board di Kluibe Road

column2: Gerda told you that among many works to do, there is a task to set the notice boards in various places. Help her and set the notice board on Kluibe Road.
column3: 게르다는 신입 단원이 해야 할 일 중엔 여러 곳에 알림판을 세우는 일이 있다고 합니다. 그녀를 도와 크뤼베 가도에 성물 발굴 알림판을 세우세요.
column4: Gerda memberitahukan kepada kamu banyak hal yang harus dilakukan, ada tugas untuk memasang  the notice boards di beberapa tempat. Bantu dia untuk memasang notice board di Kluibe Road.

column2: You've set the notice board on Kluibe Road as Gerda requested to you. Now, go back to Gerda.
column3: 게르다가 부탁한 대로 크뤼베 가도에 알림판을 세웠습니다. 이제 게르다에게 돌아가세요.
column4: Kamu telah memasang notice board di Kluibe Road seperti yang Gerda minta padamu. Sekarang, kembali kepada Gerda.

column2: Use the scroll of Kedoran Merchant Alliance to the new Revelator
column3: 초보 계시자에게 케도라 상단의 스크롤 사용
column4: Gunakan scroll of Kedora Merchants untuk Savior yang baru

column2: Kedoran Merchant Alliance are helping the new Revelators. Please use the scroll of Kedoran Merchant Alliance to the new Revelators who are between level 1 and level 10 near Orsha or Klaipeda. But, you can't use it to the Revelators who already received benefits.
column3: 케도라 상단은 초보 계시자들에게 도움을 주고 있다고 합니다. 오르샤나 클라페다 근처의 1레벨에서 10레벨 사이의 초보 계시자들에게 케도라 상단의 스크롤을 사용해 주세요. 단, 이미 혜택을 받은 계시자에겐 사용할 수 없습니다.
column4: Kedora Merchants tengah membantu Saviors yang baru. Tolong gunakan scroll of Kedora Merchants kepadaSaviors yang baru yang berada diantara level 1 dan level 10 dekat Orsha atau Klaipeda. Tapi, kamu tidak dapat menggunakan pada Saviors yang telah menerima keuntungan.

column2: You've helped new Revelators. Go back to Serapinas and let him know.
column3: 초보 계시자들을 도왔습니다. 세라피나스에게 돌아가 알려 주세요.
column4: Kamu telah menolong Saviors yang baru. Kembali ke Serapinas dan biarkan dia tahu.

column2: Retrieve the sacred objects which the merchants had lost
column3: 상단이 잃어버린 성물 회수
column4: Mendapatkan sacred objects yang telah dihilangkan merchants

column2: Edita asked you to retrieve the sacred objects that were lost in Goanar Path. Defeat the monsters as well on your way back.
column3: 에디타는 고아나르 숲길에서 잃어버린 성물의 회수를 요청했습니다. 가는 길에 몬스터도 함께 정리하세요.
column4: Edita meminta kamu untuk mendapatkan kembali sacred objects yang telah hilang di Goanar Path. Kalahkan para monster dalam perjalanan kembali.

column2: Hand them over to Edita
column3: 에디타에게 전달
column4: Serahkan kembali kepada Edita

column2: You've defeated all monsters and retrieved the sacred objects. Please bring them to Edita.
column3: 몬스터를 전부 정리하고 성물도 무사히 회수했습니다. 이것을 에디타에게 가져다 주세요.
column4: Kamu telah mengahkan semua monster dan mendapatkan kembali sacred objects. Tolong kembalikan kepada Edita.

column2: Defeat the monsters near Goanar Path
column3: 고아나르 숲길 주변의 몬스터 처치
column4: Kalahkan para monster dekat Goanar Path

column2: Retrieve the objects of the merchants at Kluibe Road.
column3: 크뤼베 가도의 상단 물건 회수
column4: Dapatkan barang dari merchants di Kluibe Road.

column2: The monsters are rushing in near the place where the objects should be located. Defeat them and retrieve the objects of the merchants.
column3: 잃어버린 상단 물건이 있어야 할 곳 인근에 몬스터들이 몰려들어 있다고 합니다. 이들을 물리치고 상단 물건을 되찾으세요.
column4: Monster bergegas menuju tempat dimana barang tersebut diperkirakan berada. Kalahkan mereka dan dapatkan kembali barang dari merchants.

column2: Hand them over to Jurate
column3: 유라테에게 전달
column4: Serahkan itu kepada Jurate

column2: You've retrieved the objects of the merchants. Go back to Jurate and ask what these are.
column3: 상단의 물건을 되찾았습니다. 유라테에게 돌아가서 이것들이 무엇인지 물어 보세요.
column4: Kamu telah mendapatkan barang dari merchants. Kembali ke Jurate dan tanyakan barang apa ini.

column2: Retrieve %s after defeating monsters
column3: 몬스터를 처치하고 %s 회수
column4: Mendapatkan %s setelah mengalahkan monster

column2: Defeat the monsters and retrieve the damp piece of a paper
column3: 몬스터를 처치하고 축축한 종이 조각 회수
column4: Kalahkan para monster dan dapatkan damp piece of a paper

column2: Search the merchants' goods using the detector at Juikas Field
column3: 율카스 벌판에서 탐지기를 사용하여 상단 물품 수색
column4: Carilah barang merchant dengan menggunakan detector di Juikas Field

column2: Investigate Juikas Field with the detector which Edita gave to you. You will know the direction when you use the detector within the marked spot on the map.
column3: 에디타가 준 탐지기로 율카스 벌판 일대를 조사해 보세요. 맵에 표시된 곳 안에서 탐지기를 사용하면 방향을 알 수 있습니다.
column4: Selidiki Juikas Field dengan detector yang diberikan oleh Edita. Kamu akan mengetahui arah ketika menggunakan detector yang di tandai pada map.

column2: Report to Edita
column3: 에디타에게 보고
column4: Laporkan kepada Edita

column2: You've found the merchant's goods with the detector. Bring them back to Edita.
column3: 탐지기 덕분에 상단 물품을 찾았습니다. 에디타에게 가져다 주세요.
column4: Kamu telah menemukan barang merchant  dengan menggunakan detector. Berikan kembali kepada Edita.

column2: Retrieve the educational materials from the monsters
column3: 몬스터에게서 교육 자료 되찾기
column4: Dapatkan educational materials dari para monster

column2: Hand them over to Margellius
column3: 마르젤리유스에게 전달
column4: Serahkan hal itu kepada Marzelius

column2: Collect the educational materials from the monsters
column3: 몬스터에게서 교육 자료 수집
column4: Dapatkan educational materials dari para monster

column2: Collect the body fluid of the monsters
column3: 몬스터 체액 수집
column4: Kumpulkan body fluid dari monster

column2: In order to make educational documents, you would need the special ink. Put the trap which Margellius gave to you on Drose Empty Lot, capture th4e monsters and extract the body fluid.
column3: 교육 자료를 만들기 위해선 특별한 잉크가 필요합니다. 마르젤리유스가 준 덫을 드로즈 공터에 놓아 몬스터를 포획한 뒤 체액을 뽑으세요.
column4: Untuk membuat educational documents, kamu akan membutuhkan special ink. Letakkan trap yang diberikan Marzelius kepada kamu di Drose Empty Lot, Tangkap mosnternya dan dapatkan body fluid.

column2: Collect the materials to make tombstones
column3: 비석을 만들 자재 수집
column4: Kumpulkan material untuk membuat tombstones

column2: Hand them over to Antanas
column3: 안타나스에게 전달
column4: Berikan hal itu kepada  Antanas

column2: You've obtained all materials that are needed to create tombstones. Now, go back to Antanas.
column3: 비석 세우기에 필요한 자재를 다 구했습니다. 이제 안타나스에게 돌아가세요.
column4: Kamu telah mendapatkan seluruh material yang dibutuhkan untuk memebuat tombstone. Sekarang, kembali ke Antanas.

column2: Since you've obtained all materials, now ask if you can make tombstones.
column3: 재료를 모두 구해 주었으니 이제 비석을 만들 수 있는지 물어 보세요.
column4: Karena kamu telah mengumpulkan seluruh material, Sekarang tanyakan dapatkah kamu membuat tombstone.

column2: Receive the chisel and the hammer that were specially ordered from the blacksmith in Orsha
column3: 오르샤의 대장장이에게 특별 주문한 정과 망치 받기
column4: Mendapatkan chisel dan hammer yang diminta secara khusus dari blacksmith di Orsha

column2: Antanas ordered special tools in order to make tombstones. Go meet the blacksmith in Orsha to receive the chisel and the hammer that were specially ordered.
column3: 안타나스는 비석을 만들기 위해 특별한 도구들을 주문해 두었다고 합니다. 오르샤의 대장장이에게 특별 주문한 정과 망치를 받으러 가 보세요.
column4: Antanas memesan peralatan special untuk membuat tombstone. Pergi dan temui blacksmith di Orsha untuk mendapatkan chisel dan hammer yang di pesan secara khusus.

column2: Antanas ordered the hammer and the chisel, but the blacksmith only gave you the hammer. Ask what happened to the chisel.
column3: 안타나스는 망치와 정을 주문했다는데 대장장이는 망치만 주었습니다. 정은 어떻게 되었는지 물어 봅시다.
column4: Antanas memesan hammer dan chisel, tapi blacksmith hanya memberikan mu hammer. Tanyakan apa yang terjadi dengan chisel.

column2: Receive the chisel that was specially ordered from the blacksmith in Orsha
column3: 오르샤의 장비상인에게 특별 주문한 정 받기
column4: Mendapatkan chisel yang dipesan secara special dari blacksmith di Orsha

column2: The blacksmith in Orsha handed over the work to the Equipment Merchant for the completion. Go meet the Equipment Merchant to receive the chisel.
column3: 오르샤의 대장장이는 정의 마무리 작업을 위해 장비상인에게 맡겼다고 합니다. 정을 받으러 장비상인에게 가 보세요.
column4: Blacksmith di Orsha menyerahkan pekerjaan kepada equipment merchant untuk penyelesaian. Pergi dan temui equipment merchant untuk mendapatkan chisel.

column2: You've received the chisel and the hammer. Now, hand them over to Antanas.
column3: 정과 망치를 모두 받았습니다. 이제 안타나스에게 전해 주세요.
column4: Kamu telah mendapatkan chisel dan the hammer. Sekarang, serahkan itu kepada Antanas.

column2: It seems that you've helped all the tasks which Antanas needed help. Talk to him for the last time.
column3: 안타나스가 도움이 필요한 일은 모두 도와준 것 같습니다. 마지막으로 그와 대화해 보세요.
column4: Sepertinya kamu telah memberikan pertolongan pada masalah Antanas. Bicara kepadanya untuk terakhir kali.

column2: Craft the tombstone
column3: 비석 제작
column4: Membuat tombstone

column2: Antanas suggested you to make a tombstone. It will be a good experience to make it.
column3: 안타나스가 비석을 한 번 만들어 보지 않겠느냐고 제안했습니다. 한 번 만들어 보는 것도 좋은 경험일 것 같습니다.
column4: Antanas menganjurkan kamu untuk membuat tombstone. Itu akan menjadi pengalaman yang bagus.

column2: The tombstone was well made. Now is the time to say farewell to Antanas.
column3: 비석은 잘 만들어 진 것 같습니다. 안타나스에게 인사하고 떠날 때 입니다.
column4: Tombstone telah berhasil dibuat. Sekarang saatnya berpamitan dengan Antanas.

column2: Antans told you that Gierda who is the another member of Nestospa needs help.
column3: 안타나스는 네스토스파의 또 다른 일원인 기에드라가 도움이 필요하다고 합니다.
column4: Antans memberitahukan padamu bahwa Gierda yang merupakan anggota lain dari Nestoses membutuhkan bantuan.

column2: Collect the transparent shells
column3: 투명한 껍질 수집
column4: Mengumpulkan transparent shells

column2: Gierda told you that in order to make scriptures, he would need transparent shells. Defeat the monsters and obtain transparent shells.
column3: 기에드라는 경전을 만들기 위해 몬스터의 투명한 껍질이 필요하다고 합니다. 몬스터를 처치하고 투명한 껍질을 모으세요.
column4: Gierda memberitahukan kepada kamu untuk membuat scriptures, dia akan membutuhkan transparent shells. Kalahkan monster dan dapatkan transparent shells.

column2: Hand them over to Gierda
column3: 기에드라에게 전달
column4: Berikan semua kepada Gierda

column2: Since you've collected all transparent shells, please take them to Gierda.
column3: 투명한 껍질을 모두 모았으니 기에드라에게 가져다 주세요.
column4: Karena kamu telah mengumpulkan seluruh transparent shells, tolong beikan semuanya kepada Gierda.

column2: Craft the rigid string roll for binding using the short leather string
column3: 짤막한 가죽 끈으로 제본용 질긴 끈뭉치 제작
column4: Buat rigid string roll untuk mengikat menggunakan short leather string

column2: You would need the leather string that is needed for binding scriptures, but the leather strings from the monsters are too short. Obtain short leather strings from the monsters and make rigid string roll for binding using Moru.
column3: 경전 제본에 가죽끈이 필요한테 몬스터에게 나오는 가죽끈은 짤막해서 쓸 수가 없다고 합니다. 몬스터에게서 짤막한 가죽 끈을 구한 뒤 무두용 모루로 제본용 질긴 끈 뭉치를 만들어 오세요.
column4: Kamu akan membutuhkan leather string yang dibutuhkan untuk mengikat scriptures, tapi leather strings dari monster terlalu pendek. Dapatkan short leather string dari monster dan buat rigid string roll untuk mengikat menggukan Moru.

column2: You've created all leather strings for binding. Take those to Gierda.
column3: 제본용 가죽끈을 모두 만들었습니다. 기에드라에게 가져다 주세요.
column4: Kamu telah membuat leather string untuk mengikat. Berikan itu kepada Gierda.

column2: Talk with Kestas who looks very unstable
column3: 굉장히 불안해 보이는 케스타스와 대화
column4: Bicara kepada Kestas yang sedang terlihat murung

column2: You can see Kestas who looks very unstable. Talk to him.
column3: 뭔가 굉장히 안절부절하고 있는 케스타스가 보입니다. 그에게 말을 걸어 보세요.
column4: Kamu dapat melihat Kestas yang terlihat sangat murung. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Retrieve the sign of Nestospa from the monsters
column3: 몬스터에게서 네스토스의 표식 되찾기
column4: Dapatkan sign of Nestoses dari para monster

column2: Kestas looks very unstable since he lost the sign of Nestospa. Retrieve the sign of Nestospa from the monsters nearby.
column3: 케스타스는 네스토스의 표식을 잃어버려 굉장히 불안해하고 있습니다. 주변의 몬스터로부터 네스토스의 표식을 되찾아 주세요.
column4: Kestas terlihat murung semenjak dia kehilangan sign of Nestoses. Dapatkan sign of Nestoses dari para monster di sekitar.

column2: Hand them over to Kestas
column3: 케스타스에게 전달
column4: Berikan itu kepada Kestas

column2: It seems Kestas looks safe now. Talk with Kestas.
column3: 케스타스는 이제 안전한 것 같습니다. 케스타스와 이야기를 더 나눠 보세요.
column4: Tampaknya Kestas terlihat bahagiasekarang. Bicara dengan Kestas.

column2: Defeat the monsters that are trying to steal the signs
column3: 표식을 빼앗으려는 몬스터 처치
column4: Kalahkan para monster yang mencoba untuk mencuri signs

column2: Collect Green Infroholder Eggs
column3: 초록 인프로홀더의 알 수집
column4: Mengumpulkan Green Infroholder Eggs

column2: To find out where the revelations are, you need to speak to the unruly Ruklys era spirits, which is no easy task. Collect Green Infroholder Eggs to make a token of restraint.
column3: 계시가 있는 곳을 알려면 루클리스 시대의 영혼들과 대화해야 하는데 워낙 난폭해서 쉽지가 않다고 합니다. 속박의 증표를 만들기 위해 초록 인프로홀더의 알을 수집하세요.
column4: Untuk menemukan dimana Revelation berada, kamu perlu berbicara dengan unruly Ruklys era spirits, yang mana bukanlah hal yang mudah. Mengumpulkan Green Infroholder Eggs untuk membuat token of restraint.

column2: You've collected the Green Infroholder Eggs. Bring them to the Old Manager.
column3: 초록 인프로홀더의 알을 구했습니다. 늙은 관리인에게 전해주세요.
column4: Kamu telah mengumpulkan Green Infroholder eggs. Berikan itu kepada old manager.

column2: You blew the horn to order for the retreat. Tell this to the Ruklys Army Soldier Spirit.
column3: 나팔을 불어 퇴각 명령을 알렸습니다. 루클리스 부대 병사 영혼에게 이 사실을 알리세요.
column4: Kamu meniup terompet untuk memerintahkan agar mundur. Beri semangat kepada para soldiers di Ruklys army.

column2: Talk with Varas
column3: 행상인 바라스와 대화
column4: Bicara dengan Varas

column2: Varas looks unstable. Ask him why he is unstable.
column3: 행상인 바라스가 안절부절하고 있습니다. 무슨 일 때문에 안절부절하는지 알아보세요.
column4: Varas terlihat murung. Tanyakan kepadanya mengapa dia murung.

column2: Move to the location where the colleagues of Varas are located.
column3: 행상인 바라스의 동료들이 있는 장소로 이동
column4: Pindah kelokasi dimana colleagues of Varas berada.

column2: Varas told you that his colleagues are being attacked by the demons. Help them.
column3: 행상인 바라스는 자신의 동료들이 마족에게 공격을 받고 있다고 합니다. 어서 그들을 도와주세요
column4: Varas memeberitahumu bahwa rekannya telah diserang oleh demon. Bantu mereka.

column2: It seems that Rose wants to talk about something. Talk to her.
column3: 로제가 뭔가 하고 싶은 말이 있어 보입니다. 그녀와 대화하세요
column4: Tampaknya Roge ingin membicarakan sesuatu. Bicara padanya.

column2: Defeat the demons that are threatening the merchants
column3: 행상인들을 위협하는 마족 처치하기
column4: Kalahkan demon yang mengancam merchants

column2: Talk with Rose
column3: 로제와 대화하세요
column4: Bicara dengan Roge

column2: Help restore Laswi's Stamina
column3: 라쉬의 체력을 회복시키기
column4: Bantu Rashi untuk memulihkan stamina

column2: Rose wants to use Laswi to find the merchants scattered around the area. However, Laswi is not in good condition. Give Laswi a stamina recovery potion.
column3: 로제는 라쉬의 후각을 이용해 흩어진 행상인들을 찾자고 합니다. 하지만 라쉬의 체력이 좋지 않습니다. 라쉬에게 체력 회복 물약을 줘 체력을 회복시켜주세요
column4: Rose ingin menggunakan Rashi untuk menemukan merchants yang tersebar disekitar area. Akan tetapi, Rashi tidak dalam kondisi yang sehat. Berikan Rashi sebuah stamina recovery potion.

column2: The dog's stamina came back to look for the colleagues of Rose. Tell this to Rose.
column3: 로제의 동료들을 찾을 수 있을만큼 개의 체력이 돌아왔습니다. 로제에게 알려주세요.
column4: Anjing pelacak telah kembali untuk mencari teman - teman Roge. Beritahukan ini kepada Roge.

column2: Look for the merchants using the dog's olfactory sense
column3: 개의 후각을 이용해 행상인 찾기
column4: Cari para merchants dengan menggunakan anjing pelacak

column2: Let the dog smell the clothes that contain the merchant's odor and look for the merchant
column3: 개에게 체취가 뭍은 옷가지를 맡게하여 행상인을 찾게 하세요.
column4: Biarkan anjing pelacak mencium pakaian yang mengandung bau dari merchant dan kemudian mencari merchant

column2: Talk with the merchant
column3: 행상인과 대화
column4: Bicara dengan merchant

column3: 감시 토템 파괴
column4: Hancurkan surveillance totem

column2: Priest Irma wants to destroy the surveillance totem and directs the attention of the Demon Lord Marnox to another direction and retrieve the demons' written instructions that are on the 3rd floor of Ashaq Underground Prison. Collect the unstable demonic stones near the 2nd surveillance totem and attach them onto it to destroy it
column3: 사제 이르마는 감시 토템을 파괴하여 마군주 마르녹스의 관심을 다른 곳으로 돌리고 아샤크 지하 감옥 3층의 마족 지령서를 회수하러 가자고 합니다. 두 번째 감시토템 주변의 불안정한 마석을 수집하여 감시 토템에 부착하여 파괴하세요
column4: Priest Irma ingin menghancurkan totem pengawas dan mengarahkan perhatian Demon Lord Marnox ke arah lain untuk mengambil kembali instruksi tertulis demon yang berada di lantai 3 Ashaq Underground Prison. Kumpulkan demonic stone yang tidak stabil di dekat totem pengawas ke 2 dan tempelkan ke atasnya untuk menghancurkannya

column2: Priest Irma suggests you destroy the surveillance totem to distract Demon Lord Marnox and go to Ashaq Underground Prison 3F to retrieve the Demon Orders. Attach the incomplete demon stones found around the second totem to it and destroy the totem.
column3: 사제 이르마는 감시 토템을 파괴하여 마군주 마르녹스의 관심을 다른 곳으로 돌리고 아샤크 지하 감옥 3층의 마족 지령서를 회수하러 가자고 합니다. 두 번째 감시토템 주변의 불안정한 마석을 수집하여 감시 토템에 부착 후 파괴하세요
column4: Priest Irma menyarankanmu untuk menghancurkan totem pengawas untuk mengalihkan perhatian Demon Lord Marnox dan pergi ke Ashaq Underground Prison 3F untuk mengambil Demon Order. Pasang demon stone yang tidak stabil di sekitar totem kedua untuk menghancurkannya.

column2: Collect Twinkling Pearl Powder
column3: 반짝이는 진주가루 수집
column4: Kumpulkan Shining Pearl Powder

column2: Priest Auranas brought various traps and goods for the request of Urbonas to prepare the days like today. Auranas told you that if you could collect shining pearl powder from the 1st district, he would make useful goods to fight against the demons
column3: 사제 아우라나스는 우르보나스의 요청으로 오늘과 같은 일이 일어날 때를 대비하여 아샤크 지하 감옥을 맡아서 각종 함정과 물품들을 준비해 왔다고 합니다. 아우라나스가 준비해둔 반짝이는 진주가루를 1번 지역에서 수집해오면 마족들을 처리하는 데 유용한 물건을 만들어 준다고 합니다
column4: Priest Auranas membawa berbagai jebakan dan barang atas permintaan Urbonas untuk menghadapi hari-hari seperti hari ini. Auranas mengatakan bahwa jika kamu bisa mengumpulkan shining pearl powder dari distrik 1, ia akan membuatkanmu barang-barang yang berguna untuk melawan para demon.

column2: Defeat the demons
column3: 마족 처리
column4: Kalahkan para demon

column2: Priest Auranas told you that when you use the orbs that are made of pearls, you would be able to find the demons that are ranked high. When you use the orbs, you would be able to bind the high ranked demons and the spirits of the subordinate demons together and if you defeat high ranked demons, you would be able to defeat subordinate demons simultaneously.
column3: 사제 아우라나스는 진주로 만든 보주를 사용하면 마족들 중에서 서열이 높은 마족을 발견할 수 있을 거라고 합니다. 진주로 만든 보주를 사용하면 서열 높은 마족과 부하 마족의 영혼을 묶을 수 있으며 서열 높은 마족을 처리하면 부하 마족도 동시에 처리할 수 있을 거라고 합니다
column4: Priest Auranas mengatakan bahwa ketika kamu menggunakan orb yang terbuat dari mutiara, kamu akan dapat menemukan demon yang peringkat tinggi. Bila kamu menggunakan orb, kamu akan mampu mengikat demon yang peringkat tinggi dan spirit dari bawahan demon secara bersamaan dan jika kamu mengalahkan demon yang berperingkat tinggi, kamu akan mampu mengalahkan bawahan dari para demon itu secara bersamaan.

column4: Priest Draznie mengatakan bahwa sudah tiba saatnya untuk menggunakan perangkap dengan priest Auranas. Jika kamu bisa memancing para demon ke perangkap yang telah diatur di ruang beracun pada distrik 4, kamu akan dapat mengalahkan para demon itu.

column4: Bicara dengan Priest Gelija

column2: Priest Irma told you that he should go to the place where the demons' written instruction is hidden, but due to the curse totem, he doesn't have power to say the spell. Destroy the curse totem and help Iruma.
column3: 사제 이르마는 마족 지령서를 숨겨둔 장소로 가야하는데 저주 토템 때문에 주문을 외울 힘이 없다고 합니다. 저주 토템을 파괴하여 이르마를 도와줍시다
column4: Priest Iruma memberitahukan mu bahwa ia harus berada di tempat dimana demon's Written Intruction disembunyikan. Tetapi karena curse Totem, dia tidak memiliki kekuatan untuk merapalkan mantra. Hancurkan Curse totem dan bantu Iruma

column4: Priest Iruma memintamu untuk menghancurkan Survoeilance totem di 3rd district dengan tujuan mengalihkan perhatian Marnox yang berada di suatu tempat di lantai 3 Ashak Underground prison.

column4: Baskez sendang mencari Green Lepusbunny assasin Fur untuk menolong teman mereka mengalahkan udara yang dingin. Buru Green lepus bunny untuk mengumpulkan Fur.

column3: 보급병 론다는 부족한 식량 상황을 푸른 샤울라브 메이지의 비상식량으로 해결하고 싶다고 합니다. 야영지 근처에서 푸른 샤울라브 메이지를 사냥하고 비상식량을 모으세요.
column4: Petugas Ronda inting menggunakan Blue Siaulav Mages' emergency food untuk menyelesaikan permasalah supplai makanan. Kalahkan Blue Siaulac Mages di camping Ground dan kumpulkan makanan darurat mereka.

column2: You have collected the requested food items. Hurry and bring them to Ronda.
column3: 부탁받은 양의 식량를 모았습니다. 서둘러 보급병 론다에게 전달하세요.
column4: Kamu telah mengumpulkan makanan yang diminta, cepat kembali dan Berikan ke Ronda
